Hamidur Rahman ( 2 February 1953 -- 28 October 1971 ) was a sepoy in Bangladesh Army during the Bangladesh Liberation War .
Carlo Orelli ( December 23 , 1894 -- January 22 , 2005 ) was , at age 110 , the last surviving Italian World War I veteran who joined the army at the onset of the war .
Herman Pfisterer ( April 1 , 1866 -- August 6 , 1905 ) was a musician serving in the United States Army during the Spanish-- American War who received the Medal of Honor for bravery .
Helmuth Hufenbach ( 27 February 1908 -- 27 March 1945 ) was a highly decorated Generalmajor in the Wehrmacht during World War II , and one of only 882 recipients of the Knight 's Cross of the Iron Cross with Oak Leaves .
Johann Nepomuk von Nostitz - Rieneck ( 24 March 1768 -- 22 October 1840 ) commanded a cavalry division in the army of the Austrian Empire during the Napoleonic Wars .
The Finnish Army consisted of 9 field divisions , 4 brigades and a number of small independent battalions and companies at the beginning of the Winter War in 1939 .
Willi Reschke ( born 3 February 1922 ) is a German former Luftwaffe ace and recipient of the Knight 's Cross of the Iron Cross ( German : Ritterkreuz des Eisernen Kreuzes ) during World War II , credited with 26 aerial victories in 70 missions .
Ioannis Trikoupis ( 1750 in Messolonghi -- 30 July 1824 , in Messolonghi ) was a Greek politician of the Greek War of Independence .
Gerd A. Wilhelm Meentzen ( 19 March 1915 -- 8 May 2001 ) was a Kapitänleutnant with the Kriegsmarine during World War II and later a Vizeadmiral with the Bundesmarine .
Konstantinos Davakis ( Greek : Κωνσταντίνος Δαβάκης , 1897 -- 21 January 1943 ) was a Greek military officer in World War II . He organized the Greek defensive lines during the Battle of Pindus that led to Italian defeat in the first stage of the Greco - Italian War of 1940 .
Charles A. Taggart ( January 17 , 1843 - April 10 , 1938 ) was a Union Army soldier in the American Civil War who received the U.S. military 's highest decoration , the Medal of Honor .
Wilhelm Ambrosius ( 14 June 1903 in Tuchel , West Prussia -- 29 September 1955 ) was a German U - boat officer in World War II and recipient of the German Cross in Gold ( German : Deutsches Kreuz in Gold ) .
Rear Admiral Charles Edgar Clark ( August 10 , 1843 -- October 1 , 1922 ) was an officer in the United States Navy during the American Civil War and the Spanish-- American War .
Günther Josten ( 7 November 1921 -- 7 July 2004 ) was a German Luftwaffe military aviator during World War II , a fighter ace credited with 178 enemy aircraft shot down in 420 combat missions , all of which claimed over the Eastern Front .
Alexander Friedrich Adolf Heinrich von Zastrow ( 11 August 1801 -- 12 August 1875 ) was a Prussian general who served in the Austro - Prussian War and the Franco - German War .
Charles E. Morse ( May 5 , 1841 -- August 31 , 1920 ) was an American Civil War soldier who received the Medal of Honor for his actions during The Battle of the Wilderness in that war .
Jean de Vienne ( 1341 -- 25 September 1396 ) was a French knight , general and Admiral of France during the Hundred Years ' War .
SS American Victory is a Victory ship which saw brief service in the Pacific Theater of Operations during the waning months of World War II , Korea from 1951 - 1954 , and Vietnam from 1967 - 1969 .
Michael von Kienmayer ( January 17 , 1756 , Vienna -- October 28 , 1828 ) was an Austrian general who was active during the Napoleonic Wars .
Considered one of the most advanced weapon designs of World War II , the FG 42 influenced post - war small arms development , and most of its design was copied by the US Army when they developed the M60 machine gun .
Karl Friedrich von dem Knesebeck ( 5 May 1768 - - 12 January 1848 ) was a Prussian field marshal and military adviser in the Napoleonic Wars .
John Jackson Dickison ( March 27 , 1816 -- August 20 , 1902 ) was an officer in the Confederate States Army during the American Civil War .
Helmut Thumm ( 25 August 1895 -- 13 July 1977 ) was a German general of infantry , serving during World War II . Born in Ravensburg , Thumm entered service in World War I on August 8 , 1914 , and earned his commission as a Leutnant on August 2 , 1915 in the 125th Infantry Regiment .
Ernst Freiherr von Althaus ( 19 March 1890 -- 29 November 1946 ) was a German flying ace in World War I , credited with nine confirmed aerial victories , as well as eight unconfirmed ones .
William McKnight ( May 3 , 1842 -- November 4 , 1914 ) was a United States Navy sailor and a recipient of America 's highest military decoration -- the Medal of Honor -- for his actions in the American Civil War .
Oberleutnant Eduard Ritter von Dostler ( 3 February 1892 - 21 August 1917 ) , Pour le Mérite , Royal House Order of Hohenzollern , Military Order of Max Joseph , Iron Cross , was a German World War I fighter ace credited with 26 victories .
The 23rd ( Northumbrian ) Division was a motorised infantry division of the British Army that saw active service in World War II in France in 1940 , later being disbanded .
Dandridge McRae ( October 10 , 1829 -- April 23 , 1899 ) was an American lawyer , court official , and Inspector General of Arkansas State Troops , as well as a brigadier general in the Confederate States Army during the American Civil War .
Antonios Kriezis ( Greek : Αντώνιος Κριεζής ) ( 1796 - -1865 ) was a captain of the Greek navy during the Greek War of Independence and a Prime Minister of Greece from 1849 to 1854 .
William Thompson Lusk ( May 23 , 1838 -- June 12 , 1897 ) was an American obstetrician and a soldier who rose to the rank of Assistant Adjutant - General in the United States Volunteers during the first three years of the American Civil War .
English translations of poems by Stramm were published by Patrick Bridgwater ( August Stramm , 22 Poems,1969 ) and Jeremy Adler ( Tim Cross , The Lost Voices of World War I,1988 ) .
John Tweedale ( June 10 , 1841 -- December 21 , 1920 ) was a Union Army soldier during the American Civil War and a recipient of America 's highest military decoration the Medal of Honor for his actions at the Battle of Stones River .
Earle B. Hall ( 1919 - -1941 ) was a United States Navy sailor killed in action during World War II who received a posthumous Air Medal .
William Archibald Kenneth Fraser , CB , CBE , DSO and Bar , MVO , MC ( 1886 - -1969 ) was an officer in the British Indian Army during World War I and World War II .
Siegfried Gerstner ( 16 November 1916 -- 11 January 2013 ) was a Major in the Fallschirmjäger during World War II and an Oberst in the Bundeswehr .
Ludwig Kepplinger ( 31 December 1911 -- 26 August 1944 ) was a Sturmbannführer ( Major ) , in the Waffen - SS during World War II who was awarded the Knight 's Cross of the Iron Cross .
Valentín González González ( November 4 , 1904 -- October 20 , 1983 ) was a Republican military commander during the Spanish Civil War .
Roger Trinquier ( 20 March 1908 -- 11 January 1986 ) was a French Army officer during World War II , the First Indochina War and the Algerian War , serving mainly in airborne and special forces units .
Gerd Suhren ( 16 May 1914 , in Tafaigata , Samoa -- 6 May 1991 in Bonn ) , was a German U - boat engineer ( Ingenieur - Ing . ) in World War II and older brother of Fregattenkapitän and Knight 's Cross of the Iron Cross with Oak Leaves and Swords recipient Reinhard Suhren .
Major General John H. Church ( June 28 , 1892 -- November 3 , 1953 ) was a U.S. Army officer who fought in World War I , World War II and in the Korean War .
Otto Gieseke ( 24 March 1891 -- 21 July 1958 ) was a Brigadeführer ( Brigadier General ) and Generalmajor of Polizei in the Waffen SS during World War II who was awarded the Knight 's Cross of the Iron Cross .
Hauptmann Diether Lukesch ( born 15 July 1918 , in Hadersdorf - Weidlingau , Penzing , Wien - died 28 February 2004 ) was World War II Luftwaffe bomber pilot .
Charles Leonard 's brother , William N. Leonard , was a World War II flying ace .
Oskar Freiherr von Boenigk ( 25 August 1893 -- 30 January 1946 ) was a German Generalmajor , he began his military career during World War I as a fighter ace credited with 26 victories .
General Sir William John Codrington GCB ( 1804 -- 6 August 1884 ) was a British general and politician who served in the Crimean War .
George Bates Nichols Tower ( 1834 -- 1889 ) was an American civil and mechanical engineer and Union naval officer during the American Civil War .
Albert Oesterlin ( 14 January 1903 -- 23 January 1944 ) was a Korvettenkapitän of the Reserves with the Kriegsmarine during World War II and a recipient of the Knight 's Cross of the Iron Cross .
Günther Straehler - Pohl ( 29 July 1917 -- 31 July 1980 ) was a highly decorated Hauptmann in the Fallschirmjäger during World War II and a Oberst in the Bundeswehr .

Lieutenant General Lâm Quang Thi ( born 1932 ) was a senior military officer in the Army of the Republic of Vietnam during the Vietnam War .
Odon Guitar ( August 31 , 1825 -- March 13 , 1908 ) was a general in the Union Missouri State Militia during the American Civil War .
Shelton B. Sutton , Jr. ( 1919 - -1942 ) , was a United States Navy officer killed in action during World War II for whom two U.S. Navy ships were named .
Ne Myo Sithu ( Burmese : နေမျိုးစည်သူ , pronounced : ( nè mjó sìθù ) ) was the overall commander of Burmese military forces in the first half of the Sino - Burmese War ( 1765 - -1769 ) .
No . 94 Squadron RAF was a unit of the Royal Air Force that served during World War I & World War II . The squadron has been formed a total of four times .
Paul Grenier ( 29 January 1768 -- 17 April 1827 ) joined the French royal army and rapidly rose to general officer rank during the French Revolutionary Wars .
William J. Archinal ( June 3 , 1840 -- May 10 , 1919 ) was an American Civil War Union Army soldier who received the Medal of Honor for his actions at the Battle of Vicksburg .
Hermann - Friedrich Joppien ( 19 July 1912 -- 25 August 1941 ) was a German Luftwaffe military aviator during World War II , a fighter ace credited with 70 enemy aircraft shot down in roughly 270 combat missions .
Conrad Homan ( February 27 , 1840 -- January 30 , 1922 ) was a volunteer soldier in the Union Army during the American Civil War .
Rudolf Witzig ( 14 August 1916 in Röhlinghausen , Wanne - Eickel -- 3 October 2001 in Oberschleißheim ) was a German Fallschirmjäger during World War II and Oberst in the Bundeswehr .
William Andrew Quarles ( July 4 , 1825 -- December 28 , 1893 ) was a Tennessee lawyer , politician , railroad executive , and a general in the Confederate States Army during the American Civil War .
Heinz Wernicke ( 17 October 1920 -- 27 December 1944 ) was a German World War II fighter ace and was credited with 117 aerial victories -- that is , 117 aerial combat encounters resulting in the destruction of the enemy aircraft .
HD 218061 is a class K4III ( orange giant ) star in the constellation Aquarius .
NGC 5247 is a face - on unbarred spiral galaxy located some 60 million light years away in the constellation Virgo .
83 Aquarii ( abbreviated 83 Aqr ) is a binary star system in the equatorial constellation of Aquarius .
47 Ursae Majoris b ( abbreviated 47 Uma b ) , also named Taphao Thong ( Thai : ตะเภาทอง , rtgs : Taphaothong , pronounced ( tā.pʰāw.tʰɔ̄ːŋ ) ) , is an extrasolar planet approximately 46 light - years from Earth in the constellation of Ursa Major .
HD 75289 is a 6th magnitude star in the constellation of Vela .
Eta Delphini ( η Del , η Delphini ) is a star in the constellation Delphinus .
19 Arietis ( abbreviated 19 Ari ) is a star in the northern constellation of Aries .
Nicknamed the Spare - tyre nebula , IC 5148 is a planetary nebula located around 1 degree west of Lambda Gruis in the constellation of Grus ( The Crane ) .
NSV 1436 , listed in the New Catalogue of Suspected Variable Stars ( NSV ) , is a cataclysmic variable star in the constellation Perseus .
HD 142415 is a 7th magnitude yellow main - sequence star 113 light years from Earth in the southern constellation Norma .
HD 147506 is a magnitude 8.7 F8 dwarf star that is somewhat larger and hotter than our sun . The star is approximately 370 light years from Earth and is positioned near the keystone of Hercules .
HD 164604 is a K dwarf star in the Sagittarius constellation .
Winnecke 4 ( also known as Messier 40 or WNC 4 ) is a double star in the constellation Ursa Major .
Tau Cygni ( τ Cyg ) is a binary star system in the constellation Cygnus , approximately 69 light years away from Earth .
IC 2560 is a spiral galaxy lying over 110 million light - years away from Earth in the constellation of Antlia .
Gamma Phoenicis is a star system in the constellation Phoenix .
Zeta Ophiuchi ( ζ Oph , ζ Ophiuchi ) is a star located in the constellation of Ophiuchus .
HD 142022 is a binary star system located in the southernmost constellation of Octans located at a distance of 117 ly .
35 Pegasi ( 35 Peg ) is a star in the constellation Pegasus .
44 Aquarii ( abbreviated 44 Aqr ) is a star in the equatorial constellation of Aquarius .
HD 181342 is a K - type star approximately 361 light years away in the constellation Sagittarius .
Q Scorpii ( Q Sco ) is an orange giant star in the constellation Scorpius .
NGC 2552 is a Magellanic spiral galaxy located some 22 million light years away in the faint northern constellation of Lynx .
HD 96566 ( z1 Carinae , z1 Car ) is a star in the constellation Carina .
HD 88809 is a star in a double star system in the constellation Antlia .
Palomar 12 is a globular cluster in the constellation Capricornus that belongs to the halo of the Milky Way Galaxy .
3C 249.1 is a Seyfert galaxy located in the constellation Draco .
Gliese 832 c ( also known as Gl 832 c or GJ 832 c ) is an extrasolar planet located approximately 16 light - years away in the constellation of Grus , orbiting the star Gliese 832 , a red dwarf .
Messier 65 ( also known as NGC 3623 ) is an intermediate spiral galaxy about 35 million light - years away in the constellation Leo .
Mu Ceti ( μ Ceti ) is a binary system located in the constellation Cetus .
20 Cancri ( 20 Cnc , d1 Cancri , d1 Cnc ) is a star in the constellation Cancer .
HD 173936 is a 6th magnitude star in the constellation Lyra , approximately 1200 light years away from Earth .
Zeta Gruis ( ζ Gru ) is a star in the constellation Grus .
GRB 080916C is a gamma - ray burst ( GRB ) that was recorded on September 16 , 2008 in the Carina constellation and detected by NASA 's Fermi Gamma - ray Space Telescope .
HD 172051 ( 86 G. Sagittarii ) is a main sequence star in the constellation Sagittarius .
28 Cancri ( 28 Cnc , CX Cancri , CX Cnc ) is a star in the constellation Cancer .
ADS 48 is a multiple star system in the constellation of Andromeda consisting of 7 stars .
Chi Centauri ( χ Cen , χ Centauri ) is a star in the constellation Centaurus .
Delta Leporis ( δ Lep ) is a class K1IV ( orange subgiant ) star in the constellation Lepus .
HD 45364 b is an extrasolar planet located approximately 107 light years away in the constellation of Canis Major , orbiting the 8th magnitude G - type main sequence star HD 45364 .
WISE 1405 + 5534 ( full designation WISEPC J140518.40 + 553421.4 ) is a brown dwarf of spectral class Y0 ( pec ? ) , located in constellation Ursa Major at approximately 25.3 light - years from Earth .
HD 64440 , also known as a Puppis , is a spectroscopic binary star in the constellation Puppis .
Mu Boötis ( μ Boo , μ Boötis ) is a triple star system in the constellation Boötes .
Pi Piscium ( Pi Psc , π Piscium , π Psc ) is a star approximately 110 light years away from Earth , in the constellation Pisces .
XO-5 is a yellow dwarf main sequence star located approximately 850 light - years away from Earth in the Lynx constellation .
HD 172555 is a white - hot A5V star located relatively close by , 95 light years from Earth in the direction of the constellation Pavo .
Omicron Capricorni ( ο Cap , ο Capricorni ) is a binary star in the constellation Capricornus .
Omicron Virginis ( ο Vir , ο Virginis ) is a star in the constellation Virgo .
HR 7703 ( Gliese 783 , 279 G. Sagittarii ) is a binary star system in the constellation of Sagittarius .
NGC 6925 is a barred spiral galaxy in the constellation Microscopium of apparent magnitude 11.3 which is lens - shaped as it lies almost edge on to observers on Earth .
The M109 Group ( also known as the NGC 3992 Group or Ursa Major cloud ) is a group of galaxies about 55 million light - years away in the constellation Ursa Major .
HD 137058 is a star in the constellation Lupus .
NGC 21 ( also known as NGC 29 ) is a spiral galaxy in the Andromeda constellation .
SWEEPS-04 is an extrasolar planet orbiting the star SWEEPS J175853.92−291120.6 in the constellation Sagittarius approximately 22000 light years away ( based on a distance modulus of 14.1 ) from the Solar System .
GZ Velorum ( GZ Vel ) is a star in the constellation Vela .
56 Sagittarii ( 56 Sgr ) is a star in the constellation Sagittarius .
NGC 4449 ( also known as Caldwell 21 ) is an irregular galaxy in the constellation Canes Venatici .
1 Aurigae is the original name for a star now in the constellation Perseus .
IC 3418 is a galaxy that is most well noted for its tidal tail , which formed after the galaxy collided with the Virgo Supercluster some 54 million light years from Earth .
HD 9446 is a star located about 171 light - years away in the constellation of Triangulum .
31 Comae Berenices ( 31 Com ) is a yellow giant star in the constellation Coma Berenices .
109 Tauri ( 109 Tau ) is a yellow giant star in the constellation Taurus .
HD 39225 , also known as HR 2028 , is a variable star in the constellation Auriga .
HD 149837 is a binary star in the southern constellation of Ara .
HD 102776 , also known by its Bayer designation j Centauri ( j Cen ) , is a star in the constellation Centaurus .
Phi Piscium ( Phi Psc , φ Piscium , φ Psc ) is a binary star system approximately 380 light years away in the constellation Pisces .
30 Piscium ( 30 Psc ) is a star in the constellation Pisces .
Gamma Piscium ( Gamma Psc , γ Piscium , γ Psc ) is a star approximately 138 light years away from Earth , in the zodiac constellation of Pisces .
HIP 14810 is a G - type main - sequence star located approximately 170 light - years away in the constellation of Aries .
HD 171238 b is an extrasolar planet which orbits the G - type main sequence star HD 171238 , located approximately 164 light years away in the constellation Sagittarius .
IC 2177 is a region of nebulosity that lies along the border between the constellations Monoceros and Canis Major .
HD 152082 is an A - type shell star in the southern constellation of Ara .
Kappa2 Coronae Australis ( K2 CrA ) , is a star located in the constellation Corona Australis .
Theta Delphini ( θ Del , θ Delphini ) is a star in the constellation Delphinus .
HD 4308 is a 6th magnitude star located approximately 72 light years away in the southern constellation of Tucana .
HD 180450 is a 6th magnitude star in the constellation Lyra , approximately 1,400 light years away from Earth .
HD 162020 is an orange dwarf star in Scorpius constellation with a brown dwarf companion .
Wolf 424 is a binary star system comprising two red dwarf stars at a distance of approximately 14.2 light years from the Sun . It is located in the constellation Virgo , between the stars ε Virginis and ο Virginis .
HAT - P-12b is an extrasolar planet approximately 465 light years away from Earth , orbiting the 13th magnitude K - type star HAT - P-12 , which is located in Canes Venatici constellation .
Upsilon Piscium ( Upsilon Psc , υ Piscium , υ Psc ) is a star approximately 310 light years away from Earth , in the constellation Pisces .
Rho Capricorni ( ρ Cap , ρ Capricorni ) is a binary star in the constellation Capricornus .
NGC 5930 is a starburst galaxy in the constellation Boötes that is interacting with the nearby Seyfert galaxy NGC 5929 .
NGC 3184 is a spiral galaxy approximately 40 million light - years away in the constellation Ursa Major .
15 Aquarii ( abbreviated 15 Aqr ) is a star in the constellation Aquarius .
NGC 5291 is a system of interacting galaxies in the constellation Centaurus .
Upsilon Herculis ( υ Her ) is a star in the constellation Hercules .
HD 52265 b is a gas giant exoplanet located approximately 92 light - years away in the constellation of Monoceros , orbiting the star HD 52265 .
Iota Trianguli Australis ( ι TrA , ι Trianguli Australis ) is a triple star system in the constellation Triangulum Australe .
NGC 2903 is a field barred spiral galaxy about 30 million light - years away in the constellation Leo .
3C 390.3 is a broad - line radio galaxy located in the constellation Draco .
51 Ophiuchi ( 51 Oph ) is a star located approximately 410 light years away in the constellation Ophiuchus , northwest of the center of the Milky Way .
49 Aquarii ( abbreviated 49 Aqr ) is a star in the constellation of Aquarius .
24 Cephei ( 24 Cep ) is a star in the constellation Cepheus .
RS Ophiuchi ( RS Oph ) is a recurrent nova system approximately 5,000 light - years away in the constellation Ophiuchus .
Gliese 179 b ( also known as HIP 22627 b ) is an extrasolar planet which orbits the M - type main sequence star Gliese 179 , located approximately 40 light years away in the constellation Orion .
HD 50554 is a star approximately 98 light - years ( 30 pc ) away in the constellation Gemini .

Hettiwatte Hemantha Devapriya ( born Galle , 12 April 1958 ) is a former cricketer who played first - class cricket for Sri Lanka .
Pál Závada ( 1954 in Tótkomlós ( Slovenský Komlóš ) , Hungary ) is the Hungarian writer , member of Slovak minority in Hungary , writing in Hungarian .
Richard Langton Baker ( May 14 , 1870 in Strathroy , Ontario , Canada -- January 3 , 1951 ) was a Canadian politician .
Slim Smith ( born Keith Smith , 1948 , Kingston , Jamaica , died 1973 ) was a ska , rocksteady and reggae singer .
Dan Fraser ( born c. 1963 in Castor , Alberta ) is the President of Nettwerk Management and one of 4 co - founders of the Nettwerk Music Group , based in Vancouver , British Columbia , Canada .
Gonzalo Abad Grijalva ( August 1 , 1910 - June 13 , 2009 ) was an Ecuadorian educator who served as Ecuador 's Minister of Education and was a delegate of UNESCO .
Lola Hoffmann ( Helena Jacoby ) ( March 19 , 1904 in Riga , Latvia -- April 30 , 1988 in Santiago , Chile ) was a physiologist and psychiatrist .
Annette Andre ( born 24 June 1939 in Sydney , Australia ) is an actress best known for her work on British television throughout the 1960s and 1970s .
Bernabe Buscayno , also called Kumander Dante , is the founder of the New People 's Army , the military wing of the Communist Party of the Philippines .
Sos Sargsyan was born in Stepanavan in northern Armenia , at the time part of the Soviet Union .
Selçuk Çebi ( born June 3 , 1982 in Araklı , Trabzon Province , Turkey ) is a Turkish wrestler .
Carl Richard Nyberg ( May 28 , 1858 , -- 1939 ) was the founder of Max Sieverts Lödlampfabrik , then one of the largest industries in Sundbyberg , Sweden .
Kjell Storvik ( born 20 November 1930 ) is a Norwegian economist and former Governor of the Central Bank of Norway .
Bruno Simma ( born March 29 , 1941 in Quierschied , Germany ) , is a German jurist who served as a judge on the International Court of Justice from 2003 until 2012 .
Gernot Kellermayr ( born April 5 , 1966 ) is a retired decathlete from Austria .
Alla Lysenko ( born 31 May 1969 ) is a Paralympic rower for Ukraine .
A. Tamilarasi ( born April 5 , 1976 ) is the former Minister for Adi - Dravidar and Tribal Welfare in Tamil Nadu state of India .
Lieutenant General Imran Ullah Khan ( born 3 December 1932 ) is a retired Pakistan Army general .
Captain Mohiuddin Jahangir ( Bengali : মহিউদ্দীন জাহাঙ্গীর ) was an officer in the Bangladesh Army during the 1971 Liberation War .
Piotr Świst ( born June 20 , 1968 in Poland ) is a Polish speedway rider who won Individual U-21 Polish Championship three times .
Lokua Kanza ( born April 1958 ) is a singer - songwriter from the Democratic Republic of the Congo .
Tarja Turunen was born in the small village of Puhos , near Kitee , Finland .
Nicolás Ardito Barletta Vallarino ( born August 21 , 1938 , in Aguadulce , in the province of Coclé ) was President of Panama from October 11 , 1984 , to September 28 , 1985 .

François Halard was born in 1961 in France but now spends time between homes in New York and France .
Ewelina Lukaszewska ( born Ewelina Malgorzata Lukaszewska in 1987 ) is a Polish film director , model and actress , who appeared in the films Haunted Poland , Aleksandr 's Price and Who 's There ? .
Beny Parnes is a Brazilian economist , former Director for International Affairs of the Central Bank of Brazil .
Sontaya Keawbundit ( Thai : สนธยา แก้วบัณฑิต ; rtgs : Sonthaya Kaeobandit ) is a member of the Thailand women 's national volleyball team .
François Dominique Séraphin ( 15 February 1747 -- 5 December 1800 ) was a French entertainer who developed and popularised shadow plays in France .
Manuel Ramil ( born March 8 , 1978 in Ares , A Coruña , Spain ) was the keyboardist for the Power metal band WarCry .
Jürgen Marcus ( born Jürgen Beumer , 6 June 1948 in Herne , North Rhine - Westphalia ) is a German schlager singer who was most successful during the 1970s , when he had 14 chart hits in Germany .
Jojo Cobbinah ( born 25 May 1948 in Bogoso North of Tarkwa , Western Region ) is a Ghanaian author living in Accra , Ghana .
Edward Kidson ( 12 March 1882 - -12 June 1939 ) was a New Zealand meteorologist and scientific administrator .
John Flint Cahan ( February 1 , 1889 -- November 8 , 1928 ) was an engineer and political figure in Nova Scotia , Canada .
Thomas Inkerman Thomson ( March 21 , 1855 -- February 9 , 1919 ) was a hardware merchant and political figure in Ontario , Canada .
Henri Guissou was senator from Côte d'Ivoire from 1947 to 1948 , and member for French Upper Volta to the National Assembly of France from 1949 to 1959 , Guissou also served in the French Senate from 1947 - 1948 .
Adam Tzanetopoulos ( Greek : Αδάμ Τζανετόπουλος ) ( born 10 February 1995 in Volos , Greece ) is a Greek footballer who plays for AEK Athens in the Super League as a centre back .
William Laird Whitby ( 30 January 1838 -- 12 October 1922 ) was a notable New Zealand master mariner and ship owner .
Jarrod McCracken ( born 27 March 1970 ) is a New Zealand former rugby league footballer of the 1990s .
Thomas Stachewicz ( 5 December 1965 ) is a former freestyle and backstroke swimmer , who represented Australia at three Summer Olympics .
Eric Swinkels ( born March 30 , 1949 , Best , Netherlands ) is a Dutch sports shooter and Olympic medalist .
George Beetham , F.R.G.S. , M.H.R. ( 1840 -- 20 August 1915 ) , known to Māori as Hori Pitama , was a New Zealand politician and alpinist .
Lilia Dizon ( real name Claire Strauss ; born 1928 in Pampanga , Philippines ) is a postwar Filipina actress .
Pascal Atuma ( born February 22 , 1972 in Umuahia , Abia State , Nigeria ) is a Nigerian actor , screenwriter , director and producer .
Rolf Aldag ( born 25 August 1968 in Beckum , Germany ) is a former professional road bicycle racer who rode for Team Telekom from 1993 to 2005 .
Imelda Fransisca ( born 24 September 1982 , in Bogor , West Java ) was the first Miss Indonesia in 2005 .
Viola Haqi ( born 8 February 1981 in Amsterdam , Netherlands ) is a Dutch fashion model of mixed Dutch and Iraqi heritage .
Jonas Alströmer ( 7 January 1685 -- 2 June 1761 ) was a pioneer of agriculture and industry in Sweden .
Ismael Pérez Pazmiño ( Machala , June 30 , 1876 - Los Angeles , November 1 , 1944 ) was founder of El Universo newspaper of Guayaquil , Ecuador , and former senator of El Oro province .
Pavel Hoftych ( born 9 May 1967 ) is a Czech football manager and former player , who currently manages Czech Republic U19 .
Laura Lima ( born 1971 in Minas Gerais , Brazil ) is an artist , winner of the Bonnefanten Award 2014 , 50,000 Euros and solo exhibition at Bonnefantenmuseum , autumn 2014 .
Johan Wanloo ( born July 16 , 1972 , in Gothenburg , Sweden ) is a comic book creator known for his many comic strips published in newspapers , tabloids , and magazines including the Swedish version of MAD Magazine .
Ioan D. Caragiani ( February 11 , 1841 , Avdella , Greece -- January 13 , 1921 , Iaşi , Romania ) was a Romanian folklorist and translator .
Berit Hynne is a Norwegian handball player who played for the club Levanger HK and for the Norway women 's national handball team .
Sabrina Ferilli ( born 28 June 1964 in Rome , Italy ) is an Italian theater and movie actress .
Achour Fenni ( Arabic : عاشور فني ) is an Algerian poet , translator and academician , who has participated in several scientific , cultural and literary meetings in Algeria , North Africa , Europe , North America and South America .
Patrick Majewski ( born December 23 , 1979 in Radom , Poland ) is a Polish professional boxer who is the reigning NABF Middleweight professional boxing champion .
Rupert Gerritsen was born in Geraldton , Western Australia in 1953 , of Dutch parents .
Dejan Tofčević ( Serbian Cyrillic - Дејан Тофчевић ) ( born on 10 June 1971 in Užice , Serbia , but spent his childhood in Bajina Bašta , Serbia ) is a writer of satirical short forms such as aphorisms , short stories and poetry .
Rolf Ellmer ( born 3 December 1960 ) , also known by the names Jam El Mar and Trancy Spacer , is a classically trained musician and composer ( concert - guitarist ) and has become one of Germany 's most known house and trance producers .
Inaros I of Athribis ( fl . c. 665 BC ) was an ancient Egyptian prince who rebelled against the Assyrians during their short - lived occupation of Egypt .
Omar Ahmed ( born December 29 , 1979 ) is an amateur boxer from Kenya , who is also known as Ahmed Rajab Omari .
Dowager Sultana Khnata bent Bakkar ( خناتة بنت بكار ) , ( died 1754 ) , was de facto ruler of Morocco from 1727 to ca .
Rena Kyriakou ( 25 February 1917 -- August 1994 ) was a pianist and composer born in Herakleion , Crete , Greece .
Brett Gosper ( born 21 June 1959 in Melbourne , Australia ) is CEO of World Rugby and a former advertising executive and rugby union player .
Haluk Akakçe ( born 1970 in Turkey ) is a contemporary artist living and working in New York and Istanbul whose work explores the intersections between society and technology through video animations , wall paintings and sound installations .
James Kilbane was the runner up in Ireland 's national talent television show You 're A Star in 2004 .
Thomas Hammarberg ( born 2 January 1942 in Örnsköldsvik , Sweden ) is a Swedish diplomat and human rights defender .
Aleksis Kivi was born in Nurmijärvi , Grand Duchy of Finland , into a tailor 's family .
Werner Asam ( born October 17 , 1944 , in Mallersdorf , Germany ) is a German television actor , director , and writer .

Samuel Sam Bockarie widely known as Mosquito ( 2 October 1964 − 5 May 2003 ) was a leading member of the Revolutionary United Front ( RUF ) in Sierra Leone .
Elizabeth Ann Louisa Mackay ( née Budge , 23 January 1843 -- 24 August 1908 ) was a New Zealand farmer , feminist , community leader and inventor .

Saint Romulus of Fiesole ( Italian : San Romolo ) is venerated as the patron saint of Fiesole , Italy .

Vicente Boluda Fos ( born 31 March 1955 in Valencia , Spain ) is the president of Aguas de Valencia and former president of Spanish sports club Real Madrid .
Flávio Viana da Silva ( born 1984 in Brazil ) is a Brazilian footballer who also known by the Spanish nickname Flaviño most recently played for UES .
Manuel Antonio Bonilla Nava ( October 15 , 1806 , Cartago , Costa Rica - 1880 ) was a Costa Rican politician .
He was born in L’Acadie , Lower Canada , the son of Louis Molleur and Marie - Angèle Mailloux , and was educated there .
Simeon Datumanong ( born June 17 , 1935 ) is a Filipino - Muslim politician who held different government positions and currently serves as a Representative of the lone district of Maguindanao in the House of Representatives of the Philippines .
Bernardo Lorenziti ( c. 1764- after 1813 ) and his brother Antonio Lorenziti ( Aix , c. 1740 - 1789 ) were two Italian musicians and composers , active mainly in France .
Olivier Zarrouati ( born April 16 , 1958 , Toulon , France ) is a French engineer and business man .
Jason Cask ( born 7 February 1971 ) is the Senior Pastor of C7 Church and a former professional tennis player from Australia .

Jacob Shibley ( October 31 , 1778 -- November 11 , 1869 ) was a gentleman farmer and political figure in Lower Canada .
Johann Carl Enslen , a German landscape painter , who was born in 1769 and died in 1849 , was well known in his time for his panoramas , which were the first introduced into Germany .
Teodor Aaron ( or Aron ) ( Cikendál , Transylvania ( now Ţichindeal , Romania ) , 1803 - February 6 , 1867 ) was a Romanian Greek Catholic clergyman and historian .
John Bell Thomson ( 1835?--1896 ) was a notable New Zealand police officer and detective .

Hadi Hobeich ( born July 1 , 1974 in Al Qoubaiyat ) , is a Lebanese politician , lawmaker and MP of the Akkar district in North Lebanon since 2005 .

Kristian Ghedina ( Italian pronunciation : ( ˈkristjan ɡeˈdina ) ; born 20 November 1969 ) is a former World Cup alpine ski racer from Italy .

Takashi Kashiwada ( 柏田 貴史 , born May 14 , 1971 in Yatsushiro , Kumamoto , Japan ) is a retired Japanese professional baseball player .

Francis Brunn ( 15 November 1922 in Aschaffenburg , Germany -- 28 May 2004 in Frankfurt am Main , Germany ) was a German juggler .
Palghat Parameswara Bhagavathar ( 1815 - 1892 ) was a Carnatic music composer and musician born in Nurani , Kerala , India .

Deepak Bhusal ( born 8 March 1990 ) is a footballer from Nepal .

Marijan Kanjer ( born 1 October 1973 in Rijeka ) is a freestyle swimmer from Croatia , who competed in two consecutive Summer Olympics for his native country , starting in 1996 .
Lincoln Arthur Winstone Efford ( 4 August 1907 - -24 April 1962 ) was a New Zealand pacifist , social reformer and adult educationalist .
Francis Mander ( 1849 - -1942 ) was an Independent Conservative then from 1909 a Reform Party member of parliament in New Zealand .
Eli Landsem ( born 22 March 1962 ) is a Norwegian former international footballer who was the coach of the Norway women 's national football team between 2009 and 2012 .
Tim Mahon is a New Zealand musician who played in The Plague , The Whizz Kids and Blam Blam Blam .
Marco Martins ( born 1972 in Lisbon , Portugal ) is a Portuguese film director , best known for his 2005 film Alice , which premiered at Cannes and won the Best Picture Award at the Directors ' Fortnight .
Irene Clarin ( born 16 May 1955 in Munich , Germany ) is a German television and theatre actress .
Kweku Anno is a Ghanaian engineer and inventor who has had a major impact on reducing organic waste pollution in Ghana .
Esben Esther Pirelli Benestad ( born 3 May 1949 ) is a Norwegian physician and sexologist who is also known as one of Norway 's most prominent trans people .
Roberto Rivas ( born July 17 , 1941 -- died in 1972 ) was a football player from El Salvador .

Carmel Robichaud is a politician and retired teacher in New Brunswick , Canada .

Cecil E. Jackson ( 1872 - -1956 ) was the 17th mayor of the city of Windsor , Ontario , Canada who served from 1927 to 1930 .

Frank Sherring ( August 7 , 1914 -- September 23 , 2007 ) was an auto dealer and politician in Lethbridge , Alberta , Canada .
Derek Chadwick ( born 21 March 1941 ) is a former Australian sportsman , playing both first class cricket with Western Australia and Australian rules football for East Perth in the Western Australian Football League ( WAFL ) .
Lyne Poirier ( born June 16 , 1968 in Port - Cartier , Quebec ) is a retired judoka from Canada , who won the bronze medal in the women 's extra - lightweight ( -- 48 kg ) competition at the 1987 Pan American Games .

Michael Skapinker ( born 1955 in South Africa ) is a South African journalist and an Associate Editor of the Financial Times and a columnist .

Jeferey Muralt is a paralympic athlete from New Zealand competing mainly in category T53 track events .

Ana Pešikan ( Serbian : Ана Пешикан ; born Feketić , PR Serbia , FPR Yugoslavia ) is a Serbian politician who served as Minister of Science and Technology in the Government of Serbia .
Juma Ikangaa ( born July 19 , 1957 in Dodoma ) is a marathon runner from Tanzania , a sentimental favorite in Boston after finishing second three years in a row at the Boston Marathon from 1988 - 1990 .
María Ángeles Ferrer Forés is a Spanish music education pedagogue and musicologist , awarded the Premio Acción Magistral ( Master Action Prize ) 2010 by UNESCO , as best professor of Spain .
Nelson Pedetti ( born February 7 , 1954 in Montevideo , Uruguay ) is a former Uruguayan footballer currently played for clubs of Chile ( Cobreloa , Cobresal and Deportes Iquique ) .
James Mitchell Mutter ( April 8 , 1845 -- May 31 , 1920 ) was a Scottish - born soldier , farmer and political figure in British Columbia , Canada .
Francesc Cambó was born in Verges in the comarca of Baix Empordà , Catalonia , Spain .
Richard Kruse ( born 30 July 1983 in London , United Kingdom ) is a British fencer who specialises in the foil discipline .
Adriano Neves Pereira ( born 24 May 1979 in Capão da Canoa , Rio Grande do Sul , Brazil ) , commonly known as Adriano Chuva , is a Brazilian footballer who currently plays for Atlético Sorocaba , primarily as a striker .
Peter Heszler 's PhD is from the University of Szeged , Hungary ( 1988 ) .
Chad Gibson ( born Sydney , Australia , 19 June 1976 ) is a Creative Director and Sports Photographer , founder of football publication LOCALFC and Creative Publishing Agency , Not Our Field , lending his professional sports experience to his creative work .
Dr. Alban was born as Alban Uzoma Nwapa into a middle - class family of 10 children in Oguta , Imo state , Nigeria .
Janina Wirth ( later surname : Weiß , born in 1966 ) is a former competitive figure skater for East Germany .
Maciej Zembaty was born May 16 , 1944 in Wadowice in southern Poland .
Denis Delestrac ( born in France , 1968 ) is an award - winning film director .

Ria Hall is a New Zealand recording artist and presenter on Maori TV 's AIA Marae DIY in 2012 - 13 .
Frederick C. Colborne ( November 14 , 1916 -- April 19 , 2006 ) D.F.C. , of Calgary , Alberta , Canada , was elected to the Legislative Assembly of Alberta in 1944 and served until 1971 .
Kristin Krohn Devold ( born 12 August 1961 in Ålesund ) is a former Minister of Defence of Norway .
Waluyo Hartono ( born September 30 , 1983 in Banyumas , Central Java ) is an Indonesian footballer , currently plays for Deltras in the Indonesia Super League as a Defender .
Lajos Drahos ( 7 March 1895 - 2 June 1983 ) was a Hungarian Communist politician , who served as Speaker of the National Assembly of Hungary between 1949 and 1951 .
Born in Saanen in Switzerland , Andreas Matti lives in the municipality of Zürich .
Kattingeri Krishna Hebbar ( 1911 - -1996 ) better known as K.K. Hebbar was a celebrated artist known for his India themed artworks .

László Göncz ( born 13 April 1960 ) is a Hungarian historian and politician in Slovenia .

Christopher Perle ( born December 17 , 1974 in Mauritius ) is a football player who is currently a Free Agent .
Enrique Krauze Kleinbort ( b. September 16 , 1947 in Mexico City ) , widely known as Enrique Krauze , is a Mexican right - wing public intellectual , historian , essayist , critic , producer , and publisher .
Neba Solo ( born 1969 ) is the stage name of Souleymane Traoré , a musician based in Mali , West Africa .
Ichirō Kōno ( Japanese : 河野一郎 ) ( June 2 , 1898 - 1965 ) was President of the Japan Association of Athletics Federations ( 1965 ) .

Anna Maria Lenngren is known as the most famed poets in the history of Sweden .
Hayden Kho , Jr. ( born May 20 , 1980 , in Manila , Philippines ) , is a Chinese - Filipino celebrity cosmetic doctor , businessman , actor and model based in Manila , Philippines .
Jørgen Kieler ( born 23 August 1919 ) , a Danish physician , is remembered primarily for his participation in resistance activities under the German occupation of Denmark in the early 1940s .

Aurora Miranda had a successful career in Brazil and the US , perhaps overshadowed by that of her sister , Carmen Miranda .

Tierno Bokar was born in Segou , Mali , in 1875 and moved to the village of Bandiagara in 1893 .
Hayley Holt ( born 3 July 1981 , Auckland ) is a New Zealand snowboarder and ballroom dancer notable for her appearances on several reality television series .
Egemen Bağış ( born 23 April 1970 ) is a Turkish politician , member of the Turkish parliament since November 2002 , and the former minister for EU Affairs and chief negotiator of Turkey in accession talks with the European Union .

Nebmaatre is the prenomen of a poorly attested ruler of the late Second Intermediate Period of Ancient Egypt .
Mikey Havoc ( born c.1970 ) , also known colloquially as Havo ( real name Michael Roberts ) is a New Zealand media personality .
Wilson Asinobi Ake ( born 21 September 1955 ) is a former member of the Senate of Nigeria who represented the Rivers West senatorial district from 2007 to 2015 .
Nancy Jo Cullen is a Canadian poet and short story writer , who won the 2010 Dayne Ogilvie Prize from the Writers ' Trust of Canada for an emerging lesbian , gay , bisexual or transgender writer .
Ivan Susloparov was born in the village of Krutikhintsy , in what is today Kumyonsky District of Kirov Oblast in northeastern European Russia .

Tomasz Brożyna ( born 19 September 1970 in Bieliny , Poland ) is a former professional road racing cyclist .

Josias Tayler ( 1787 -- January 12 , 1844 ) was a merchant , judge and political figure in Upper Canada .

Nicholas Straussler ( in Hungarian : Straussler Miklós ) ( 1891 - -1966 ) was an engineer mainly remembered for devising the flotation system used by Allied amphibious DD tanks during World War II . Born in Hungary , he developed a reputation as an innovative automotive engineer before becoming a British citizen during the interwar period .

Chris Slane ( born 1957 ) is a left wing New Zealand cartoonist .
Jim Geovedi ( born 28 June 1979 ) , is an IT security expert from Indonesia who focuses on the discovery of computer and network security vulnerabilities with a special focus on telecommunication and satellite systems .
Pierre Polinière ( 8 September 1671 , Coulonces , France -- 9 February 1734 , Coulonces , France ) was an early investigator of electricity and electrical phenomena , notably `` barometric light '' , a form of gas - discharge light , which suggested the possibility of electric lighting .
Teuvo Loman ( born 17 July 1962 in Espoo , Finland ) is a Finnish hairdresser , model , fashion designer and singer living in Helsinki .

Family Gathering in the House of Prellstein ( German : Familientag i m Hause Prellstein ) is a 1927 German silent comedy film directed by Hans Steinhoff and starring S.Z. Sakall , Erika Glässner and Sig Arno .
In - Bad the Sailor is a 1924 short comedy silent film directed by Philadelphian director , Benjamin Stoloff .
The Price of Coal is a two - part television drama written by Barry Hines and directed by Ken Loach first broadcast in 1977 .
Masquerade in Mexico is a 1945 comedy film directed by Mitchell Leisen .
The 5000 Days Project is an ongoing documentary film directed by Rick Stevenson , that has several presentations and extensions in various festivals , TV stations , and more .
Fury at Gunsight Pass is a 1956 American western film directed by Fred F. Sears .
Bodysong is a 2003 BAFTA winning documentary about human life and the human condition directed by Simon Pummell and produced by Janine Marmot .
Fear of Clowns is a 2004 horror film written and directed by Kevin Kangas .
Beijing Blues ( 神探亨特张 Shéntàn Hēngtè Zhāng literally `` Divine Detective Hunter Zhang'')is a 2012 Chinese film directed by Gao Qunshu .
Written by series co - creator Trey Parker and David Goodman , and also directed by Trey Parker , `` Cartman 's Mom Is Still a Dirty Slut '' was rated TV - MA in the United States and 12 in the United Kingdom .
El Hijo del crack ( meaning `` Son of the Star '' ) is a 1953 Argentine football drama film co - directed by Leopoldo Torre Nilsson and Leopoldo Torres Ríos and starring Armando Bo and Oscar Rovito .
Murder at Monkey Hill is 1976 Indian film written and directed by Vidhu Vinod Chopra .
The Helpers ( released in some countries as Vacancy 4 ) is a 2012 American horror film by Chris Stokes .
Information Received is a 1961 British Crime film directed by Robert Lynn and starring Sabine Sesselmann , William Sylvester and Hermione Baddeley .
Return of the 38 Gang ( Italian : Ritornano quelli della calibro 38 , also known as Gangsters ) is a 1977 Italian poliziottesco film directed by Giuseppe Vari .
The Tricky Master ( 千王之王2000 ) is a 1999 Hong Kong crime comedy gambling film directed by Wong Jing .
Nejlepší ženská mého života is a 1968 Czech comedy film directed by Martin Frič and was his final film .
Modern Pirates ( German : Moderne Piraten ) is a 1928 German silent comedy film directed by Manfred Noa and starring Jack Trevor , Marietta Millner and Sig Arno .
When Brummies Met Sindhis is a documentary film made by Pakistani documentary filmmaker , Azfar Rizvi .
The Crime of Father Amaro , sometimes The Crime of Padre Amaro , ( Spanish : El crimen del padre Amaro ) is a 2002 film directed by Carlos Carrera .
Kill Speed ( also called Fast Glass ) is a 2010 action film directed by Kim Bass , who is a commercial rated pilot .
Three Men from Texas is a 1940 American Western film directed by Lesley Selander and written by Norton S. Parker .
Akayla ( English : Lonely ) is a 1991 Bollywood film directed by Ramesh Sippy and produced by the Mushir - Riaz duo .
Sucker Money ( 1933 ) is an American Pre - Code film directed by Dorothy Davenport and Melville Shyer .
The Landlord is a 1970 film directed by Hal Ashby , based on the 1966 novel by Kristin Hunter .
Sorry for Kung Fu ( Croatian : Oprosti za kung fu ) is a 2004 Croatian drama film directed by Ognjen Sviličić .
Will They Never Come ? is a 1915 Australian film directed by Alfred Rolfe .
Interrogating the Witnesses ( German : Vernehmung der Zeugen ) is a 1987 East German drama film directed by Gunther Scholz .
Kucch To Hai ( translation : Something is there ) is a 2003 Bollywood romantic horror film directed by Anurag Basu and Anil V. Kumar , while it 's written by Rajeev Javehri .
In Just Hours is a Ugandan short drama film written and directed by Usama Mukwaya .
Fodboldpræsten is a 1951 Danish family film directed by Alice O'Fredericks .
ChaalBaaz ( English : Trickster ) is a 1989 Bollywood Comedy film directed by Pankaj Parashar .
Raju Chacha is an Indian Bollywood action film directed by Anil Devgan , released on 20 December 2000 .
Babe Comes Home ( 1927 ) is a silent film produced and distributed through First National and directed by Ted Wilde .
Back Alley Oproar is a Warner Bros. Merrie Melodies ( Blue Ribbon reissue ) animated short directed by Friz Freleng and originally released in theaters on March 27 , 1948 .
Jeene Ki Raah ( English : Way of Life ) is a 1969 Hindi , drama film , produced and directed L. V. Prasad Prasad Productions Pvt Ltd banner .
After seeing Hav Plenty at the Acapulco Black Film Festival , Tracey Edmonds and Kenneth `` Babyface '' Edmonds offered to attach their names to the film and record a new soundtrack , consequently attracting an intense amount of media attention to what was previously a small , obscure independent movie .
Crystal Voyager is a 1973 Australian surf film directed by David Elfick .
Cobra Woman is a 1944 American melodrama / adventure film of the South Seas genre , directed by Robert Siodmak .
Helmsman Holk ( German : Steuermann Holk ) is a 1920 German silent film directed by Rochus Gliese and Ludwig Wolff and starring Asta Nielsen and Paul Wegener .
The Laughing Lady is a 1946 British Technicolor musical drama film directed by Paul L. Stein and starring Anne Ziegler , Webster Booth and Francis L. Sullivan .
Twilight of Love ( Italian : La notte dell'alta marea , also known as The Night of the High Tide and Lure of Love ) is a 1977 Italian romance film written and directed by Luigi Scattini .
The Mysterious Castle in the Carpathians ( Czech : Tajemství hradu v Karpatech , literally `` The Mystery / Secret of the Castle in the Carpathians '' ) is a 1981 Czechoslovak comedy film directed by Oldřich Lipský .
Forever Mery ( Italian : Mery per sempre ) , is a 1989 Italian drama film directed by Marco Risi and released in 1989 .
Tanu Weds Manu is a 2011 Indian romantic comedy film directed by Anand L. Rai , and produced by Shailesh R Singh .
Grand Duchess Alexandra ( German : Grossfürstin Alexandra ) is a 1933 Austrian operetta film directed by Wilhelm Thiele and starring Maria Jeritza , Paul Hatrmann and Leo Slezak .
Mr. Skeffington is a 1944 American drama film directed by Vincent Sherman , based on the novel of the same name by Elizabeth von Arnim .
Héroes de Otra Patria ( in English , Heroes from Another Country , or sometimes credited as Heroes without a Cause ) is a 1998 Puerto Rican film , written and directed by Iván Dariel Ortíz .
Elegy for a Revolutionary is a 2013 short film directed and written by Paul van Zyl .
Fog Island is a 1945 American mystery - suspense film directed by Terry O. Morse .
Number 55 ( Croatian : Broj 55 ) is a 2014 Croatian war film directed by Kristijan Milić .
Rathimanmadhan is a 1977 Indian Malayalam film , directed by J. Sasikumar and produced by MA Rahman and Naseema Kabeer .
Gypsy 83 is a 2001 drama film , written and directed by Todd Stephens , about two young goths , Gypsy and Clive , who travel to New York for an annual festival celebrating their idol , Stevie Nicks .
Spooks and Spirits ( Ófeigur gengur aftur in its original Icelandic ) is a 2013 Icelandic fantasy - comedy film written and directed by Ágúst Guðmundsson .
Opera Jawa ( Requiem from Java ) is a 2006 Indonesian - Austrian musical film directed by Garin Nugroho that features traditional Javanese classical music and dance in a setting of opera that is inspired by the `` Abduction of Sita '' episode from the Ramayana .
Záhada modrého pokoje is a 1933 Czechoslovak mystery film , directed by Miroslav Cikán .
Any Mother 's Son is a 1997 television drama film directed by David Burton Morris .
Please Turn Over is a 1959 British comedy film written by Norman Hudis and directed by Gerald Thomas .
Husband Hunters is a 1927 comedy - drama silent film released by Tiffany Productions and directed by John G. Adolfi .
Laughing at Trouble is a 1936 American comedy film directed by Frank R. Strayer and written by Robert Ellis and Helen Logan .
During One Night is a 1961 British drama film directed by Sidney J. Furie and starring Don Borisenko and Susan Hampshire .
The Girl in 419 is a 1933 American Pre - Code drama film directed by Alexander Hall and George Somnes and written by Allen Rivkin , Manuel Seff and P.J. Wolfson .
Welcome to Collinwood is a 2002 American caper comedy film written and directed by Anthony and Joe Russo about a group of small - time thieves and misfits from the Collinwood neighborhood of Cleveland , Ohio , who attempt to carry out a major theft from a jeweller 's apartment safe .
Mission to Caracas or Mission spéciale à Caracas is a 1965 spy film directed by Raoul André .
Crook 's Tour is a 1941 British film directed by John Baxter featuring Charters and Caldicott .
La Bailanta ( English : The Dancing Hall ) is a 1988 Argentine musical film directed and written by Luis Rodrigo .
The Comedy Garage is a documentary by director Logan Leistikow , released in 2011 , depicting a day in the life of five rising star comedians who produce a stand up comedy show performed on a self - made stage in their garage in Burbank , California .
El extraño viaje(English : The Strange Voyage ) is a 1964 Spanish black drama film directed by Fernando Fernán Gómez .
Without Orders is a 1936 American drama film directed by Lew Landers and produced by RKO Radio Pictures who released the picture on October 23 , 1936 .
Spasms is a 1983 Canadian horror film directed by William Fruet .
The Shining Arc ( Chinese : 弧光 , translit . Hu guang , also released as Arc Light ) is a 1989 Chinese drama film directed by Zhang Junzhao .
This Island Earth is a 1955 American Technicolor science fiction film directed by Joseph M. Newman and Jack Arnold .
Mooladhanam ( Malayalam : മൂലധനം , translation : Capital ) is a 1969 Indian Malayalam film , directed by P. Bhaskaran and produced by M Azim .
Sylvie et le fantôme ( Sylvie and the ghost ) is a 1946 French film directed by Claude Autant - Lara .
Hohe Schule , also known by its subtitle Das Geheimnis des Carlo Cavelli ( English : The Secret of Cavelli ) is an Austrian film produced in 1934 by Erich Engel .
L'Immortelle is a 1963 international co - produced drama film directed by Alain Robbe - Grillet .
Willie 's Magic Wand is a 1907 British short silent comedy film , directed by Walter R. Booth , featuring a young boy terrorising the household with his father 's magic wand .
Five Branded Women is a 1960 Italian - American international co - production film directed by Martin Ritt and produced by Dino De Laurentiis .
Heart and Souls is a 1993 American fantasy comedy film directed by Ron Underwood .
Small Soldiers is a 1998 American science fiction action film directed by Joe Dante .
Adavi Donga ( Telugu : అడవి దొంగ ) is a 1985 Telugu film directed by K. Raghavendra Rao .

The Cohens and Kellys in Hollywood is a 1932 American comedy film directed by John Francis Dillon and written by Howard J. Green .
Half of Heaven ( Spanish : La mitad del cielo ) is a 1986 Spanish drama film directed by Manuel Gutiérrez Aragón .
Kenny Begins is a 2009 Swedish comedy science fiction film directed by Carl Åstrand and Mats Lindberg .
Seven Songs from the Tundra ( Finnish : Seitsemän laulua tundralta ) is a 1999 Finnish film directed by Anastasia Lapsui and Markku Lehmuskallio .
Monument to the Dream is a 1967 American short documentary film about the Jefferson National Expansion Memorial directed by Charles Guggenheim and narrated by Paul Richards .
Princess Turandot ( German : Prinzessin Turandot ) is a 1934 German comedy film directed by Gerhard Lamprecht and starring Käthe von Nagy and Willy Fritsch .
Netru Indru ( English : Yesterday , Today ) is a 2014 Tamil action film , directed by Padmamagan , a filmmaker who earlier directed Pallavan and R. Parthiban starrer Ammuvagiya Naan .
The Art Dealer ( French title : L'Antiquaire ) is a 2015 French thriller drama film produced and directed by François Margolin .
Our Land of Peace ( Spanish : Nuestra tierra de paz ) is a 1939 Argentine - Spanish biographical film directed by Arturo S. Mom .
Marudhanayagam is a long - delayed high budget Indian historical fiction film directed and produced by Kamal Haasan .
Zero Motivation ( Hebrew title : אפס ביחסי אנוש , Zero on interpersonal relations ) is a 2014 Israeli comedy - drama film directed by Talya Lavie .
An Australian by Marriage is a 1923 Australian dramatized documentary directed by Raymond Longford .
Dom Hemingway is a 2013 British black comedy -- crime drama film directed and written by Richard Shepard .
Texas Rangers Ride Again is a 1940 American Western film directed by James P. Hogan and written by William R. Lipman and Horace McCoy .
Chinarayudu is a 1992 Tollywood film directed by B. Gopal and produced by P. R. Prasad on Datta Sai Films .
How to Boil a Frog is an 2010 Canadian eco - comedy documentary film written and directed by Jon Cooksey to show the consequences of too many people using up Earth resources and suggesting five ways that people can save habitability on the Earth while improving their own lives at the same time .
Once Upon a Time in China is a Hong Kong film franchise directed , written , and produced by Tsui Hark .
La Spagnola is a 2001 comedy drama Australian film directed by Steve Jacobs .
Hatavadi ( Kannada : ಹಠವಾದಿ ) is a 2006 Indian Kannada language film directed by V. Ravichandran .
Storm Over the Nile is a 1955 film adaptation of the novel The Four Feathers , directed by Terence Young .
À bientôt , j'espère ( literally translates as Until soon , I hope ) is a 1968 French documentary film directed by Chris Marker and Mario Marret .
Cheese Mites , or Lilliputians in a London Restaurant is a 1901 British short silent comedy film , directed by Walter R. Booth , featuring a gentleman being entertained by the little people who emerge from the cheese at his table .
The Opry House was the fifth Mickey Mouse cartoon released by Walt Disney Productions .
Pioneers of the West is a 1940 American Western `` Three Mesquiteers '' B - movie directed by Lester Orlebeck .
Murders in the Zoo is 1933 Pre - Code horror film directed by A. Edward Sutherland , written by Philip Wylie and Seton I. Miller .
Akkare Akkare Akkare ( Malayalam : അക്കരെ അക്കരെ അക്കരെ ) is a 1990 Malayalam comedy film directed by Priyadarshan and written by Sreenivasan .

Unidentified is a 2006 science fiction Christian film produced by Rich Christiano and Alvin Mount .

Annayum Rasoolum ( English : Anna and Rasool ) is a 2013 Indian Malayalam romance film , co - written and directed by Rajeev Ravi .
Escape from Tomorrow is a 2013 American black - and - white independent fantasy horror film , the debut of writer and director Randy Moore .
The Shooting Party is a 1985 British drama film directed by Alan Bridges and based on the book of the same name by Isabel Colegate .
Nuba Conversations is a 2000 documentary and ethnographic film directed by Arthur Howes .
The Betrayer is a 1921 Australian - New Zealand film from director Beaumont Smith about an inter - racial romance between a white Australian and a part - Māori girl .
Dívka na koštěti or The Girl on the Broomstick is a 1972 Czechoslovak fantasy - comedy film directed by Václav Vorlíček .

Nobody Owns Me ( Swedish : Mig äger ingen ) is a 2013 Swedish drama film directed by Kjell - Åke Andersson .
The Mother of Invention is a 2009 American `` mockumentary''-style comedy film directed by Joseph M. Petrick and Andrew Bowser , with screenplay by Petrick .
House of Dark Shadows is a 1970 feature - length horror film directed by Dan Curtis , based on his Dark Shadows television series .
Blood for Irina is a 2012 vampire film written and directed by Fangoria editor and film critic Chris Alexander , who also helped to create the film 's score .
Resonnances is a 2006 French science - fiction film written and directed by Philippe Robert .

Sur le rythme is a Canadian film by director Charles - Olivier Michaud , released on 10 August 2011 .

The Night We Dropped a Clanger is a 1959 British comedy thriller film directed by Darcy Conyers and starring Brian Rix , Cecil Parker , William Hartnell and Leslie Phillips .

Sordid Lives is a 2000 independent film , written and directed by Del Shores .
Six Ways to Sunday is a 1997 crime drama with elements of comedy directed by Adam Bernstein .
Diamond Skulls ( also known as Dark Obsession ) is a British 1989 thriller directed by Nick Broomfield who also co - wrote with Tim Rose - Price .
Cool School Camp ( Turkish : Çılgın Dersane Kampta ) is a 2008 Turkish comedy film , directed by Faruk Aksoy , about a class of teenage students who take revenge on a rival who attempts to sabotage their unconventional school .

Penrod and His Twin Brother is a 1938 American comedy film directed by William C. McGann and written by William Jacobs and Hugh Cummings .

Dames is a 1934 Warner Bros. musical comedy film directed by Ray Enright with dance numbers created by Busby Berkeley .

Gun Lords of Stirrup Basin is a 1937 American Western film directed by Sam Newfield for Supreme Pictures .
Demon of Paradise is a 1987 horror film shot in the Philippines and directed by Cirio H. Santiago .

The Amateur Detective is a 1914 American silent short comedy directed by Carroll Fleming for the Thanhouser Film Corporation .

Chapel Perilous is a 2013 comedy fantasy short film , directed by Matthew Lessner .
Fumō Chitai ( 不毛地帯 ) is a 1976 Japanese film directed by Satsuo Yamamoto .

My Bodyguard is a 1980 American comedy - drama film directed by Tony Bill ( his directorial debut ) , and written by Alan Ormsby .
Baptism of Blood ( Portuguese : Batismo de Sangue ) is a 2006 Brazilian film directed by Helvécio Ratton , based on Frei Betto 's book of the same name .

Matter of Trust is a 1997 independent film directed by Joey Travolta and written by John Penney .
Across the Pacific is a 1942 American spy film set on the eve of the entry of the United States into World War II . The film was directed first by John Huston , then by Vincent Sherman after Huston joined the United States Army Signal Corps .
Attack on a China Mission is a 1900 British short silent drama film , directed by James Williamson , showing some sailors coming to the rescue of the wife of a missionary killed by Boxers .
The World 's Greatest Sinner is a 1962 film written , directed , and produced by , and starring noted character actor Timothy Carey .
Chitrasutram ( The Image Threads ) is a 2010 Malayalam film , written & directed by Vipin Vijay , produced by Altaf Mazid , Zubeen Ahmad , Sushanta Roy under the banner of Unknown Films .
Trains of Winnipeg is a film and multimedia art project by Clive Holden , released in stages between 2001 and 2004 .
I cadetti di Guascogna ( ( English ) The Cadets of Gascony ) is a 1950 Italian comedy film directed by Mario Mattoli .
Trust of Thieves ( German : Trust der Diebe ) is a 1929 German silent film directed by Erich Schönfelder and starring Agnes Esterhazy , Paul Otto and Eva von Berne .

Ajooba is a 1991 Bollywood fantasy superhero film , produced and directed by Shashi Kapoor and also co - directed by the Soviet filmmaker Gennadi Vasilyev .
Dog 's Dialogue ( French : Colloque de chiens ) is a 1977 French short crime film directed by Raúl Ruiz .
Go Quiet is a music film directed by Dean DeBlois , featuring acoustic renditions of all nine songs from the 2010 album Go by Jón Þór ( Jónsi ) Birgisson .

The Marine 2 is a 2009 American thriller film directed by Roel Reiné , written by Christopher Borrelli and John Chapin Morgan , and produced by Michael Lake .
The Gracies and the Birth of Vale Tudo is a documentary film directed by Victor Cesar Bota about the Brazilian Gracie family , who created Brazilian jiu - jitsu and the UFC .

Az Életbe táncoltatott leány is a 1964 Hungarian film directed by Tamás Banovich .

Hellsinki ( Finnish : Rööperi ) is a 2009 Finnish film directed by Aleksi Mäkelä .
The Supergrass is a 1985 British comedy film written and directed by Peter Richardson .
The Move of The Penguin ( Italian : La mossa del pinguino , also known as The Penguin 's Move ) is a 2013 Italian comedy film written and directed by Claudio Amendola , at his directorial debut .
Goodbye Kathmandu is a Nepali movie directed by Nabin Subba .
Everything I Like ( Slovak : Všetko čo mám rád ) is a 1993 Slovak drama film directed by Martin Šulík .
Mickey 's Gala Premier is a Walt Disney cartoon produced in 1933 , directed by Burt Gillett , and featuring parodies of several famous Hollywood film actors from the 1930s .
The Last Mitterrand ( French title : Le Promeneur du Champ de Mars ) is a 2005 film directed by Robert Guédiguian depicting the final period in the life of an unnamed French President ( but the English title suggests the president is François Mitterrand ) .
The Caprices of Kitty is a 1915 American comedy silent film directed by Phillips Smalley and written by Elsie Janis .

Cam2Cam ( also known under the working titles of Darknet and c2c ) is a 2014 horror thriller film that was directed by Joel Soisson .
The Conscience of Nhem En is a 26-minute documentary directed by Steven Okazaki , telling the stories of three survivors of the Tuol Sleng Prison .
I due maghi del pallone ( The two wizards of the ball ) is a 1970 Italian comedy film directed by Mariano Laurenti .
Woman They Almost Lynched is a 1953 American Western film directed by Allan Dwan and written by Steve Fisher .
Behind Office Doors is a 1931 Pre - Code American drama film directed by Melville W. Brown , from a screenplay by Carey Wilson and J. Walter Ruben , based on Alan Schultz 's novel , Private Secretary .

Jiraiya the Hero is a 1921 Japanese silent short film directed by Shōzō Makino .
Father , Son , and Holy War ( Pitra , Putra , aur Dharmayuddha ) is a 1995 film by Indian documentary filmmaker Anand Patwardhan .

Affæren Birte is a 1945 Danish family film directed by Lau Lauritzen , Jr. and Alice O'Fredericks .
Pantalones cortos ( English : Short pants ) is a 1949 Argentine black - and - white film , directed by Leopoldo Torres Ríos and written by him and Leopoldo Torre Nilsson .

Vetri Vizha ( Tamil : வெற்றி விழா ) is a 1989 Tamil - language film directed by Prathap K. Pothan .
