Skor - Piony ( Russian : Sкор-Пионы;Scorpions or Scor - Peonies ) is Linda 's seventh studio album ( sixteenth overall ) , released in Russia on March 28 , 2006 .
Unblessing the Purity is the second EP by Swedish death metal band Bloodbath .
Prendre l'air is the third album by French singer Shy'm .
Grayfolded is a two - CD album produced by John Oswald featuring the Grateful Dead song `` Dark Star '' .
Halutuimmat is a compilation album by a Finnish singer - songwriter Aki Sirkesalo .
The Sad and Tragic Demise of Big Fine Hot Salty Black Wind is the third album by free jazz ensemble Universal Congress Of , released on October 17 , 1991 through Enemy Records .
`` Ingen sommar utan reggae '' is a massive Swedish summer hit for Markoolio in the Swedish Singles Chart written by Johan Fjellström , Joakim Hillson and Nicklas Ternedal .
Ausserwelt is the second studio album by French band Year of No Light , released in 2010 .
Too Much Guitar is the third album by the Reigning Sound .
I / flancy is the third album by Hitomi Yaida released on 9 October 2002 .
`` Entrégate '' ( `` Surrender to Me '' ) is a pop song written , produced and arranged by Juan Carlos Calderón , and performed by Mexican singer Luis Miguel .
`` Game Do n't Wait '' was the second single released from Warren G 's third album , I Want It All .
Elegantly Wasted is the tenth studio album by Australian rock band INXS .
Matrikula ( lit . Tuition Fee ) is a 2009 album and his 4th album by Filipino rapper Gloc-9 .
Wound Creations is the first full - length album of the former death metal band Amoral .
`` England Swings ( Like a Pendulum Do ) '' is a 1965 country music song written and performed by Roger Miller .
E2-E4 , released in 1984 , is a solo recording by Ash Ra Tempel / Ashra guitarist Manuel Göttsching .
`` We Are Young '' is a song recorded by American band Fun featuring Janelle Monáe , for their second studio album , Some Nights ( 2012 ) .
`` U Want Me 2 '' is a song by Sarah McLachlan and is the lead original single from her 2008 greatest hits album , Closer :
Supervillain Outcast is the fourth full - length album by Norwegian black metal band Dødheimsgard , now under the moniker DHG .
`` Take Me to the Country '' is a song recorded by American country music artist , Mel McDaniel .
Everybody 's Dancin ' is the tenth studio album by the funk band Kool and the Gang , released in 1978 .
`` One Slip '' is a song from Pink Floyd 's 1987 album A Momentary Lapse of Reason .
When It Was Now is the debut studio album by Australian alternative rock band Atlas Genius , released on 19 February 2013 by Warner Bros. Records .
On the Sun is the second album by New Zealand reggae band The Black Seeds released in 2004 .
`` Dream Weaver '' is a song by Gary Wright that was a hit single in the US , reaching # 2 in the Billboard charts while it reached # 1 in the Cash Box charts in 1976 .
The Songs That Got Away is an album by English soprano Sarah Brightman .
Grün & Blau ( Green and Blue ) is a compilation album by Feeling B. It contains re - recorded and remixed Feeling B songs that were uncovered by Christian Lorenz .
Il mio sbaglio più grande ( English : My biggest mistake ) is the second single of Italian singer Laura Pausini 's Tra te e il mare .
Trane Whistle is an album by saxophonist Eddie `` Lockjaw '' Davis ' Big Band with arrangements by Oliver Nelson and Ernie Wilkins recorded in 1960 and released on the Prestige label .
Galería Caribe ( English : Caribbean Gallery ) is the eighth studio album released on October 24 , 2000 by Guatemalan singer - songwriter Ricardo Arjona and became his first number - one album in the Billboard Top Latin Albums chart , peaking at the top of the chart in 2000 and 2001 .
`` If You Were with Me Now '' is a pop song written by British songwriting team Stock and Waterman , Australian pop singer Kylie Minogue and American R&B singer Keith Washington for Minogue 's fourth studio album Let 's Get to It ( 1991 ) .
Moonflower Plastic ( Welcome To My Wigwam ) is the second solo album by Guided by Voices member Tobin Sprout released in 1997 .
A Lonely Man is the fourth studio album by American soul group The Chi - Lites , produced and largely written by lead singer Eugene Record .
`` Time of the Season '' is a song by the British rock band The Zombies , featured on their 1968 album Odessey and Oracle .
Amor , Familia y Respeto ( English : Love , Family and Respect ) is the debut studio album by Mexican - American cumbia group A.B. Quintanilla y Los Kumbia Kings and the debut studio album by Mexican - American musician A.B. Quintanilla .
`` Luv of My Life '' is the first single released off DJ Quik 's eight studio album , The Book of David .
József Bozsik was born in Kispest , now a district of Budapest .
Jean Kerebel ( Jean - Baptiste Kerebel ; 2 April 1918 in Paris -- 9 March 2010 ) was a French track and field athlete who mainly competed in the 400 metres .
Born on 19 March 1943 in Coventry , Warwickshire , Peter Eugene Ball attended Coventry College of Art from 1957 until 1962 where he obtained the National Diploma of Design .
Luciano Chiarugi ( Italian pronunciation : ( luˈtʃano kjaˈrudʒi ) ; born January 13 , 1947 in Ponsacco , Province of Pisa ) is an Italian football manager and former player .
Considered the grande dame of Hindi literature , Krishna Sobti was born in Gujrat , Punjab , now in Pakistan ; she also writes under the name Hashmat and has published Hum Hashmat , a compilation of pen portraits of writers and friends .

Dave Bussey ( born 4 October 1952 in Drayton , Norfolk ) , is a British radio DJ who , until March 2008 , presented The Dave Bussey Show on BBC Radio Lincolnshire .

Jeannette Pennings ( born 7 October 1977 in Alphen aan den Rijn ) is a Dutch bobsledder and track and field athlete .
Alex Prager ( born November 1 , 1979 ) is an American art photographer and filmmaker based in Los Angeles .

Joseph Cotten was born in 1905 in Petersburg , Virginia , the first of three sons born to Joseph Cheshire Cotten , Sr . , an assistant postmaster , and Sally Willson Cotten .

Bob Rakušan ( born 6 February 1948 , Prague ) is a contemporary artist creating large - fired enamel works on black steel plate , scrap and salvaged objects , such as stove tops , ovens and various other objects .
Elaine Cunningham ( born August 12 , 1957 in New York City ) is an American fantasy and science fiction author , especially known for her contributions to the Dungeons & Dragons role playing game campaign setting of Forgotten Realms , including the realms of Evermeet , Halruaa , Ruathym and Waterdeep .

Nikolay Dobrokhotov was born on March 27 , 1889 in Arzamas in Nizhny Novgorod Guberniya in the Russian Empire .
Jean - Michel Larqué ( born 8 September 1947 , in Bizanos , Pyrénées - Atlantiques ) is a retired football player , and now a sports journalist .
Darryl Pinckney ( born 1953 in Indianapolis , Indiana ) is an American novelist , playwright , and essayist .
Clive Barker was born in Liverpool , Merseyside , the son of Joan Ruby ( née Revill ) , a painter and school welfare officer , and Leonard Barker , a personnel director for an industrial relations firm .
Eleanor Gates was born on 26 September 1875 in Shakopee , Minnesota , southwest of Minneapolis .
Lyes Salem ( إلياس سالم ) ( Algiers , 1973 ) is an Algerian actor and film director .
Keith Lee played high school basketball at West Memphis Senior High School in West Memphis , Arkansas .
Gary Arndt was born in Appleton , Wisconsin . Arndt attended Macalester College in the early 1990s , where he was a competitive debater , making it to the late rounds of the Cross Examination Debate Association National Tournament in 1990 and 1991 .
Elena Scarpellini ( born 14 January 1987 in Bergamo ) is an Italian pole vaulter .
Anne Aston ( born Anne Lloyd 1 January 1948 in Glasgow , Scotland ) is an actress and television presenter best known as the hostess of The Golden Shot in the late 1960s and early 1970s .

Rebecca Riggs is a Queensland - born Australian actress best known for her role as Commandant Grayza in the science fiction television series Farscape .
Sébastien Hinault ( born 11 February 1974 in Saint - Brieuc ) is a retired French road racing cyclist .
Claude Grahame - White was born in Bursledon , Hampshire on 21 August 1879 , and educated at Bedford Grammar School .
Giorgos Theodoridis ( Greek : Γιώργος Θεοδωρίδης ; born 3 July 1980 in Frankfurt , West Germany ) is a Greek international footballer who plays for Agrotikos Asteras F.C ..
Anthony Reid is a British auto racing driver , born on 17 May 1957 in Glasgow , Scotland .
Heidi Groskreutz , born September 3 , 1981 , is an award - winning dancer from Cliffside Park , New Jersey , and raised in Newport Beach , California .
Isidora Jiménez ( born 10 August 1993 in Concepción ) is a Chilean athlete specializing in the sprinting and Relay race events .
Gavin O'Toole ( born 19 September 1975 in Dublin , Ireland ) is an Irish footballer who played in The Football League for Hereford United on loan from Coventry City .
Archbishop Filippo Iannone ( born in Naples , 13 December 1957 ) is a Roman Catholic church leader .
Born in Vila Velha , Espírito Santo , Jullie moved to São Paulo to pursue an acting career .
Salvatore Accursi ( born 3 February 1978 in Locri , Calabria ) is an Italian football Defender who currently plays for Catanzaro Calcio 2011 .
Francesco Crasso was born in Milan in 1500 , the son of Pietro Antonio Crasso , a Milanese noble related to the signoria of Zibido San Giacomo and Lambro .
Alfred Hsing ( born November 23 , 1983 ) , is an American martial artist , actor , and stuntman born in San Jose , California .
Johann Baptist Chiari ( June 15 , 1817 -- December 11 , 1854 ) was an Austrian gynecologist and obstetrician born in Salzburg .
Salomo Glassius ( German : Salomon Glaß ; 20 May 1593 -- 27 July 1656 ) was a German theologian and biblical critic born at Sondershausen , in the principality of Schwarzburg - Sondershausen .
Joe Grushecky ( born Pittsburgh , Pennsylvania ) is a rock musician in the United States known for his work with the Iron City Houserockers in the late 1970s and early 1980s ; and for his works since the late the 1980s with his act Joe Grushecky and The Houserockers ; and for his solo career .
Jean - Luc Sassus ( 4 October 1962 -- 22 May 2015 ) was a French international football player from Tarbes .
Massimiliano Carlini ( born 20 August 1986 in Terracina ) is an Italian footballer who currently plays as a winger for Serie A side Frosinone .

James W. Booth ( September 9 , 1822 New York City -- September 14 , 1876 Nyack , Rockland County , New York ) was an American politician from New York .

Timo Scheunemann ( born 29 November 1973 in Kediri , East Java ) is an Indonesian born German youth football coach and manager .
Rudolf Signer ( * 17 March 1903 Herisau † 1 December 1990 Gümlingen ) contributed to the discovery of the DNA double helix .
Osama Chtiba ( Arabic : أسامة اشطيبة‎ ) ( born September 27 , 1988 in Tripoli ) is a Libyan footballer .
Božur Matejić ( Serbian Cyrillic : Божур Матејић , born 20 December 1963 in Prokuplje ) is a former Serbian Yugoslav footballer .
Roger Lévêque ( 5 December 1920 in Saint - Nazaire -- 30 June 2002 in Saint - Avertin ) was a professional French road racing cyclist from 1946 to 1953 .
Paul Guth was born in Ossun on 5 March 1910 to a family of modest means .
Andrew Young was born March 12 , 1932 , in New Orleans , Louisiana , to Daisy Fuller Young , a school teacher , and Andrew Jackson Young , Sr . , a dentist .
Hanni El Khatib is a San Francisco - born singer - songwriter and multi - instrumentalist currently based in Los Angeles .
Sverre Brandt ( 3 March 1880 -- 16 July 1962 ) was a Norwegian theatre worker and playwright , born in Trondheim .
Sean Weathers ( born January 14 , 1980 in Jonestown , Guyana ) is an American , New York City based , film director , producer , screenwriter , editor , casting director and actor .
Khelemba Singh hails from Imphal .
Luk Koon Pong ( Chinese : 陸冠邦 ; Jyutping : luk6 gun3 bong1 ; born 1 August 1978 in Hong Kong ) is a retired Hong Kong football player .
Scott Booth ( born 16 December 1971 in Aberdeen ) is a Scottish football coach and former player , who is currently head coach of Glasgow City in the Scottish Women 's Premier League .
Ginger Gilmour ( born Virginia Hasenbein ; 19 January 1949 , Philadelphia , Pennsylvania ) is an American artist , sculptor , author and former model .
Bevan Kapisi ( born 15 January 1981 ) in Samoa is a footballer who plays as a Central midfielder .
Yann Toma ( born 1969 in Neuilly - sur - Seine ) is both an artist and a researcher , the lifelong president of the company Ouest - Lumière and an artist - observer within the UN , where he sits as an entrepreneurial artist .
Raashid Alvi was born in Chandpur , Bijnor , Uttar Pradesh , on 15 April 1956 , to Islama Khatoon and Malik Irfan Ahmad Alvi , a freedom fighter

Born in Stockton , California , Robert Six started his business career in sales for a public utility company , but was fired for taking flying lessons on company time .
Oskar von Hinüber , a well - known Indologist , was born in Hanover in 1939 .
Sharon Green ( born 1942 in Brooklyn , New York ) is an American writer of science fiction , fantasy and romance .
Anandaraj was born and brought up in Pondicherry and his father was a businessman .
Johann Santner ( 21 April , 1840 in Sankt Jakob in Defereggen - 21 May , 1912 in Bozen ) was a Tyrolean mountaineer and first climber to reach the summit of the Santnerspitze , which was later given his name in his honor , of the Schlern on 2 July , 1880 .
George Lamond ( born George Garcia , February 25 , 1967 , Washington , D.C. , USA ) , sometimes styled George LaMond , is an American freestyle music and salsa music singer .
Elizabeth Missing Sewell was born at High Street , Newport , Isle of Wight , on 19 February 1815 , was third daughter in a family of seven sons and five daughters of Thomas Sewell ( 1775 - -1842 ) , solicitor , of Newport , and his wife Jane Edwards ( 1773 - -1848 ) .
Bärbel Broschat , née Klepp ( born 2 November 1957 in Magdeburg ) is a retired East German 400 metres hurdler .
Damascius was born in Damascus in Syria , whence he derived his name : his Syrian name is unknown .
Devin Logan ( born 17 February 1993 in Oceanside , New York ) is an American freeskier from West Dover , Vermont .
Korab Syla ( born 24 November 1992 in Kukës ) is an Albanian - born American soccer player currently playing for Syracuse Orange .
Strauss was born in Charleston , West Virginia , the son of Rosa ( Lichtenstein ) and Lewis Strauss , a successful shoe wholesaler .
Žarko Puhovski ( 15 December 1946 in Zagreb ) is a Croatian professor , political analyst , philosopher and intellectual , former president of the Croatian Helsinki Committee .
Jocelyn Barbara Hepworth was born on 10 January 1903 in Wakefield , West Riding of Yorkshire , the eldest child of Gertrude and Herbert Hepworth .
Peter Ascanius ( Aure , 1723 - -1803 ) was a Norwegian biologist and a student of Linnaeus .
Ernie Reinhardt , better known as Lilo Wanders , ( born 22 September 1955 in Celle as Ernst - Johann Reinhardt ) is a famous German transvestite entertainer , comedian and theatre / television host .
Piotr Wilniewczyc was born 31 January 1887 near Irkutsk in Siberia .
Semir Slomić ( born 14 January 1988 in Banovići ) is a Bosnian football player , currently playing for FK Radnicki Lukavac in the Prva liga FBiH.
David Jude Jolicoeur ( born September 21 , 1968 , in Brooklyn , New York ) , also known under the stage name Trugoy the Dove and more recently Dave , is an American rapper , producer , and one third of groundbreaking hip hop trio De La Soul .
Yevgeny Roizman ( Russian : Евге́ний Вади́мович Ро́йзман ; born 14 September 1962 ) is a Russian politician , the Mayor of Yekaterinburg after winning the mayoral election in September 2013 .
Rachel York ( born Rachel Lemanski August 7 , 1971 in Orlando , Florida ) is an American actress and singer .
Joe Acanfora ( born July 6 , 1950 in Jersey City , New Jersey ) is an American educator and activist .
Leslie Cockburn ( née Leslie Corkill Redlich ) was born at Mills Hospital in San Mateo , San Mateo County , California , and raised in Hillsborough .
Kristina Apgar ( born June 10 , 1985 , in Morristown , New Jersey ) is an American actress best known for portrayal of Lily Smith on the CW 's drama Privileged .
Herbert Jefferson Jr. ( born September 28 , 1946 , Sandersville , Georgia ) is an African - American film , television , and stage actor .
Juris Dalbiņš ( born January 1 , 1954 in Dobele ) is a Latvian politician and a Deputy of the Saeima .
Douglas Silva Delfino , better known as Douglas Silva ( Porto Alegre , April 22 , 1983 ) , is a Brazilian footballer who acts as the steering wheel .
Paolo Pininfarina ( August 28 , 1958 ) is an Italian engineer , designer and businessman , known as the manager of the world famous Pininfarina design company of his hometown of Turin ( 2008 ) .
Xie Zhiyu started his professional football career with Wuhan Guanggu after graduating from their youth team in 2007 .
Helen Berman was born in Amsterdam and as a young girl survived the Holocaust .
Giorgos Papadopoulos was born in Nicosia , Cyprus , on May 26 , 1985 to Greek - Cypriot parents .
Vasiliki Millousi ( Greek : Βασιλική Μηλλούση ; born May 4 , 1984 in Athens ) is a Greek artistic gymnast .
General George Keppel , 3rd Earl of Albemarle KG PC ( London , 8 April 1724 -- 13 October 1772 ) , styled Viscount Bury until 1754 , was a British soldier and nobleman .
Doris Boake Kerr , a writer who published using the pseudonyms ' Capel Boake ' and Stephen Grey , was born on 29 August 1889 at Summer Hill , Sydney , and died on 5 June 1944 at Caulfield , Victoria .
Frank Hannon ( born October 3 , 1966 in Sacramento , California ) , is best known as the guitarist , songwriter and a co - founder of the multi - platinum band Tesla , and is now established as a solo singer / songwriter with his album Gypsy Highway .
Rocko was born in Australia and emigrated to America in High School .
Una McLean MBE ( born 1 May 1930 in Strathaven , Scotland ) is a British actress and comedienne .
Elad Koren is a former Israeli footballer who played in Maccabi Netanya , Maccabi Haifa , Maccabi Ironi Ashdod and Maccabi Herzliya .
Carol - Anne Day ( born March 26 , 1986 in Calgary , Alberta ) is a Canadian voice actress , actress , and musician who is known for roles in English - dubbed anime .
Sandra Oxenryd ( born on 1 October 1982 in Kristinehamn ) is a Swedish singer who won Fame Factory in 2005 .
Adelchi Negri ( 2 August 1876 -- 19 February 1912 ) was an Italian pathologist and microbiologist born in Perugia .

Daniel Lipšic was born on 8 July 1973 in Bratislava into a family of physicians and doctors .
Daniele Fortunato ( born 8 January 1963 in Samarate ) is an Italian professional football coach and a former player , who currently manages S.C. Beira - Mar in Segunda Liga .

Pierre - Michel Germann , known as Pierre Germann ( born March 5 , 1985 in Nancy ) is a French professional football player .

Tuna Aktürk ( born 22 September 1977 in Balıkesir ) is Balıkesir Vice - Mayor and Balıkesirspor President .
Amichand Rajbansi , nicknamed the Bengal Tiger , was born in Clairwood , Durban on 14 January 1942 .
Kristina Bannikova ( born 15 June 1991 ) is an Estonian football player , who plays as a striker for Naiste Meistriliiga club Pärnu and the Estonia women 's national football team .
Gaetano Fanti ( 1687 -- 27 September 1759 ) was an Italian fresco painter born in Bologna .

Mélanie Pain ( pronounced Melanie ' Pan ' ) is a French indie pop singer from Caen .
Andrés Rodales ( born June 27 , 1986 in Durazno ) is a Uruguayan footballer currently playing for Peñarol in the Uruguayan Primera División .
Linda Sole ( b. 1950 in Swindon , Wiltshire , England ) is an awarded and prolific British writer of romance and suspense novels since 1980 , she also writes under the pseudonyms of Lynn Granville , Anne Herries , Emma Quincey , and Juliana Linden .
Serene Husseini Shahid ( Arabic : سيرين حُسيني شهيد‎ , French : Sirine Husseini Shahid ; 1920 - -2008 ) was born in Jerusalem as a member of the influential Husayni family .

Larissa Mabel Riquelme Frutos , usually known as Larissa Riquelme ( born 22 February 1985 ) is a Paraguayan model and actress from Asunción .
John Morton Downey was born in Wallingford , Connecticut , the fourth of six children of James A. and Bessie ( Cox ) Downey , a well - known family in both Wallingford and Waterbury , Connecticut .
Samuel John Stump ( c. 1779 -- 1863 ) was an English painter , who was born at Corsham , Wiltshire , and baptised there on 2 September 1779 , the youngest son of John and Betty Stump of Corsham , Wiltshire .
Line Renaud was born as Jacqueline Ente in Pont - de - Nieppe on 2 July 1928 .
Amba Prasad was born in Delhi c. 1860 , in an eminent business family .

Otto Schenk ( born June 12 , 1930 in Vienna ) is an Austrian actor , and theater and opera director .

Friedhelm Haebermann ( born 24 July 1946 in Duisburg ) is a former German football player and manager .

Roger Vangheluwe was born on 7 November 1936 at Roeselare and studied Christian theology and mathematics .

Gareth Walters was born in Britain on 27 December 1928 , at Swansea in South Wales , and completed his early education there .
Barkha Dutt was born in New Delhi to S. P. Dutt , an official in Air India and Prabha Dutt who was a well - known journalist with the Hindustan Times .
Maury Rosenberg ( born December 18 , 1964 ) is an American singer - songwriter and accordionist from Long Beach , New York .
John Gunby ( March 10 , 1745 -- May 17 , 1807 ) was an American planter and soldier from Somerset County , Maryland who is considered by many to be `` one of the most gallant officers of the Maryland Line under Gen. Smallwood '' .
Ernest Tidyman ( January 1 , 1928 -- July 14 , 1984 ) was a Cleveland - born American author and screenwriter , best known for his novels featuring the African - American detective John Shaft .

Georg Lorenz Bauer was born in Hiltpoltstein , a small market town some 25 km ( 15 miles ) to the north - east of Nuremberg .

Howard Levi ( November 9 , 1916 , New York City -- September 11 , 2002 , New York City ) was an American mathematician who worked mainly in algebra and mathematical education .

Charles Evans , Jr. was born in Manhattan , New York City , New York , 1963 to Charles Evans , Sr . and his first wife , Frances ( a documentary filmmaker ) .
Natalie Pike ( born April 4 , 1983 in Edinburgh , Scotland ) is a British model , raised in Berwick - on - Tweed and Stockport in England , who won the Miss British Isles Competition and the FHM High Street Honeys competition in 2004 .
Robert Mohr was born in Bisterschied in the Palatinate in 1897 into the family of a Palatine - born master mason , one of six brothers and three sisters .

Thomas Ulrich ( born 11 July 1975 , in Berlin ) is a German boxer .

Sigalit Landau was born and raised in Jerusalem and spent several years in the US and the UK .

Luke de Woolfson ( born in Woodbridge , England on 7 March 1976 ) is a British film and television actor .

Janina David was born as the only child to a Jewish Polish family , and moved with them to Warsaw in 1939 .

William Mahone was born at Brown 's Ferry near Courtland in Southampton County , Virginia , to Fielding Jordan Mahone and Martha ( née Drew ) Mahone .
Pepper Adams was born in Highland Park , Michigan , to father Park Adams II and mother Cleo Marie Coyle .
Gregg Tafralis ( Gregory Louis Tafralis ; born April 9 , 1958 in San Francisco , California ) is a former track and field athlete from the United States , who set the best world year performance in the men 's shot put event in 1992 .

Paul Kingsnorth ( born 1972 in Worcester ) is an English writer and thinker .
Tony Sanneh was born in Saint Paul , Minnesota to an African father from Gambia and an American mother from Wisconsin .

Antonio de Bellis ( c. 1616 - c. 1656 ) was an Italian painter from Naples , active in the Baroque period .

Stefano Ceccaroni ( born 12 January 1961 in Basel ) is a retired Swiss - Italian football player .

Alexander Goldscheider ( born June 22 , 1950 in Prague ) is a Czech - born composer , music producer , and computer specialist living since 1981 in London .

Betsy Eby was born on April 3 , 1967 in the small coastal city of Seaside , Oregon .
Patrizio Prata ( born February 2 , 1972 in Milan ) is an Italian voice actor and dubbing director .
Georg Friedrich von Reichenbach ( 24 August 1771 -- 21 May 1826 ) , German scientific instrument maker , was born at Durlach in Baden on 24 August 1771 .
Morris Moss was born on May 31 , 1842 to a well - off Jewish family in London , England .
Charles Harper Bennett ( Born 1840 in London , died 1927 in Sydney ) was an English photographic pioneer .
Ron Gilbert was born in La Grande , Oregon , as the son of David E. Gilbert , a physics professor and former president of Eastern Oregon University ( then Eastern Oregon State College ) .
Giovanni Battista Riccio ( Giambattista Riccio ) ( late 16th century -- after 1621 ) was a musician and composer of the early Baroque era , resident in Venice , most notable for his development of instrumental forms , particularly utilizing the recorder .
Andrew J. Weaher ( or Weaber ) was born in Philadelphia , Pennsylvania on May 22 , 1842 , and enlisted in the United States Army there .
André Tota ( born December 9 , 1950 in Briey ) is a former French footballer of Polish origin .
Susanne Gunnarsson ( née Wiberg ; born 8 September 1963 in Katrineholm ) is a Swedish sprint canoer who competed from the early 1980s to the late 1990s .

Aurélien Passeron ( born January 19 , 1984 in Nice ) is a French professional road racing cyclist , who last rode for the Silber Pro Cycling team .
Aylin Kösetürk ( born August 5 , 1993 in Vienna ) is an Austrian fashion model of Turkish descent .
Martin Balsam was born in Bronx borough of New York City to Russian - Jewish parents , Lillian ( née Weinstein ) and Albert Balsam , who was a manufacturer of women 's sportswear .
Dr. Mohamed Sirad Dolal was an academic and a member of the central committee and executive council of the Ogaden National Liberation Front ( ONLF ) , a liberation movement in Ogaden determined to free its homeland from Ethiopia .
Lawrence Bingham ( born 28 May 1969 in England ) is a former Australian rules footballer who played with Hawthorn and St Kilda in the Victorian Football League ( VFL ) .
Luca Dal Fabbro ( born January 1 , 1951 in Rome ) is an Italian voice actor and dubbing director .
Jiří Kittner ( born 5 January 1963 in Liberec ) is a Czech politician who has served as mayor of Liberec since 2000 .
David Hykes ( born March 2 , 1953 , Taos , New Mexico ) is a composer , singer , musician , author , and meditation teacher .
Mohammad Atrianfar ( محمد عطریانفر ; born 1953 in Isfahan ) is an Iranian journalist and reformist politician , currently the head of the `` Policymaking Council '' of the daily newspaper Shargh .
Stefan Markolf ( born 3 January 1984 in Witzenhausen , Hesse ) is the first deaf German professional footballer .

George Kleinsinger ( February 13 , 1914 -- July 28 , 1982 ) was an American composer from San Bernardino , California , best known for his collaboration with Paul Tripp on the 1940s children 's classical - music piece `` Tubby the Tuba '' .
The main grammar school ( lycée ) in Saint Omer , the Lycée Alexandre Ribot , bears his name today .

Jon Hassler was born in Minneapolis , but spent his formative years in the small Minnesota towns of Staples and Plainview , where he graduated from high school .

Mina Kruseman was born in Velp , Gelderland to H. G. Kruseman , who went on to serve in the Dutch army in the Dutch East Indies , taking the family with him .

Aimee Nezhukumatathil ( born in 1974 in Chicago , Illinois ) is an Asian American poet , best known for her jovial and accessible reading style and lush descriptions of exotic foods and landscapes .

Mimnermus ( Greek : Μίμνερμος Mímnermos ) was a Greek elegiac poet from either Colophon or Smyrna in Ionia , who flourished about 630 - -600 BC . He was strongly influenced by the example of Homer yet he wrote short poems suitable for performance at drinking parties and was remembered by ancient authorities chiefly as a love poet .

Vladimir Lisin ( born 7 May 1956 in Ivanovo ) is a Russian steel tycoon .
Karl Korsch was born in the small rural village of Tostedt ( near Hamburg ) to Carl August Korsch and his wife Therese on August 15 , 1886 .
Lola Ridge , born Rose Emily Ridge ( 12 December 1873 Dublin -- 19 May 1941 Brooklyn ) was an Irish - American anarchist poet and an influential editor of avant - garde , feminist , and Marxist publications .
Guilherme Andrade da Silva , commonly known as Guilherme Andrade , ( born 31 January 1989 in Montes Claros ) is a Brazilian footballer who plays as a right back for Ceará on loan from Corinthians .
Valdir Azevedo or Waldir Azevedo ( January 23 , 1923 , Rio de Janeiro - September 21 , 1980 , São Paulo ) was a choro conductor and performer , considered to be the most successful musician of this genre .
Suzanne von Borsody ( German : ( ˈboʁʒodi ) ; born September 23 , 1957 in Munich ) is a German actress .

Franz Sales Meyer was born on 9 December 1849 in Kenzingen , Breisgau area .
Irina Lashko ( Russian : Ирина Лашко ; born 25 January 1973 in Samara ) is a Russian diver , who after her marriage with an Australian became known as Irina Furler .

Sidney Magal , artistic name of Sidney Magalhães ( Rio de Janeiro , 19 June 1953 ) , is a Brazilian singer , dancer and actor .

Alfred Werner Maurer ( * 1945 in Saarbrücken ) is an international German architect , urban planner , architectural historian , archaeologists and art historian
Espen Berntsen ( born 12 May 1967 ) is a Norwegian football referee from Vang outside the Norwegian municipality of Hamar .
Marshall D. Moran was born in Chicago on May 29 , 1906 and died April 14 , 1992 in Delhi , India .
Miguel Samuel Spiro was a naval commander of the Argentine navy born in Hydra Island , Greece .

Tapio Nurmela ( born January 2 , 1975 in Rovaniemi ) is a Finnish nordic combined athlete who competed during the 1990s .
Joseph Nicholson Barney was born in 1818 in Maryland , son of John Barney and Elizabeth Nicholson Hindman .
François Hers ( born in 1943 in Brussels ) is known as a photographer and a Belgian artist .
Walter Villa ( born August 13 , 1943 in Castelnuovo Rangone - June 18 , 2002 ) was a four - time Grand Prix motorcycle road racing world champion .
Slobodanka Stupar , ( Sarajevo , 1947 ) , is Serbian visual artist who lives and works in Belgrade , Athens and Cologne .
Thomas Coulter ( 1793 - -1843 ) , of Dundalk , was an Irish physician , botanist , and explorer .
Walter Höllerer was born in Sulzbach - Rosenberg and became a soldier in 1942 during the Second World War .
Stelian Moculescu ( born 6 May 1950 in Brașov ) is a Romanian volleyball coach and former player .
Michael Nicholas Salvatore Bongiorno ( May 26 , 1924 in New York City -- September 8 , 2009 in Monte Carlo ) , known as Mike Bongiorno ( Italian pronunciation : ( ˈmaik bonˈdʒorno ) ) , was an Italian television host .
Aurelio Canonici ( Genoa , 30 December 1965 ) is an Italian conductor and composer .
Svetozar Miletić was the oldest of seven children born to Sima and Teodosija ( née Rajić ) Miletić in the village of Mošorin in Šajkaška , the Serbian Military Frontier , on 22 February 1826 .
June Foray was born as June Lucille Forer on September 18 , 1917 in Springfield , Massachusetts , one of three children of father Maurice and mother Ida .
Antoniotto Usodimare was a prominent merchant and citizen of the Republic of Genoa , a director of the Genoese mint and a shareholder in the Banco di S. Giorgio .
Jan Baptist Bonnecroy was born in Antwerp as the son of the cloth merchant Willem Bonnecroy and Antonetta de la Forterie .
Mireille Best was born in 1943 at Le Havre and raised by her grandmother , Albertine Best .
Carsten Embach ( born 12 October 1968 in Stralsund ) is a German bobsledder who competed from the mid-1990s to the early 2000s .
Vern Partlow was born Verneil Hoover Partlow in Bloomington , Illinois , a son of Abner Moses Partlow and Florence Hoover Partlow .
Khaled Khalaila ( Arabic : خالد خليلة‎ , Hebrew : חאלד חלאילה‎ ; born 16 December 1982 ) is an Arab - Israeli footballer playing for Bnei Sakhnin in the Israeli Premier League .
Kelly Condron , ( born in Salford , 1982 ) is a British actress better known by her previous stage name Kelly Greenwood .
Jürgen Trumpf ( born 8 July 1931 , Düsseldorf ) was appointed Secretary - General for the Council of the European Union and held the office from 1 September 1994 to 17 October 1999 .
Kelda Roys ( born June 24 , 1979 ) is an attorney , an entrepreneur , a real estate broker , and a former Democratic member of the Wisconsin State Assembly .
Henry Hague Davis ( September 10 , 1885 -- June 30 , 1944 ) was a Canadian lawyer and Puisne Justice of the Supreme Court of Canada .
Ricardo Leoncio Elías Arias ( 12 September 1874 , Pisco , Peru -- 20 March 1951 ) was a Peruvian soldier and politician who was briefly the President of Peru between March 1 and March 5 , 1931 .
Miguel Mariano Gómez y Arias ( October 6 , 1889 -- October 26 , 1950 ) was a Cuban politician who served as President of Cuba for seven months in 1936 .
Petko Jordanov Christov , O.F.M. ( born 9 October 1950 in Velcevo , Veliko Tarnovo , Bulgaria ) is the current bishop of the Roman Catholic Diocese of Nicopoli .

Mickaël Solvi is a French Guianan international footballer who plays as a forward .
Amevou - Ludovic Assemoassa ( born 18 September 1980 in Lyon ) is a French - born Togolese football defender who formerly , as of August 2007 , plays for Granada 74 .

Jaime Gonçalves ( born 6 February 1899 , date of death unknown ) was a Portuguese footballer who played as a forward .

Pandanti Kapuram is a 1972 Telugu , family drama film .
Freedom Downtime is a 2001 documentary film sympathetic to the convicted computer hacker Kevin Mitnick , directed by Emmanuel Goldstein and produced by 2600 Films .

The Bewitched ( French : L'Ensorcelée ) is an 1852 novel by the French writer Jules Barbey d'Aurevilly .
People 's Encounter is an Indian film released on Ushakiran Movies in 1991 .
City Under the Sea ( released as War - Gods of the Deep in USA ) is a 1965 science fiction film .
The Marriage of a Young Stockbroker is an American romantic comedy - drama film released in 1971 , based on a novel by Charles Webb .
The Chronicles of Evil ( Hangul : 악의 연대기 ; RR : Akui Yeondaegi ) is a 2015 South Korean thriller film written and directed by Beak Woon - hak ( or Baek Woon - hak ) , starring Son Hyun - joo , Ma Dong - seok , Choi Daniel and Park Seo - joon .
Indina Bharatha ( Kannada : ಇಂದಿನ ಭಾರತ ) is a 1984 Indian Kannada film , directed by T Krishna .
No Mercy for the Rude ( Hangul : 예의없는 것들 ; RR : Yeui - eomneun Geotdeul ) is a 2006 South Korean film .
Four Faces of God is a 2002 film directed by Anthony Hartman .
Tricking the Government is a 1914 American silent film produced by Sid Films and distributed by Warner 's Features .
It was released on 23 March 2007 during the 2007 Cricket World Cup , which is a similar launch tactic used by Codemasters for the release of Brian Lara International Cricket 2005 , which was launched on the first day of the 2005 Ashes series .

My Dinner with Jimi is a 2003 comedy film written by Howard Kaylan , dealing with events in 1966 - 67 which led up to the night in 1967 when the Turtles encountered the Beatles and Kaylan had dinner with Jimi Hendrix in London , England .
Enter the Queen is a 1930 British short comedy film directed by Arthur Varney and starring Richard Cooper , Dora March , Chili Bouchier and Percy Walsh .
Carry On Regardless was the fifth in the series of Carry On films to be made being released in 1961 .
So Does an Automobile is a 1939 Fleischer Studios animated short film starring Margie Hines as Betty Boop .
Tiro al piccione ( internationally released as Pigeon Shoot and Pigeon Shooting ) is a 1961 Italian drama film .
Off White Lies ( Hebrew : אורחים לרגע‎ ) is a 2011 Israeli film directed by Maya Kenig in her feature film debut .
Super Xuxa contra Baixo Astral is a 1988 Brazilian film , directed by Anna Penido and David Sonneschein , and starring Xuxa Meneghel .
Yellow Earth ( simplified Chinese : 黄土地 ; traditional Chinese : 黃土地 ; pinyin : Huáng tǔdì ) is a 1984 Chinese drama film .
বাঁশি/ BANSHI/ The Flute is a 2007 Bangladeshi drama film written and directed by Abu Sayeed ( Film Director ) .
The Battle for the Republic of China ( Chinese : 辛亥雙十 ) is a 1981 Taiwanese drama film directed by Shan - hsi Ting .
Zerophilia is a 2005 romantic comedy film with speculative - fiction elements directed by Academy of Motion Pictures ' Student Academy Award - winning director Martin Curland and produced by Microangelo Entertainment .
Danger , Go Slow is a 1918 American comedy film directed by Robert Z. Leonard and featuring Lon Chaney .
Types of Bakuvian Bazaars ( Azerbaijani : Bakı Bazarlarının Tipləri ) is a 1907 Azerbaijani short documentary film directed by Vasili Amaşukeli .
Run a Crooked Mile is a 1969 made - for - TV thriller in which Louis Jourdan stars as Richard Stuart , an ordinary schoolteacher who , whilst on holiday , is a witness to a murder in a private secluded mansion .
Auntie 's Portrait is a 1915 short comedy film .
The Booze Hangs High released in 1930 , is the fourth title in the Looney Tunes series and features Bosko , Warner Bros. ' first cartoon character .
Two Brothers Running is a 1988 Australian comedy film .
Docks of New Orleans is a 1948 American film featuring Roland Winters in his second appearance as Charlie Chan .
Aur Pyaar Ho Gaya ( English : And Love Happened ) is a 1997 Indian Bollywood film .
I Shot a Man in Vegas is a 1995 film written and directed by Keoni Waxman , and starring John Stockwell and Janeane Garofalo .
Ruth of the Range is a 1923 American adventure film serial starring Ruth Roland that was the final one to be produced by Pathe Productions ' Chief of Serial Production , Wilson Gillets .
Night Without Stars is a 1951 British black and white dramatic thriller starring David Farrar , Nadia Gray and Maurice Teynac .
O Homem do Futuro ( lit . `` The Man from the Future '' ) is a 2011 Brazilian romantic comedy film directed by Cláudio Torres .
Shibiram is a 1997 Indian Malayalam film directed by TS Suresh Babu and starring Manoj K Jayan and Divya Unni in the lead roles .
Darfur Now is a 2007 documentary film examining the genocide in Darfur , Sudan .
First published in Venice in 1499 , in an elegant page layout , with refined woodcut illustrations in an Early Renaissance style , Hypnerotomachia Poliphili presents a mysterious arcane allegory in which Poliphilo pursues his love Polia through a dreamlike landscape , and is , seemingly , at last reconciled with her by the Fountain of Venus .
The Keys to the House ( Italian title : Le chiavi di casa ) is a 2004 dramatic family film based on the story Born Twice ( Italian title : Nati due volte ) telling the story of a young father meeting his handicapped son for the first time and attempts to forge a relationship with the teenager .
Andala Rakshasi ( English : A Beautiful Devil ) is a 2012 Telugu romance film written and directed by Hanu Raghavapudi .
Ten Dead Men is a 2008 thriller film and the follow - up to the cult independent film Left for Dead .
Jackass Number Two is a 2006 American reality comedy film .
Beyond My Grandfather Allende ( Spanish : Allende , mi abuelo Allende ) is a 2015 Chilean - Mexican documentary film directed by Marcia Tambutti Allende .
Jericho Mansions is an 2003 independent film directed by Alberto Sciamma .
Sugamana Raagangal ( Tamil : சுகமான ராகங்கள் ) is a 1985 Indian Tamil film , directed by R. Sundarrajan and produced by C. M. Aruchamy and C. M. Nanjappan .
Monday Begins on Saturday ( Russian : Понедельник начинается в субботу ) is a 1965 science fiction / science fantasy novel by Boris and Arkady Strugatsky with illustrations by Yevgeniy Migunov .
Outcasts of the City is a 1958 American drama film directed by Boris Petroff and written by Stephen Longstreet .
The Psychedelic Priest ( also known as Electric Shades of Grey and Jesus Freak ) is a 2001 American film produced by Allied International Films .
The Snake King 's Grandchild ( Khmer : រឿងចៅពស់កេងកង , Chaos puos keng kang , also Snaker 2 and Snake 's love ) is a 2006 Cambodian Romance horror film , a sequel to a 2001 film , The Snake King 's Child .
Biniax is a puzzle video game introduced first in 2005 .
Live Today , Die Tomorrow ! ( Japanese : Hadaka no jukyusai ) is a 1970 Japanese drama film based on the true story of Norio Nagayama .
Disconnect Me is a song written by Peter Boström and Tony Nilsson , and performed by Marie Serneholt at Melodifestivalen 2009 .
Transmorphers is a science fiction alien invasion film released direct - to - DVD on June 26 , 2007 .
The Harlem Globetrotters on Gilligan 's Island is a 1981 made - for - television film .
Ohileshwara ( Kannada : ಓಹಿಲೇಶ್ವರ ) is a 1956 Kannada film directed by T.V. Singh Tagore .
Batang PX or `` Fil - American kid '' in English , is a 1997 dramatic film produced by Star Cinema .
GMO OMG is a 2013 American documentary film which takes a highly negative view towards the use of genetically modified organisms in the production of food , particularly by Monsanto .
Playa blanca is a 1976 Sven Ingvars studio album .
`` Yamma , yamma '' was the Finnish entry in the Eurovision Song Contest 1992 , performed in Finnish by Pave Maijanen .
Maria do Mar is a 1930 Portuguese silent drama film , a docufiction , directed by Leitão de Barros .
Silent Souls ( Russian : Овсянки , `` The Buntings '' ) is a 2010 Russian film that was nominated for the Golden Lion at the 67th Venice Film Festival .
Yenning Amadi Likla ( English : Spring And Dew ) is a 2007 Manipuri celluloid film directed by Mankhonmani Mongsaba and produced by SURVI ( Santibala , Sunitibala , Umabati , Saroja , Victoria and Ibemhal ) , under the banner of Nongin films .
Babes in the Woods is a 1932 Silly Symphonies animated film .
SpongeBob 's Truth or Square is a 2009 made - for - television comedy film directed by Andrew Overtoom , Alan Smart , and Tom Yasumi .
Hafta Bandh is a 1991 film directed and produced by Harish Bhosle and produced by Deepak Balraj Vij .
Planet Minigolf is a PlayStation 3-exclusive minigolf video game that was released on the PlayStation Network on 1 June 2010 .
The Kidnapping of the President is a 1980 political thriller film made by Presidential Films and Sefel Films and distributed by Crown International Pictures .
Evening of Roses ( Chinese : 夜玫瑰 ; pinyin : Ya Mei Gui ) is a 2009 Chinese film by Hong Kong director Ng See - Yuen .
Warkill is a 1968 American drama film written and directed by Ferde Grofé Jr ..
Breach in the Silence ( Spanish : Brecha en el silencio ) is a 2012 Venezuelan drama film directed by Luis Rodríguez and Andrés Rodríguez .
Ek Nari Ek Brahmachari ( English : One Girl One Bachelor ) is a 1971 Bollywood comedy film produced by P. Gangadhar Rao Jothee Navshakthee Combines on the banner , directed by K. Pratyagatma .
Do n't Be a Sucker ! is an anti - racist propaganda film produced by the US War Department in 1947 .
Khoon Aur Paani ( English : Blood & Water ) is a 1981 Bollywood , Action film , produced by A.A.Nadiadwala on A.G.Films Pvt Ltd banner , directed by Chand .
Street Girls is a low budget 1975 exploitation film .
Bewitching Attraction ( Hangul : 여교수의 은밀한 매력 ; RR : Yeogyosu - ui eunmilhan maeryeok ; lit . `` The Discreet Charm of Female Professors '' ) is a 2006 South Korean black comedy film .
A Coach for Cinderella is a 1936 Technicolor animated cartoon sponsored film based on the Cinderella fairy tale .
Million Dollar Infield is a 1982 made - for - TV film , starring Bonnie Bedelia and Rob Reiner .
Jupiter Ascending is a 2015 American--
Putnanja ( Kannada : ಪುಟ್ನಂಜ ) is a 1995 Kannada language film directed by Ravichandran and produced by A. Narsimhan .
In Nacht und Eis ( English : `` In Night and Ice '' ) , also called Der Untergang der Titanic ( `` The Sinking of the Titanic '' ) is a 1912 German film about the sinking of Titanic .
Sukeban Deka The Movie ( スケバン刑事 ) is a live action Japanese film that was released in 1987 .
Lie with Me is a Canadian drama film with graphic sexual content that played at the 2005 Toronto International Film Festival .
Different for Girls is a 1996 British / French drama film in which one of the protagonists is a transsexual woman .
Casper completed The LuLu Sessions in 2011 .
Wild About Hurry is a Warner Bros. cartoon in the Merrie Melodies series featuring Wile E. Coyote and The Road Runner released on October 10 , 1959 .
A New Wave is a 2006 independently produced comedy film written and directed by Jason Carvey .
Family Flight is an American television movie that originally aired on ABC on October 25 , 1972 .
Rose of Washington Square is a 1939 American musical drama film , featuring the already well - known popular song with the same title .
Mad Professor Mariarti is a puzzle platform video game developed and published by Krisalis Software in 1990 .
Inside Story Special : £ 830,000,000 - Nick Leeson and the Fall of the House of Barings , sometimes erroneously referred to as 25 Million Pounds , is a 1996 British television documentary by filmmaker Adam Curtis .
Pillars of the Sky is an American western film in Technicolor and CinemaScope , released by Universal - International on October 12 , 1956 .
If You Love Your Children is a 2014 Canadian short film - depicting climate change , directed and produced by Sanjay Patel .
The Bodyguard 2 ( Thai : บอดี้การ์ดหน้าเหลี่ยม 2 ) is a 2007 Thai action - comedy film written , directed by and starring Petchtai Wongkamlao .
Cassette 50 ( released in Spain as Galaxy 50 - 50 Excitantes Juegos ) is a compilation of games published by Cascade Games Ltd in 1983 , and is an early example of shovelware - computer software marketed primarily on the basis of its sheer quantity rather than other factors such as quality or playability .
Reserved to Fight aired on PBS nationwide in 2008 , and has been broadcast in 8 countries and several film festivals .
Bing'ai ( Chinese : 秉爱 , also romanized Bingai ) is a 2007 Chinese documentary film directed and produced by Feng Yan ( 冯艳 ) .
God Went Surfing with the Devil is a 2010 surfing documentary directed by Alexander Klein that follows the story of a group of activists who are trying to get a shipment of 23 surfboards into the Gaza strip .
The House That Shadows Built ( 1931 ) is a short Pre - Code feature film from Paramount Pictures , made to celebrate the 20th anniversary of the studio 's founding in 1912 .
Captives is a 1994 British romantic crime drama film directed by Angela Pope and written by Dublin screenwriter Frank Deasy .
The Flight of the Aquanaut ( 1993 ) is a short Canadian documentary movie about an aquanaut with an atmospheric diving suit which shows the submarine world to the viewers in an entertaining way .
Intelligence and the Japanese Civilian was a 1945 film produced by the US Marine Corps , to instruct Marines on how they should handle the civilian population of Japan during the post - war occupation .
Boop - Oop - a - Doop is an animated short film created by the Fleischer Studios in 1932 as part of the Talkartoon series .
White Man 's Legend is a 1984 Australian TV movie about an old seaman who buys a boat .
Freeing Bernie Baran made its world premiere on September 11 , 2010 at the Austin Gay & Lesbian International Film Festival ( aGLIFF23 ) with Bernie Baran and director Daniel Alexander in attendance .
Bridges of Sarajevo ( French : Les Ponts de Sarajevo ) is a 2014 documentary anthology film exploring Sarajevo present and past , directed by thirteen different directors .
Locuras , tiros y mambos is an 1951 Argentine film .
Letters to Angel ( Estonian : Kirjad Inglile ) is a 2010 Estonian comedy film directed by Sulev Keedus .
Wild Wings is a 1966 British short documentary film directed by Patrick Carey and John Taylor and produced by British Transport Films .
The Chechahcos is a 1924 silent film about the gold rush days in the Klondike .
Mysterious Island 2 ( Chinese : 孤岛惊魂2 ) is a 2013 Chinese horror film directed by Rico Chung .
Lion in the Valley is the 1986 fourth novel in a series of historical mystery novels , written by Elizabeth Peters and featuring fictional sleuth and archaeologist Amelia Peabody .
Aeria Games announced Twelve Sky Closed Beta on September 5 , 2007 .
Promise the Moon is a 1997 film by Kevin Sullivan , based on the book The Four Arrows Fe - As - Ko by Randall Beth Platt .
Sneham Oru Pravaaham is a 1981 Indian Malayalam film , directed by Dr Shajahan .
Athirthikal is a 1988 Indian Malayalam film , directed by JD Thottan .
Ami Aadu , formerly titled Aadur Prem , is a 2011 Bengali film produced by New Theatres and directed by Somnath Gupta .
Leon the Pig Farmer is a 1992 British comedy about a Jewish estate agent in London who discovers that thanks to an artificial insemination mishap , his real father owns a pig farm in Yorkshire .
HoboSapiens was released by EMI in Europe on 6 October 2003 , and nearly a year later in the United States by Or Music on 7 September 2004 .
Voyage of the Damned is a 1976 drama film , which was based on a 1974 book written by Gordon Thomas and Max Morgan - Witts with the same title .
Vetri Selvan is a 2014 Indian Tamil thriller drama film directed by Rudhran featuring Ajmal Ameer and Radhika Apte in the lead roles .
The Questor Tapes is a 1974 television movie about an android ( portrayed by Robert Foxworth ) with incomplete memory tapes who is searching for his creator and his purpose .
Aerial Anarchists is a 1911 British silent science fiction film directed by Walter R. Booth .
Red Tail Reborn is a 2007 historical documentary film by Adam White about the Commemorative Air Force 's Red Tail Project .
Shibaji ( Bengali : শিবাজী `` '' ) ( 2008 ) is a Bengali film Directed by Babu Ray .
Aeg elada , aeg armastada is a 1976 Soviet Estonian film directed by Veljo Käsper .

Married to Music is a 2001 biography by Margaret Campbell published by Robson Books of the British cellist Julian Lloyd Webber ( with a foreword by Lady Evelyn Barbirolli ) .
The Hare - Brained Hypnotist is a Bugs Bunny cartoon in the Merrie Melodies series , released on October 31 , 1942 .
Return to the Lost World is a 1992 film , a sequel to the film The Lost World , which was released the same year .
Astro Duck or The Astroduck is a 1966 Looney Tunes cartoon featuring Daffy Duck and Speedy Gonzales .
The Lost Letter ( Russian : Пропа́вшая гра́мота , Propavshaya gramota ) , or A Disappeared Diploma , is a 1945 Soviet animated film directed by the `` grandmothers of the Russian animation '' , Brumberg sisters , and Lamis Bredis .
Radha Ka Sangam is a 1992 Hindi romance film directed and produced by Kirti Kumar .
The Soul Collector is a 1999 Christian television film .
In the Firelight is a 1913 American silent short silent film directed by Thomas Ricketts and based on a poem written by Marc Edmund Jones .
Pleasure Pill is a short film , made in Cardiff , Wales as part of the Screen Gems scheme run by Sgrin Media Agency , HTV and the UK Film Council in 2002 .
Sardar Papa Rayudu is a 1980 Telugu , fictional , historical film .
One Hundred Mornings is a 2009 post - apocalyptic Irish drama film written and directed by Conor Horgan .
The Green Goblin 's Last Stand is a 1992 fan film by Dan Poole , based on the comic book story `` The Night Gwen Stacy Died '' , published by Marvel Comics in The Amazing Spider - Man # 121 - -122 .
How to Survive a Plague is a 2012 American documentary film about the early years of the AIDS epidemic , and the efforts of ACT UP and TAG .
Roger Clemens ' MVP Baseball is a baseball video game released in North America during the years of 1991 and 1992 for the NES , Game Boy , Super NES , and Sega Genesis .
The Burning Dead ( also Volcano Zombies ) is a 2015 American horror film directed by Rene Perez , written by Jeff Miller and Jason Ancona , and starring Tom Downey and Moniqa Plante .
Sarfarosh ( translation : Fervour ) is a 1999 Indian action thriller - drama film .
Ronal the Barbarian ( Danish : Ronal barbaren ) is a 2011 Danish stereoscopic computer animation feature film directed by Thorbjørn Christoffersen , Kresten Vestbjerg Andersen and Philip Einstein Lipski .
Before We Forget is a 2011 observational documentary film about two women with dementia , who live in an Asian society where terminal illnesses and dying remain taboo .
L'Esprit de Mopti ( English : spirit of Mopti ) is a 1999 documentary film about the city of Mopti , directed by Moussa Ouane .
We Are the People We 've Been Waiting For is a 2009 documentary film directed by Daryl Goodrich and produced by Caroline Rowland .
Libertarias ( English : Libertarians ) is a Spanish historical drama made in 1996 .
Santa 's Apprentice ( original French title L'Apprenti Père Noel ) is a French - Australian - Irish animated film made by Gaumont - Alphanim ( now Gaumont Animation ) in 2010 .
Anpadh ( Hindi : अन्पढ , Urdu : اَنپد , translation : illiterate ) is a 1962 Hindi film .
Star Wars Trilogy Arcade is an arcade game first released in 1999 .
Vietnam Nurses is a 2005 television documentary directed by Polly Watkins .
Being Mick is a 2001 television film which chronicles the life of Mick Jagger for one year .
Video magazine reviewed the VCS version of Demon Attack in 1982 , describing it as `` quite simply excellent '' , and characterizing it as a `` true coin - op - level program '' .
La môme vert - de - gris ( French for `` The Greyish - Green Dame '' ) , released in the USA as Poison Ivy , is a 1953 French crime film .
EverQuest launched with modest expectations from Sony on 16 March 1999 under its Verant Interactive brand and quickly became successful .
Novia , Esposa y Amante ( English : Girlfriend , wife and lover ) is a Mexican motion picture categorized as drama and romance film released in 1980 .
A New Cure for Divorce is a 1912 American silent short drama film written by Lloyd Lonergan .
The Dead Matter is 2010 American feature - length horror film by filmmakers Edward Douglas of Midnight Syndicate , Gary Jones , and Robert Kurtzman .
She Makes Comics is a 2014 documentary film about the history of women in the comic book industry since the medium 's beginnings in the early 1900s .
Live at the Cavern Club is a 1999 concert film starring Paul McCartney .
Manavudu Danavudu ( Telugu : మానవుడు - దానవుడు ) is a 1972 Telugu drama film produced by p. chinnapa reddy of ushasri films and directed by P. Chandrasekhara Reddy .
Time 's Raging is a 1985 Australian TV movie about a 38-year - old woman who wants a baby .
The Opry House ( 1929 ) , first released on March 28 , 1929 , was the fifth Mickey Mouse short to be released , the second of that year .
The Last Married Couple in America is a 1980 comedy film released in the US .
Jeevana Tharanga ( Kannada : ಜೀವನ ತರಂಗ ) is a 1963 Indian Kannada film , directed by G. Bangar Raj and produced by D R Naidu .
The Mississippi Law Journal is a law review published at the University of Mississippi School of Law .
Linguistic Inquiry is a peer - reviewed academic journal in generative linguistics published by the MIT Press since 1970 .
Stardance is a science fiction novel by Spider Robinson and Jeanne Robinson , published by Dial Press in 1979 as part of its Quantum science fiction line .
God of War II is a third person action - adventure video game developed by Santa Monica Studio and published by Sony Computer Entertainment ( SCE ) .
Dragonsbane is a fantasy novel written by author Barbara Hambly and published by Del Rey Books in 1985 .
Afterwards it appeared in the collection The Wizard of Venus ( Ace Books , August 1970 ) .
Martin Heidegger , Being and Time , trans . by John Macquarrie & Edward Robinson ( London : SCM Press , 1962 ) .
Journal of Applied Non - Classical Logics is a peer reviewed journal published in the United Kingdom by Taylor & Francis .
Wizards and Rogues of the Realms was designed by William W. Connors , and published by TSR in 1995 .
Wacky Wheels is an MS - DOS arcade kart racing video game released by Apogee Software in 1994 .
Journal of Employment Counseling is a quarterly peer - reviewed academic journal published by Wiley - Blackwell on behalf of the American Counseling Association and the National Employment Counseling Association .
Norsk Militært Tidsskrift ( English : Norwegian Military Journal ) is a Norwegian journal first issued in 1831 , and published by Oslo Militære Samfund from 1835 .
Monsters of Men is a young - adult science fiction novel by Patrick Ness , published by Walker Books in May 2010 .
Emlyn Hughes International Soccer ( EHIS ) is a soccer computer game first released in 1988 by Audiogenic Software Ltd ..
The Tulane Law Review , a publication of the Tulane University Law School , was founded in 1916 , and is currently published six times annually .
Microbiology and Molecular Biology Reviews ( published as MMBR ) is a peer - reviewed scientific journal published by the American Society for Microbiology .
Todd 's Adventures in Slime World is a side - scrolling platform game for the Atari Lynx , Sega Mega Drive / Genesis , and PC Engine CD video game systems .
Medical Hypotheses is a medical journal published by Elsevier .
Tomba ! was developed by Whoopee Camp and published by Sony Computer Entertainment .
High Windows is a collection of poems by English poet Philip Larkin , and was published in 1974 by Faber and Faber Limited .
Spyborgs is a beat 'em up video game for the Wii developed by Bionic Games and published by Capcom .
Woodsmen of the West is a novel by Martin Allerdale Grainger , first published in 1908 by Edward Arnold .
Fossil Fighters , known in Japan as Bokura wa Kasekihoridā ( ぼくらはカセキホリダー lit . `` We Are Fossil Diggers '' ) , is a 2008 video game developed by Nintendo SPD , Red Entertainment , M2 , and Artdink and published by Nintendo .
Theory of Games and Economic Behavior , published in 1944 by Princeton University Press , is a book by mathematician John von Neumann and economist Oskar Morgenstern which is considered the groundbreaking text that created the interdisciplinary research field of game theory .
Little House in the Big Woods is an autobiographical children 's novel written by Laura Ingalls Wilder and published by Harper in 1932 ( reviewed in June ) .
The English edition The German Lesson was published in 1986 by New Directions Publishing , New York City .
Super Bonk ( released in Europe as Super B.C. Kid and in Japan as Chō Genjin ) is a 1994 2D platform video game , developed by Red Company and published by Hudson Soft for the Super Nintendo Entertainment System .
Daddy 's Roommate is a children 's book written by Michael Willhoite and published by Alyson Books in 1991 ( ISBN 1555831184 ) .
Puzzle De Pon ! is a puzzle video game made by the Taito Corporation in 1995 .
Critical Reviews in Eukaryotic Gene Expression ( ISSN 1045 - 4403 ) is a quarterly scientific journal published by Begell House publishing reviews on topics related to gene regulation , organization , and structure within contexts of biological control and diagnosis / treatment of disease .
Long River Review is University of Connecticut 's award - winning annual literary magazine / journal run by undergraduate students with the assistance of faculty staff .
Bioscience Horizons is published by a consortium of UK universities in partnership with Oxford University Press and was established in 2008 .
Contemporary Family Therapy is a peer - reviewed academic journal covering research on family therapy , focusing on recent applied practice and developments in theory and research that is published quarterly by Springer Science+Business Media .
Complete Adventurer is a supplemental hard - cover rulebook for the 3.5 edition of the Dungeons & Dragons game system published by Wizards of the Coast .
`` The New Prime '' is a science fiction novelette written by Jack Vance and first published in the February 1951 issue of Worlds Beyond as `` Brain of the Galaxy '' .
Enter the Saint is a collection of three interconnected adventure novellas by Leslie Charteris first published in the United Kingdom by Hodder and Stoughton in October 1930 , followed by an American edition by The Crime Club in April 1931 .
Monographs in Systematic Botany also known as Monographs in Systematic Botany from the Missouri Botanical Garden is a series of monographs relating to the study of systematic botany .
Porky Pig 's Haunted Holiday is a 1995 side - scrolling platform video game developed by Phoenix Interactive Entertainment and published by Sunsoft for the Super Nintendo Entertainment System video game console .
The Mexican Law Review is a biannual peer reviewed law journal published by the Institute for Legal Research ( Instituto de Investigaciones Jurídicas ) of the National Autonomous University of Mexico .
Chameleon Twist ( カメレオンツイスト Kamereon Tsuisuto ) is a platformer developed by Japan System Supply and published for the Nintendo 64 in 1997 by Sunsoft .
Volo 's Guide to the Dalelands was published by TSR in 1996 , and was designed by Ed Greenwood , with cover art by Cireulo Cabral and interior art by Theresa Brandon , Tony Crnkovich , Ned Dameron , and Valerie Valusek .
Mystic Inn is a casual game developed by the team formerly known as Funpause , now part of Big Fish Studios , and distributed by Big Fish Games .
Entertainment and Sports Lawyer is a law review published by the Forum on the Entertainment and Sports Industries of the American Bar Association .
Tuan Direktur was first published as a serial ( roman picisan ) in Hamka 's newspaper Pedoman Masjarakat before being picked up by the colony 's state publisher , Balai Pustaka , in 1939 .
Gods of Aberdeen is a novel written by Micah Nathan , published in June 2005 by Simon & Schuster .
Deakin Law Review is an Australian peer - reviewed law review published biannually by Deakin University School of Law .
The Dictionary of Medieval Latin from British Sources is a lexicon of Medieval Latin , published by Oxford University Press for the British Academy , and sometimes referred to as simply the Dictionary of Medieval Latin or the Medieval Latin Dictionary .
Major League Baseball 2K12 or , in short , MLB 2K12 , is a Major League Baseball licensed baseball simulation video game published by 2 K Sports that was released for the PlayStation 2 , PlayStation 3 , PlayStation Portable , Microsoft Windows , Nintendo DS , Wii and Xbox 360 on March 6 , 2012 .
They Do It with Mirrors is a work of detective fiction by Agatha Christie and first published in the US by Dodd , Mead and Company in 1952 under the title of Murder with Mirrors and in UK by the Collins Crime Club on 17 November that year under Christie 's original title .
Hulk Hogan 's Main Event is a professional wrestling fighting game starring Hulk Hogan created by Panic Button and published by Majesco Entertainment for the Xbox 360 .
Chuck Yeager 's Air Combat , often shortened as CYAC , is a 1991 combat flight simulator video game by Electronic Arts .
Battle Clash , known in Japan as Space Bazooka ( スペースバズーカ ) , is a mecha - themed light gun shooting game produced by Nintendo and Intelligent Systems and released for the Super Nintendo Entertainment System in 1992 .
Lords of Karma is a text adventure computer game that was produced by Avalon Hill ( a company primarily known for board games ) in 1980 .
National Lampoon Art Poster Book was an American humor book that was published in large format softcover in 1975 by Harmony Books .
Little Samson , known in Japan as Seirei Densetsu Rikkuru ( 聖鈴伝説リックル , Lickle : Legend of the Holy Bell ) , is a 1992 action platformer video game developed by Takeru and published by Taito Corporation for the Nintendo Entertainment System .
Courting Justice is a non - fiction book by David Boies , published in 2004 by Miramax Books .
Originally published in 1993 , by Ace Books , it was reprinted in 2003 along with Orca in the omnibus The Book of Athyra .
Published by St. Martin 's Press in 2006 , Eat This Book provides a firsthand look into this sometimes controversial sport .
The Journal of Nonlinear Mathematical Physics ( JNMP ) is a mathematical journal published by Taylor & Francis .

In 1940 , Harper reissued the volume as Uncle Tom 's Children :
With the twenty - fifth issue of Yummy Fur in 1991 , Brown switched publishers to the Montreal - based Drawn and Quarterly , who published a collected and revised edition of The Playboy in 1992 ; this was the first graphic novel from the publisher .
The Best of Stanley G. Weinbaum is a collection of science fiction stories by Stanley G. Weinbaum , published in 1974 as an original paperback by Ballantine Books .
In February 2010 , it was announced that Gladiator A.D. had secured a publisher , Sega , and had its name changed to Tournament of Legends .
`` The Cask of Amontillado '' ( sometimes spelled `` The Casque of Amontillado '' ) is a short story by Edgar Allan Poe , first published in the November 1846 issue of Godey 's Lady 's Book .
Carrion Comfort is a science fiction / horror novel by American writer Dan Simmons , published in 1989 in hard cover by Dark Harvest and in 1990 in paperback by Warner Books .
By Heresies Distressed is a science fiction novel written by David Weber and published by Tor Books .
Army Corps of Hell is an action - strategy video game developed by Entersphere and released by Square Enix for the PlayStation Vita .
Rockman EXE The Medal Operation is an arcade game in the MegaMan Battle Network sub - series of Mega Man games from Capcom .
German Studies Review is a peer - reviewed academic journal and an official publication of the German Studies Association that is published triannually .
Combat Flight Simulator WWII Europe Series ( CFS1 ) is the first version of combat flight simulators from Microsoft , released November 1 , 1998 .
The Journal of Adolescent & Adult Literacy is a peer - reviewed academic journal published eight times per year by Wiley - Blackwell .
Lynx Casino is a 1992 game for the Atari Lynx developed by Brian A. Rice Inc. You can play Blackjack , Craps , Roulette , slots and video poker .
Quaternary International is a peer - reviewed scientific journal on Quaternary science published by Elsevier on behalf of the International Union for Quaternary Research .
Major League Baseball 2K11 or , in short , MLB 2K11 , is an MLB licensed baseball simulation video game published by 2 K Sports .
Racing Destruction Set is a car racing and motocross computer game that was published in 1985 by Electronic Arts .
PLOS Computational Biology is a peer - reviewed computational biology journal established in 2005 and published by the nonprofit Public Library of Science in association with the International Society for Computational Biology .
Zeitschrift für anorganische und allgemeine Chemie ( Journal for Inorganic and General Chemistry ) is a peer - reviewed scientific journal dealing with inorganic chemistry , published by Wiley - VCH .
Analog Integrated Circuits and Signal Processing is a monthly peer - reviewed scientific journal that is published by Springer Science+Business Media .
After being out of print for forty years , O Presidente Negro was re - issued by the Brazilian publisher Editora Globo in March 2008 , when Barack Obama 's presidential campaign in the United States revived interest in the work .
The Boston College Law Review ( Bluebook abbreviation : B.C. L. Rev. ) is an academic journal of legal scholarship and student organization at Boston College Law School .
`` The Problem of the Covered Bridge '' ( 1974 ) is a mystery short story by Edward D. Hoch which was first published in Ellery Queen 's Mystery Magazine ( Dec 1974 issue ) .
Tom Swift and His Photo Telephone , or , The Picture That Saved A Fortune , is Volume 17 in the original Tom Swift novel series published by Grosset & Dunlap .

Maria Mandl ( also spelled Mandel ; 10 January 1912 -- 24 January 1948 ) was an Austrian SS - Helferin infamous for her key role in the Holocaust as a top - ranking official at the Auschwitz - Birkenau extermination camp where she is believed to have been directly complicit in the deaths of over 500,000 female prisoners .
Nicole Russell , Duchess of Bedford ( often known professionally as Nicole Milinaire ; 29 June 1920 , Paris-6 September 2012 ) was one of the first female television producers in France , and then became the Duchess of Bedford , helping to open and popularize one of the first Stately homes to the public - Woburn Abbey .
Cornelia Sorabji ( 15 November 1866 -- 6 July 1954 ) was the first female advocate from India when admitted to the Allahabad High Court in Uttar Pradesh .

Christian Forcellini ( born November 10 , 1969 ) is a male former tennis player and sprinter from San Marino .

Brittany Johnston ( born January 6 , 1986 ) is an American female professional golfer currently playing on the Futures Tour .
Rubert Martínez Texidor ( born July 16 , 1985 ) is a male judoka from Cuba , who won the silver medal in the men 's lightweight division ( -- 73 kg ) at the 2003 Pan American Games .

Stelis zootrophionoides is a species of orchid discovered in the Neotropics , an area with the highest diversity in Andean South America .
Cervicorniphora alcicornis is a species of Australian hoverfly , and the only species in the genus Cervicorniphora .
Uintatheriidae is a family of extinct ungulate mammals that includes Uintatherium .
Clariallabes mutsindoziensis is a species of airbreathing catfish endemic to Burundi where it is found in the Malagarasi River .
Eleocharis geniculata is a species of spikesedge known by several common names , including bent spikerush and Canada spikesedge .
Megacephala serrella is a species of ground beetle in the subfamily of Carabinae that was described by Sumlin in 1997 , and is native to Australia .
Bombus mixtus is a species of bumble bee in the Pyrobombus subgenus .
Ipomoea obscura , the obscure morning glory or small white morning glory , is a species of the genus Ipomoea .
The Dreissenidae are a family of small freshwater mussels , aquatic bivalve mollusks .
Rokopella is a genus of living monoplacophoran .
Crypturellus is a genus of tinamous containing mostly forest species .
Lebia menetriesi is a species of ground beetles in the Harpalinae subfamily that can be found in Ukraine and southern part of Russia .
Eurychone rothschildiana is a species of flowering plants in the Orchidaceae family .
Salmo pallaryi was a species of trout that inhabited a single lake in the Atlas mountains of northern Morocco , at higher than 2000 metres altitude .
The Red Cracker ( Hamadryas amphinome ) is a species of cracker butterfly in the family Nymphalidae .
Pulsatilla alpina ( alpine pasqueflower or alpine anemone ) is a species of flowering plant in the family Ranunculaceae , native to the mountain ranges of central and southern Europe , from central Spain to Croatia .
Eurypteroidea are an extinct superfamily of eurypterids .
Smittium is a genus of fungi in the order Harpellales .
Chicoreus aculeatus , common name the pendant murex , is a species of predatory sea snail , a marine gastropod mollusk in the family Muricidae , the murex snails or rock snails .
Dasyatis ushiei , the cow stingray or Ushi stingray , is a species of stingray known from a single specimen .
Recilia latifrons ( rice broad - headed leafhopper ) is a species of bug from the Cicadellidae family that can be found in countries such as China , Japan , Korea , and the Russian maritime .
Xyloskenea xenos is a species of sea snail , a marine gastropod mollusc , unassigned in the superfamily Seguenzioidea .
Carex barbarae is a species of sedge known by the common name Santa Barbara sedge .
Symphyotrichum sericeum is a species of flowering plant in the aster family known by several common names , including western silver aster and silky aster .
Leithiinae is a subfamily of dormice .
Homopus boulengeri , commonly known as the Karoo padloper or Boulenger 's cape tortoise , is a species of tortoise endemic to the Nama Karoo Region of South Africa .
Martensia martensi is a species of amphipod crustacean , and the only species in the genus Martensia .
It contains the single species Amphelarctia priscilla , which is found in French Guiana , Venezuela , Ecuador , Peru and Costa Rica .
Consul fabius , common name tiger leafwing , is the most common and well known species of the genus Consul of subfamily Charaxinae in the brush - footed butterfly family ( Nymphalidae ) .
Equus scotti ( translated from Latin as Scott 's horse , named after vertebrate paleontologist William Berryman Scott ) is an extinct species of Equus , the genus that includes the horse .
Pristiophorus is a genus of sawsharks found in the Pacific , Atlantic and Indian oceans .
Zanthoxylum kauaense , commonly known as Aʻe or Kauaʻi pricklyash , is a species of flowering plant in the citrus family , Rutaceae , that is endemic to Hawaii .
Acmispon wrangelianus is a species of legume known by the common names Chilean bird's - foot trefoil and Chile lotus .
Thermopsis montana , the false lupin , mountain goldenbanner , golden pea , mountain thermopsis , or revonpapu , is a plant species which is native of the western United States .
Palaeoraphe is an extinct genus of palm , represented by one species , Palaeoraphe dominicana from early Miocene Burdigalian stage Dominican amber deposits on the island of Hispaniola .
Puffinus is a genus of seabirds in the order Procellariiformes .
Platystacus cotylephorus , the Banded banjo , is a species of banjo catfish .
Mirosternus lugubris is a species of beetles in the genus Mirosternus of the family Anobiidae .
Oemleria cerasiformis , a shrub commonly known as osoberry or Indian plum , is the sole species in genus Oemleria .
Prohylus phanthasma is a species of beetle in the family Cerambycidae , and the only species in the genus Prohylus .
Paratrimma is a genus of gobies endemic to Chile where they are only found around the Juan Fernández Islands and the Desventuradas Islands in the southeastern Pacific Ocean .
Jensia rammii is a species of flowering plant in the aster family known by the common name Ramm 's madia .
Olearia homolepis is a species of flowering plant in the family Asteraceae , endemic to Western Australia .
Bathyopsis is an extinct genus of uintathere
The Sumatra toad , Duttaphrynus sumatranus , is a species of toad endemic to Sumatra , Indonesia , and only known from Lubuk Selasi .
The Smoothbelly sardinella ( Amblygaster leiogaster ) , also known as blue sardine , blue sprat , bluebait , is a reef - associated marine species of sardinellas in the herring family Clupeidae .
Orthetrum latihami , is an African freshwater dragonfly species .
Lysiphyllum hookeri is a species of small tree endemic to Queensland , Australia , of the legume plant family Fabaceae .
Thesprotia graminis , common name American grass mantis or Grass - Like Mantis , is a species of praying mantis native to the Southern United States .
Carduus acanthoides , known as the spiny plumeless thistle , welted thistle , and plumeless thistle , is a biennial plant species of thistle in the Asteraceae -- sunflower family .
Brassavola martiana is a species of orchid found in South Tropical America .
Haliplus concolor is a species of beetle in the genus Haliplus .
Sorbus randaiensis is a species of rowan that is native to the high mountains of Taiwan ( altitude 2,100 - -3,950 m ) .
Pittasoma is a genus of birds in the gnateater family .
Allopterigeron is a genus of flowering plants in the daisy family described as a genus in 1981 .
Colonus puerperus is a species of jumping spider commonly found in the eastern United States .
Tithoes confinis , common name Giant Longhorn beetle , is a species of beetle belonging to the family Cerambycidae .
Bombus consobrinus is a species of bumblebee found in Hungary , northern Scandinavia , Kazakhstan , Russia ( Saghalien , Siberia ) , China ( Soyorei , Hebei , Liaoning ) , North and South Korea , and Japan .
The Sacramento Mountain salamander ( Aneides hardii ) is a species of salamander in the family Plethodontidae .
Rafinesquia , commonly known as plumeseed , is a genus of flowering plants in the dandelion family , native to the western United States and northwestern Mexico .
Aschisma kansanum is a species of moss in the Pottiaceae family .
Hydrangea caudatifolia is a species of Hydrangea found in China .
Achatinella phaeozona is a species of air - breathing tree snail , an arboreal pulmonate gastropod mollusk in the family Achatinellidae .
Turbonilla krakstadi is a species of sea snail , a marine gastropod mollusk in the family Pyramidellidae , the pyrams and their allies .
Magnolia rostrata , common name is Beaked magnolia , is a species of plant in the Magnoliaceae family .
Exocoetoides ( meaning `` resemblant of the flying fish '' ) is a genus of prehistoric fish .
Nebria fulgida is a species of ground beetle in the Nebriinae subfamily that can be found in Russian autonomous republics such as Khamar - Daban , Buryat Republic , and East Sayan .
Dolichovespula adulterina is a species of parasitic social wasp .
Diastylis laevis is a species of crustacean belonging to the order Cumacea and the genus Diastylis .
Eriogonum viridescens is a species of wild buckwheat known by the common name twotooth buckwheat .
