Restrepia iris , commonly called the Rainbow Restrepia , is a species of orchid endemic to southeastern Ecuador .
Chrysotila is a genus of haptophytes , comprising the two species Chrysotila lamellosa and Chrysotila stipitata .
Scaevola taccada is sometimes found growing in loose plant communities with coconut palms , soldierbush , beach morning glory , beach gardenia , several pandanus species , beach calophyllum followed by portia tree , sea almond , beach hibiscus , Cordia subcordata and others .
Sphaerocarpos texanus , the Texas balloonwort , is a species of liverwort in the Sphaerocarpaceae family , found in the Americas , northern Africa and Europe .
Cyathea dimorpha is a species of tree fern native to central and southeastern Sulawesi , where it grows at an altitude of 120 - 1700 m. The trunk is erect and 3 - 4 m tall .
Chlamydiae is a bacterial phylum and class whose members are obligate intracellular pathogens .
Wyethia mollis is a species of flowering plant in the aster family known by the common name woolly mule 's ears .
Macrozamia macdonnellii is a species of plant in the Zamiaceae family .
Apterodon is an extinct genus of Hyaenodontid mammal that lived from the mid Eocene through the Oligocene epoch .
Carabus albrechti okumurai is a subspecies of ground beetle from Carabidae family that is endemic to Japan .
Cylindera arenaria is a species of ground beetle of the subfamily Cicindelinae that can be found everywhere in Europe except for Estonia , Portugal , Northwestern Europe , and various European islands .
Sphincterochila candidissima is a species of air - breathing land snail , a terrestrial pulmonate gastropod mollusk in the family Sphincterochilidae .
Augustula braueri is a species of air - breathing land snail , terrestrial pulmonate gastropod mollusk in the family Streptaxidae .
Euglyphis rivulosa is a species of Moth in the family Lasiocampidae .
Lampetra is a genus of lampreys in the subfamily Petromyzontinae .
Rhinoncus is a genus of weevil .
Phoradendron juniperinum is a species of flowering plant in the sandalwood family known by the common name juniper mistletoe .
Isocoma menziesii is a species of flowering plant in the daisy family , known by the common name Menzies ' goldenbush .
Ithystenus curvidens is a species of straight - snouted weevils belonging to the family Brentidae .

Daudebardia brevipes is a species of air - breathing land snail or semi - slug , a terrestrial pulmonate gastropod mollusk in the family Oxychilidae which belongs to the `` Limacoid clade '' .
Okinawepipona is a small genus of potter wasps known from Taiwan and the Ryukyu Islands .
Pseudopontia is a genus of butterflies found only in wet forests of tropical Africa .
Notosetia is a genus of minute sea snails or micromolluscs , marine gastropod molluscs in the family Turbinidae .
Planaxis sulcatus , common name the tropical periwinkle , is a species of sea snail , a marine gastropod mollusk in the family Planaxidae .
Myosurus apetalus is a species of flowering plant in the buttercup family known by the common name bristly mousetail .
Diloma concamerata , common name the speckled periwinkle , is a species of sea snail , a marine gastropod mollusk in the family Trochidae , the top snails .
Sepia dollfusi is a species of cuttlefish native to the Red Sea and southern part of the Suez Canal .
Parodia magnifica is a species of flowering plant in the Cactaceae family , native to southern Brazil .
The Munnidae are a family of isopod crustaceans , containing these genera :
Duttaphrynus is a genus of true toads .
Crematogaster aegyptiaca is an uncommon species of ant found mostly in Egypt .
Titusvillia was a genus of colonial glass sponges that existed during the carboniferous period around 300 million years ago .
Gyraulus parvus is a species of freshwater snail in the family Planorbidae , the ram 's horn snails .
The Arthrodermataceae are a family of fungi containing three dermatophytes -- genera Epidermophyton , Microsporum and Trichophyton .
Echinocereus coccineus ( scarlet hedgehog cactus ) is a species of hedgehog cactus .
Plectopyloidea is a taxonomic superfamily of air - breathing land snails , terrestrial pulmonate gastropod mollusks in the informal group Sigmurethra .
Neochetina is a genus of weevils known as water hyacinth weevil which are native to South America .
Hydrodynastes is a small genus of large colubrid snakes in the subfamily Xenodontinae .
Cistecephalidae is an extinct family of dicynodont therapsids from the Late Permian of South Africa .
Scaldicetus is an extinct genus of toothed cetacean related to sperm whales .
Nanshiungosaurus is a genus of therizinosaurian theropod dinosaur from the Cretaceous of China .
Stachys floridana is a species of betony in the mint family , Lamiaceae .
Mycena strobilinoides , commonly known as the scarlet fairy helmet , is a species of agaric fungus in the family Mycenaceae .
Mecomma ambulans is a species of bugs in the Miridae family that can be found throughout Europe ( except for Portugal ) and the far north , and as far east as China .
Turdoides is a genus of passerine birds in the Leiothrichidae family .
The Phalangodidae are a family of harvestmen with about 20 genera and more than 100 described species , distributed in the Holarctic Region .
Koyaga senex is a species of moth of the Noctuidae family .
Mallotus japonicus , the food wrapper plant or Akamegashiwa in Japanese , is a plant species in the genus Mallotus native to China .
Adenium oleifolium is a species of flowering plant in the dogbane family .
Acinetobacter radioresistens is a species of radiation - resistant bacteria .
Brachyopoidea is a superfamily of temnospondyls that lived during the Mesozoic .
Alosa sphaerocephala , or the Agrakhan shad , is a species of clupeid ( herring - like ) fish , one of the endemic shad species in the Caspian Sea .
Phallomedusa solida is a species of small , air - breathing land snail with an operculum , a pulmonate gastropod mollusc in the family Phallomedusidae .
Negalasa fumalis is a species of snout moth in the genus Negalasa .
Acartauchenius minor is a species of sheet weaver found in Italy .
In 1992 the type species Iberomesornis romerali was named and described by José Luis Sanz and José Fernando Bonaparte .
Heliaeschna ugandica is a species of dragonfly in the family Aeshnidae , known commonly as the uganda duskhawker .
Tyrannophryne pugnax , the tyrant devil is a species of deep - sea anglerfish in the dreamer family , Oneirodidae .
Isfjordosaurus is an extinct genus of ichthyopterygian marine reptile that lived during the Early Triassic .
Festuca mairei ( Atlas fescue ) is a densely - clumped species of grass , endemic to north Africa , with culms 50 - -100 cm long .
Huntsman spiders , members of the family Sparassidae ( formerly Heteropodidae ) , are known by this name because of their speed and mode of hunting .
Lachesilla merzi is a species of Psocoptera from Lachesillidae family that is endemic to Spain .
Balaka seemannii is a species of flowering plant in the Arecaceae family that is endemic to Fiji ; growing in mixed forests on Vanua Levu and Taveuni islands .
Phantazoderus frenatus is a species of longhorn beetle in the Cerambycinae subfamily , and the only species in the genus Phantazoderus .
Laminacauda fuegiana is a species of sheet weaver found in Chile and the Falkland Islands .
Castilleja minor is a species of flowering plant in the broomrape family known by the common name lesser Indian paintbrush .
Peperomia wheeleri is a rare species of flowering plant in the pepper family known by the common name Wheeler 's peperomia .
Noeggerathia is an extinct genus of noeggerathialean plant that lived during the Late Carboniferous and Early Permian periods .
Ptychochromis is a genus of cichlids endemic to rivers and lakes in Madagascar .
Cicindela tuberculata is a species of tiger beetle in the subfamily Cicindelinae of the family Carabidae , endemic to New Zealand .
Cunninghamella echinulata is a fungus species in the genus Cunninghamella .
Klasea is a genus of Eurasian and North African plants in the thistle tribe within the daisy family .
Euscorpius alpha is a species of scorpion which is indigenous to southern Switzerland and northern Italy , west of the river Adige in northern Italy .
Sabal domingensis , the Hispaniola palmetto is a species of palm which is native to Hispaniola and Cuba .
Calyptranthera is a genus of plants in the family Apocynaceae , first described as a genus in 1996 .
Allium tricoccum ( commonly known as ramp , ramps , spring onion , ramson , wild leek , wood leek , and wild garlic ) is a North American species of wild onion widespread across eastern Canada and the eastern United States .
Astragalus acutirostris is a species of milkvetch known by the common name sharpkeel milkvetch .
Agulla mineralensis is an extinct species of snakefly in the raphidiid genus Agulla .
Black cardamom , also known as hill cardamom , Bengal cardamom , greater cardamom , Indian cardamom , Nepal cardamom , winged cardamom , or brown cardamom , comes from either of two species in the family Zingiberaceae .
Carabus splendens is a species of beetle endemic to Europe , where it is observed in mainland France and mainland Spain .
Asclepias uncialis is a species of flowering plant in the dogbane family known by the common name wheel milkweed .
Holoponerus godeffroyi is a species of beetle in the family Carabidae , the only species in the genus Holoponerus .
Magnapinna sp . B is an undescribed species of bigfin squid known only from a single immature specimen collected in the northern Atlantic Ocean .
Cirrhinus molitorella ( mud carp or dace ) is a species of ray - finned fish in the genus Cirrhinus found mainly in southern China and Vietnam .
Creocele cardinalis , the broad clingfish , is a species of clingfish found on the southern coast of Australia .
The Pakistan Agama ( Laudakia pakistanica ) a species of agamid lizard found in Pakistan .
The Picornavirales are an order of viruses with vertebrate , insect , and plant hosts .
Polypodium virginianum , commonly known as rock polypody , rock cap fern , or common polypody , is a small evergreen species of fern native to the Eastern United States and Canada .
Galium texense , the Texas bedstraw , is a species of plants in the coffee family .
Stenus zunicus is a species of rove beetle described by Casey in 1884 .
Zygadenia caducus is a species of Ommatidae in the large , extinct genus Zygadenia .
†Carelia glossema was a species of small , air - breathing , land snails , terrestrial pulmonate gastropod mollusks in the family Amastridae and superfamily Cochlicopoidea .
Basilichthys microlepidotus is a species of Neotropical silverside endemic to Chile .
Agathaumas ( /æɡəˈθɔːməs/ ; `` great wonder '' ) is a dubious genus of a large ceratopsid dinosaur that lived in Wyoming during the Late Cretaceous ( late Maastrichtian stage , 66 million years ago ) .
Cedrus brevifolia , the Cyprus cedar , is a species of conifer in the genus Cedrus .
Platyceramus was a genus of Cretaceous bivalve molluscs belonging to the extinct inoceramid lineage .
Astrebla is a small genus of xerophytic ( desert - loving ) grasses found only in Australia They are the dominant grass across much of the continent .
Cryptoblabes plagioleuca , the mango - flower moth , blossom moth or mango - flower webber , is a species of snout moth in the genus Cryptoblabes .
Strubellia paradoxa is a species of freshwater slug , a shell - less freshwater gastropod , an aquatic gastropod mollusk within the clade Acochlidiacea .
Amitostigma gracile is a species of orchid widespread across much of eastern Asia .
Huntleya gustavii is a species of orchid that occurs from Colombia and Ecuador and of late it is decreasing in population .
Phyllota squarrosa , commonly known as the dense phyllota , is a species of flowering plant in the pea family ( Fabaceae ) from eastern Australia .
Callosiope banghaasi is a moth in the Cossidae family , and the only species in the genus Callosiope .
Lammidhania is an extinct genus of the perissodactyl stem of early proboscidean ( elephant - like ) mammals , which lived from the early to middle Eocene period .
Idahoa is a monotypic genus of plants in the mustard family containing the single species Idahoa scapigera , which is known by the common names scalepod and oldstem idahoa .
Ochetellus glaber ( black house ant ) is a species of ant .
Temnoscelis waddeli is a species of beetle in the family Cerambycidae , and the only species in the genus Temnoscelis .
Cnemidaria grandifolia is a species of tree fern , whose natural distribution ranges from Trinidad and Tobago to the Paraguaná Peninsula in Venezuela .
Vaccinieae is a tribe of over 1000 species in the plant Family Ericaceae .
Pinus teocote ( Teocote ) is a species of conifer in the Pinaceae family .
Anelosimus bali is a species of spider found in Bali , Indonesia , after which the species is named .
Gecarcoidea is genus of terrestrial crabs .
Aethes atomosana , the two - spotted aethes , is a species of moth of the family Tortricidae .
Jeotgalicoccus aerolatus is a species of bacteria in the family Staphylococcaceae .
Sporidiales is an order in the kingdom of Fungi .
Carex spicata is a species of sedge in the genus Carex .
Riojasauridae is a family of sauropod - like dinosaurs from the Upper Triassic .
Brachycaudus helichrysi is a species of aphid first described by the German naturalist Johann Heinrich Kaltenbach in 1843 .
As of August 2013 the World Checklist of Selected Plant Families recognises the single species Pycnobotrya nitida .
Chiloglanis paratus , the sawfin suckermouth , is a species of upside - down catfish native to Mozambique , South Africa , Swaziland and Zimbabwe where it is found in the Pongolo , Incomati and Limpopo River systems .
Praunus flexuosus , known as the chameleon shrimp , is a species of opossum shrimp found in European waters .
Aphanomyces cochlioides is a plant pathogen that can affect commodity crops like spinach , Swiss chard , beets and related species .
Galaxiella munda is a species of fish in the Galaxiidae family .
Polygala acanthoclada is a species of flowering plant in the milkwort family known by the common names desert polygala and thorn milkwort .
Geranium renardii is a species of hardy flowering herbaceous perennial plant in the genus Geranium , in the family Geraniaceae .
Tetragnatha extensa is a species of spider found across the Northern Hemisphere .
Barbus brevidorsalis ( dwarf barb ) is a species of ray - finned fish in the genus Barbus .
Iberochondrostoma oretanum is a species of cyprinid fish endemic to Spain where it is found in the Jándula River system .
Astragalus acmophylloides , the sharp - leaved milkvetch , is a species of milkvetch that is endemic to Erzurum and Artvin provinces .
NCBI Taxonomy ID : 5145 , MycoBank # 100818 Gene cluster orthologs between Aspergillus nidulans and Podospora anserina have 63 % identical primary amino acid sequence ( even those these species are from distinct classes ) and the average amino acid of compared proteomes is 10 % less , giving rise to hypotheses of distinct species yet shared genes
Deinococcus indicus is a species of arsenic - resistant bacterium .
Zea nicaraguensis is a true grass species in the genus Zea .
Andrias scheuchzeri is an extinct species of giant salamander , which only is known from fossils .
The Yemen serin ( Crithagra menachensis ) is a species of finch in the Fringillidae family .
Pantherophis alleghaniensis , commonly called the eastern ratsnake , is a nonvenomous colubrid species endemic to North America .
Elipsocus hyalinus is a species of Psocoptera from Elipsocidae family that can be found in Great Britain and Ireland .
It contains only one species , Graphidivalva genitalis , which is found in South Africa .
Catharanthus pusillus , commonly known as the Tiny periwinkle , is a species of flowering plant in the dogbane family , Apocynaceae .
Sailfin moonfishes are a small family , Veliferidae , of lampriform fishes found in the Indian and western Pacific Oceans .
Rautiania is an extinct genus of gliding eureptilian reptile belonging to the family Weigeltisauridae .
Morelia carinata , commonly known as the rough - scaled python , is a large - scaled python species endemic to Australia .
Mesopeplum convexum is a species of scallop , marine bivalve molluscs in the family Pectinidae .
Octomeria nana is an orchid species in the genus Octomeria found in Venezuela .
Favonigobius melanobranchus , the blackthroat goby , is a species of goby native to the Indian Ocean and the western Pacific Ocean as well as being recorded in the Mediterranean Sea .
Waltherhornia speculifera is a species of beetle in the family Carabidae , the only species in the genus Waltherhornia .
Cryptocercus is a genus of Dictyoptera ( cockroaches and allies ) and the sole member of its own family Cryptocercidae .
Panaeolus tropicalis is a potent species of psilocybin mushroom .
Ozodera callidioides is a species of beetle in the family Cerambycidae , the only species in the genus Ozodera .
Protaspis is an extinct genus of pteraspidid heterostracan agnathan which lived during the Early Devonian of the United States , with fossils found in marine strata in what is now Utah , Wyoming and Idaho .
The only described species of this genus is Apothriguna legrandi that is endemic to the Seychelles ( Mahé ) .
Chimonobambusa is a genus of East Asian bamboo in the grass family .
Nyctyornis is a genus of the bee - eaters , near passerine birds in the family Meropidae .
Kiggelaria africana ( also known as the wild peach or umKokoko ) is a large , robust , low - branching African tree , and is currently the only accepted species in the genus .
Bromus carinatus is a species of brome grass known by the common names California brome and mountain brome .
Ligularia dentata ( summer ragwort or leopardplant ) is a species of flowering plant in the genus Ligularia and the family Asteraceae , native to China and Japan .
Lyncina camelopardalis , common name the camel cowrie , is a species of sea snail , a cowry , a marine gastropod mollusk in the family Cypraeidae , the cowries .
The diadema urchin or blue - black urchin ( Echinothrix diadema ) is a species of tropical sea urchin , member of the Diadematidae family .
Hyalomma dromedarii is a species of hard - bodied ticks belonging to the family Ixodidae .
Chaetocnema obesa is a species of black - coloured beetle from the family Chrysomelidae .
Stromatoporoidea is a class of aquatic invertebrates common in the fossil record from the Ordovician through the Devonian .
Paracetopsis bleekeri is a species of whale catfish endemic to Ecuador where it occurs in the Guayas River basin in the southwest .
Pyrenaearia molae is a species of small air - breathing land snail , a terrestrial pulmonate gastropod mollusk in the family Hygromiidae , the hairy snails and their allies .
Sternotomis variabilis , the Lesser Jewel Longhorn Beetle , is a species of flat - faced longhorn beetles belonging to the family Cerambycidae .
Scombrini , commonly called the true mackerels , is a tribe of ray - finned bony fishes in the mackerel family , Scombridae -- a family it shares with the Spanish mackerel , tuna and bonito tribes , plus the butterfly kingfish .
Hesperogavialis is an extinct genus of gryposuchine gavialid .
Melanochromis loriae is a species of cichlid in the Cichlidae endemic to Lake Malawi where it is only known to occur around Chipoka Island .
Antrodemus is a dubious genus of theropod dinosaur from the Kimmeridgian - Tithonian - age Upper Jurassic Morrison Formation of Middle Park , Colorado .
Nowellia wrightii is a species of liverwort in the Cephaloziaceae family .
Spathiphyllum wallisii is one of approximately 40 species in a genus of tropical evergreens .
Physalaemus albonotatus ( common name : menwig frog ) is a species of frog in the Leptodactylidae family .
Paracanthocobitis rubidipinnis also known as the Cherryfin zipper loach is a species of ray - finned fish in the genus Paracanthocobitis .
Ceroprepes lunata is a species of snout moth in the genus Ceroprepes .
Scutigerinidae is a family of Centipedes .
Plectostoma sciaphilum was a species of land snail in the family Diplommatinidae .
Micrommata ligurina is a species of huntsman spider occurring from the Mediterranean Basin to Central Asia .
Hytrosaviridae is a family of double stranded DNA viruses that infect insects .
Octomeria crassifolia is a species of orchid found from eastern Ecuador , Brazil , Paraguay , Uruguay and northern Argentina .
The Procolophonia are a suborder of herbivorous reptiles that lived from the Middle Permian till the end of the Triassic period , and are thought to be extinct today .
Colymbetes is a genus of beetle native to the Palearctic , including Europe , the Nearctic , the Near East and North Africa .
Styrax officinalis is a species of plants belonging to the family Styracaceae .
Tapocyon is an extinct genus of Miacidae , a family of primitive carnivores .
Ganoderma multipileum , commonly known as lingzhi or chizhi , is a species of polypore mushroom found in tropical Asia .
Drakaea glyptodon , commonly known as king in his carriage is a species of orchid endemic to the south -- west of Western Australia .
The thin - waisted social wasps ( genus Microstigmus ) , which typically resides in neotropic regions from Central to South America , are a small genus of wasps that build nests and live in colonies ranging in size from 1 to 18 members .
Brugmansia arborea ( angel 's trumpet ) is a species of flowering plant in the family Solanaceae .
The Central American squirrel monkey ( Saimiri oerstedii ) is a squirrel monkey species from the Pacific coast of Costa Rica and Panama .
Rubus arenicola , the sanddwelling dewberry , is an uncommon North American species of flowering plant in the rose family .
Yucca gloriosa is a species of flowering plant in the family Asparagaceae , native to the beach scrub and sandy lowlands of the southeastern USA , from the Outer Banks of Virginia and North Carolina to Florida and Alabama .
Perideridia parishii is a species of flowering plant in the carrot family known by the common name Parish 's yampah .
Pepinia amblyosperma is a plant species in the genus Pepinia .
Frullania polysticta is a species of liverwort in the Jubulaceae family .
Neolamprologus wauthioni is a species of cichlid endemic to Lake Tanganyika where it inhabits snail shells .
Bifrenaria atropurpurea is a species of orchid and the type species of the genus Bifrenaria .
Dischidodactylus colonnelloi is a species of frog in the Craugastoridae family endemic to Venezuela and only know from its type locality , Cerro Marahuaca .
Ameles decolor ( Charpentier 1825 ) , is a species of praying mantis native to Europe .
Hyllisiopsis coomani is a species of beetle in the family Cerambycidae , and the only species in the genus Hyllisiopsis .
Glyphipterix mikadonis is a species of sedge moths in the genus Glyphipterix which is endemic to Japan .
Methanothermus fervidus is a species of methanogen .
This is a monotypic genus , containing the single species Aquasphaeria dimorphospora .
Hastula androyensis is a species of sea snail , a marine gastropod mollusk in the family Terebridae , commonly referred to as the auger snails .
Spathiphyllum cochlearispathum is a plant species of the genus Spathiphyllum in the family Araceae .
Streptomyces graminifolii is a bacterium species from the genus of Streptomyces which has been isolated from the plant Sasa borealis .
Pseudobiceros hancockanus is a species of hermaphroditic marine flatworm in the family Pseudocerotidae .
Distichodus petersii is a species of fish in the Distichodontidae family .
Clypeaster durandi is a species of sea urchins of the Family Clypeasteridae .
Telmatobius jelskii is a species of frog in the Telmatobiidae family , endemic to Peru .
Aglossodes dureti is a species of snout moth in the genus Aglossodes .
Stratodus ( meaning `` stratosphere tooth '' ) is a genus of prehistoric fish .
Dolichopterus is a genus of the prehistoric sea scorpions , arthropods in the order Eurypterida .
Stephanorrhina guttata , common name Spotted Flower Beetle , is a species of beetles belonging to the Scarabaeidae family , Cetoniinae subfamily , tribe Goliathini .
Scaphander lignarius , common name the woody canoe - bubble , is a species of sea snail , a bubble snail , a marine opisthobranch gastropod mollusk in the family Scaphandridae , the canoe - bubbles .
Pristerognathus is an extinct genus of therocephalian , known from the late Middle Permian ( Capitanian ) of South Africa .
Ameromyia modesta is a species of Neuroptera from the Myrmeleontidae family .
Pogonoloma is a mushroom genus in the family Tricholomataceae in a broad sense .
Sinophoneus is an extinct genus of dinocephalian therapsid in the family Anteosauridae .
Passiflora tarminiana is a species of passionfruit .
Eragrostis hypnoides is a species of grass known by the common name teal lovegrass .
Stenophlebia is an extinct genus of dragon - damselfly from late Jurassic and early Cretaceous period .
Gargaphia solani is a subsocial species of lace bug commonly known as the eggplant lace bug .
In taxonomy , Haloferax is a genus of the Halobacteriaceae .
Esacus is a genus of bird in the stone - curlew family Burhinidae .
Nectomys magdalenae , also known as the Magdalena nectomys , is a nocturnal , semiaquatic species of rodent in the genus Nectomys of family Cricetidae .
Ambassis nalua , the scalloped glassfish or scalloped perchlet , is a species of fish in the genus Ambassis .
Jepsonia heterandra is an uncommon species of flowering plant in the saxifrage family known by the common name foothill jepsonia .
Ornithomimus ( /ˌɔːrnᵻθəˈmaɪməs , -θoʊ-/ ; `` bird mimic '' ) is a genus of ornithomimid dinosaurs from the Late Cretaceous Period of what is now North America .
Utahraptor ( meaning `` Utah 's predator '' ) is a genus of theropod dinosaurs .
Brachyiulus klisurensis is a species of milipede in the genus Brachyiulus .
Spondylus cruentus is a species of Spondylus , a genus of Bivalvia .
Zonulispira zonulata is a species of sea snail , a marine gastropod mollusk in the family Turridae , the turrids .
Malus rockii is a crabapple species in the family Rosaceae .
Sinomicrurus is a genus of venomous elapid snakes , one of several genera commonly known as Asian coral snakes or oriental coral snakes .
Turbo laminiferus , common name the crinkly turban , is a species of sea snail , marine gastropod mollusk in the family Turbinidae .
Eubotrys racemosa ( syn . Leucothoe racemosa ) is a species of flowering plant in the heath family known by the common names fetterbush , swamp doghobble , and swamp sweetbells .
Dupontia proletaria is an extinct species of small air - breathing land snail , terrestrial pulmonate gastropod mollusk in the family Euconulidae , the hive snails .
Parasitaxus usta ( Corail ) is a rare species of conifer of the family Podocarpaceae , and the sole species of the genus Parasitaxus .
It contains only one species , Turneriprocris dolens , which is found in the Australian Capital Territory , New South Wales , Queensland , South Australia , Tasmania and Victoria .
Lucifuga is a genus of viviparous brotulas .
The blue spiny lizard ( Sceloporus serrifer ) is a species of phrynosomatid lizard .
Seiodidae contains one genus , with two recognized species :
Streptanthus barbiger is a species of flowering plant in the mustard family known by the common name bearded jewelflower .
Huayna quillosa is a moth in the Cossidae family , and the only species in the genus Huayna .
Ophisternon is a genus of swamp eels .
Pseudoliparis amblystomopsis , or the hadal snailfish , is a species of snailfish from hadal depths of the North Pacific Ocean .
Lupinus latifolius is a species of lupine known by the common name broadleaf lupine .
Galanthus nivalis , the snowdrop or common snowdrop , is the best - known and most widespread of the 20 species in its genus , Galanthus .
Cyphostemma crotalarioides is a flowering plant species in the genus Cyphostemma found in Burkina Faso .
Traukutitan is a genus of possible lognkosaurian titanosaur sauropod dinosaur which lived during the late Cretaceous ( Santonian age ) .
Parascopelus ( meaning `` watches along '' ) is a genus of prehistoric fish .
Stephanomeria virgata formerly included plants that now belong to the species Stephanomeria diegensis .
Bromelia hieronymi is a species of plant in the Bromeliaceae family native to South America .
Tetraphyllidea is a large tapeworm order that contains some 60 genera and about 800 described species .
Belligobio is a small genus of cyprinid fishes containing two recognized species endemic to China .
Conus cumingii , common name Cuming 's cone , is a species of sea snail , a marine gastropod mollusk in the family Conidae , the cone snails and their allies .
Quercus pumila ( runner oak or running oak ) is a North American species of oaks in the beech family .
The genus Dyrosaurus describes an extinct Crocodylomorpha form living from the upper Cretaceous to the Eocene period , surviving the K - T mass extinction or the Cretaceous--
Mitraria is a genus of flowering plants in the family Gesneriaceae , comprising the sole species M. coccinea ( Chilean mitre flower ) .
Lachnagrostis billardierei , commonly known as Coast Blown - grass or Sand Wind Grass , is a species of plant in the true grass family .
Drosera magnifica is a species of sundew endemic to Pico Padre Ângelo ( 1500 - -1530 m asl ) in eastern Minas Gerais in southeastern Brazil , where it grows among sandstone outcrops in herbaceous and shrubby vegetation .
Cyathea australis , also known as the Rough Tree Fern , is a species of tree fern native to southeastern Queensland , New South Wales and southern Victoria in Australia , as well as Tasmania and Norfolk Island .
Hexaprotodon is a genus of Hippopotamidae that is sometimes applied to the pygmy hippopotamus .
Orthacanthus is an extinct genus of fresh - water shark from a family of prehistoric sharks known as xenacanths .
California macrophylla , commonly known as roundleaf stork 's bill , is a species of flowering plant in the geranium family , Geraniaceae .
Hydrilla ( Esthwaite Waterweed , waterthyme or hydrilla ) is a genus of aquatic plant , usually treated as containing just one species , Hydrilla verticillata , though some botanists divide it into several species .
The Chalinidae are a family of marine demosponges , with these genera :
Batrachedra tristicta is a species of moth of the Batrachedridae family .
Letheobia pallida is a species of blind snake in the Typhlopidae family .
Vexillum balutensis is a species of small sea snail , marine gastropod mollusc in the family Costellariidae , the ribbed miters .
The Vanuatu imperial pigeon ( Ducula bakeri ) is a species of bird in the family Columbidae .
Crataerina pallida , the swift lousefly , is a species of biting fly in the family of louse flies Hippoboscidae .
Paraphaeosphaeria pilleata is a species of fungus in the Lophiostomataceae family .
Platanthera azorica , commonly known as Hochstetter 's butterfly orchid , is a species of orchid in the genus Platanthera .
Lomatium ciliolatum is a species of flowering plant in the carrot family known by the common name Yolla Bolly biscuitroot .
Cistus libanotis is a shrubby species of flowering plant in the family Cistaceae , with white flowers .
Salix bakko is a species of willow native to mountains of Japan .
Acheilognathus is a genus of cyprinid fish native to Asia .
Discorbacea , Discorboidea in recent taxonomies , is a superfamily of foraminifera , ( testate protists ) , with a range extending from the Middle Triassic to the present , characterized by chambers arranged in a low trochspiral ; an umbilical or interiomarginal aperture , with or without supplementary apertures ; and a wall structure that is optically radial .
Hylarana crassiovis is a species of frog in the Ranidae family endemic to Indonesia .
Microsynodontis christyi is a species of upside - down catfish endemic to the Democratic Republic of the Congo , where it occurs in the central Congo river basin .
Protea obtusifolia is a species of Protea .
Corticaromus rueckeri is a species of beetle in the family Latridiidae , the only species in the genus Corticaromus .
Pseudotsuga japonica ( Japanese Douglas - fir ) is a species of conifer in the pine family , Pinaceae , that is endemic to Japan .
Anaphalis javanica or Javanese edelweiss is a flowering plant species endemic to Indonesia .
Gracillariinae are a subfamily of moths .
Sirilorica is a monospecific genus of stem - group scalidophoran from the Sirius Passet .
Aulonemia longiaristata is a species of Bamboo grass in the Poaceae family .
Botrychium minganense is a species of fern known by the common name Mingan moonwort .
Sineleutherus is an extinct genus of euharamiyids which existed in Asia during the Jurassic period .
Polesinesuchus is an extinct genus of stagonolepidid aetosaur known from the Late Triassic of southern Brazil .
Polyporus melanopus is a species of mushroom in the genus Polyporus .
Habromyia is a genus of around 12 Neotropical hoverflies .
Chamaebatia australis is a species of aromatic evergreen shrub in the rose family known by the common names southern mountain misery and southern bearclover .
Oppiella nova is a species of aquatic mite in Oppiidae family that can be found world - wide including Oahu , Hawaii and Okinawa , Japan .
This specimen supposedly represented a member of the family Ctenochasmatidae , though further examination suggested it actually belonged to a teleosaurid stem - crocodilian instead of a pterosaur .
Zostera chilensis is a species of eelgrass native to the seacoasts of the Coquimbo region of Chile .
Kalapuya brunnea is a species of truffle in the monotypic fungal genus Kalapuya .
Penicillium chermesinum is an anamorph fungus species of the genus of Penicillium which was isolated from soil from Nova Scotia in Canada . Penicillium chermesinum produces plastatin , luteosporin , xanthomegnin , azaphilones , p - terphenyls and costaclavine .
Ancyloceratidae is a family of heteromorphic ammonites that lived during the Early Cretaceous .
Minuartia uniflora , the one - flower stitchwort , is a species of flowering plant in the Pink Family .
Sason sundaicum is a species of barychelid trapdoor spiders that is found on trees near the sea , usually closer than 100 metres , although distances of up to five kilometres have been observed .
Chenopodiastrum murale , ( Syn . Chenopodium murale ) is a species of plant in the amaranth family known by the common names Nettle - leaved Goosefoot , Australian - spinach , salt - green , sowbane .
Ipomoea abrupta is a species of plant in the Convolvulaceae family of the genus Ipomoea .
Eumecia is a genus of skinks found in Sub - Saharan Africa .
Gyrinocheilus pennocki , also known as the spotted algae eater , is a species of freshwater fish endemic to the Mekong basin in Cambodia , Vietnam , Laos , and Thailand .
Culex tritaeniorhynchus is a species of mosquito and is the main vector of the disease Japanese encephalitis .
Euspira triseriata , common name the spotted moonsnail , is a species of predatory sea snail , a marine gastropod mollusk in the family Naticidae , the moon snails .
Sauroposeidon ( /ˌsɔːroʊpoʊˈsaɪdən/ SOR - o - po - SY - dən ; meaning `` earthquake god lizard '' , after the Greek god Poseidon ) is a genus of sauropod dinosaur known from several incomplete specimens including a bone bed and fossilized trackways that have been found in the American states of Oklahoma , Wyoming , and Texas .
Minuartia cismontana is a species of flowering plant in the pink family known by the common name cismontane minuartia .
Lycodes is a genus of zoarcid fish in the subfamily Zoarcinae .
Zigongosaurus ( meaning `` Zigong lizard '' ) is a genus of sauropod dinosaur from the Middle Jurassic - Late Jurassic - age Shaximiao Formation of Zigong , Sichuan , China .
Sacculina is a genus of barnacles that is a parasitic castrator of crabs .
Chrysomantis speciosa is a species of praying mantis found in Côte d'Ivoire , Ghana , Angola , and the Congo River region .
Hylarana banjarana is a species of true frog in the genus Hylarana native to Peninsular Malaysia and extreme southern Thailand , and possibly Indonesia .
Billardiera heterophylla ( formerly Sollya heterophylla ) is a species of flowering plant in the family Pittosporaceae , known by the common name bluebell creeper .
Isochilus linearis ( narrowleaf equallip orchid ) is a species of orchid native to Mexico , the West Indies , Central America and South America .
Isoxys is a genus of extinct , pelagic bivalved arthropod ; the various species may have been free - swimming predators .
Smaragdion viride is a species of beetle in the family Cerambycidae , the only species in the genus Smaragdion .
Haliotis asinina , common name the ass's - ear abalone , is a fairly large species of sea snail , a tropical gastropod mollusk in the family Haliotidae , the abalones , also known as ormers or paua .
Conus telatus , common name the Philippine cone , is a species of sea snail , a marine gastropod mollusk in the family Conidae , the cone snails and their allies .
Virgibacillus is a genus of Gram - positive , rod - shaped ( bacillus ) bacteria and a member of the phylum Firmicutes .
Lamellibrachia luymesi is a species of tube worms in the family Siboglinidae .
Omobranchus angelus is a species of combtooth blenny found in the western central Pacific Ocean , around Heron Island , Australia .
Cranopsis multistriata , common name the many - ribbed puncturella , is a species of sea snail , a marine gastropod mollusk in the family Fissurellidae , the keyhole limpets and slit limpets .
Parastrachiidae is a family of true bugs belonging to the ordo Hemiptera .
The family Chinchillidae is in the order Rodentia and consists of the chinchillas , the viscachas , and their fossil relatives .
Bolandra is a small genus of plants related to the saxifrages .
Saltugilia australis ( syn . Gilia australis ) is a species of flowering plant in the phlox family known by the common name southern gilia .
Daphnopsis folsomii is a plant species native to Panamá .
× Cremnosedum is a hybrid genus produced from crosses involving the genera Cremnophila and Sedum .
Maua albigutta is a cicada species that is widely distributed in Sumatra and Peninsular Malaysia and has been recorded once from Borneo
Mannophryne is a genus of frogs native to Venezuela and Trinidad and Tobago .
Ichthyosaurus anningae is an extinct species of aquatic reptile in the genus Ichthyosaurus , formally described in 2015 from a fossil found in the early 1980s in Dorset , England .
Ancornallis cristatus is a species of beetle in the family Cerambycidae , and the only species in the genus Ancornallis .
Rubus macrophyllus is a European species of brambles in the rose family .
Calliphora livida , known as the slow - flying and loud - buzzing blue bottle fly , was first discovered by Jean - Baptiste Robineau - Desvoidy who originally thought C. livida was part of the species Calliphora viridescens .
Dalbergia frutescens is a species of shrub distributed along the Atlantic coast of South America .
Crataegus wilsonii is a species of hawthorn native to the mountains of southwestern China at elevations of 900 to 3000 meters .
Adiantum trapeziforme ( giant maidenhair or diamond maidenhair ) is a species of fern in the genus Adiantum , native to the tropical rainforests of Central and South America .
Thetys vagina is the largest known species of salp and the only valid species of the genus Thetys .
Erigeron elatior is a North American species of flowering plants in the daisy family known by the common name tall fleabane .
Dolomedes sulfureus is a species of venomous spiders commonly known as fishing spiders belonging to a family of Dolomedes .
Ruschia is a genus of succulent plant , in family Aizoaceae , indigenous to the dryer parts of southern Africa .
Protubera canescens is a species of truffle - like fungus in the Phallogastraceae family .
Stigmatochromis is a small genus of haplochromine cichlids that are endemic to Lake Malawi in East Africa .
Xenisthmus polyzonatus ( bull's - eye wriggler or polyzonate wriggler ) is a species of fish in the Xenisthmidae ( wriggler ) family .
Streptomyces erringtonii is a filamentous bacterium species from the genus of Streptomyces which has been isolated from hay meadow soil from the Cockle Park Experimental Farm in Northumberland in the United Kingdom .
Podotheca angustifolia , commonly known as Sticky Longheads , is a species of herb native to Australia .
Zinnosaurus is an extinct genus of therocephalian therapsid from the Early Triassic of Brazil .
Eupoecila is a genus of scarab beetle family that includes five species , all of which are found in Australia .
Hippocastanaceae is the name given to a small group of trees and shrubs , when this group is treated as a family .
A monotypic genus , it contains the single species Idiomyces peyritschii .
Quesnelia arvensis is a species of bromeliad in the genus Quesnelia .
The Microphysidae are a very small family of bugs , comprising only 5 genera .
Liobagrus obesus , the bull - head torrent catfish , is a species of catfish in the Amblycipitidae family ( the torrent catfishes ) endemic to South Korea , where it occurs in the middle parts of the Geum , Mangyeong , and Yeongsan rivers .
Palerasnitsynus is a genus of extinct caddisfly that existed during the Late Albian Cretaceous of Myanmar .
Ergalatax margariticola , common name : the Shouldered Castor Bean , is a species of sea snail , a marine gastropod mollusk in the family Muricidae , the murex snails or rock snails .
It contains only one species Sudaniola remanella , which is found in Spain and Sudan .
Proceratophrys is a genus of frogs in the Odontophrynidae family .
The Kotagama 's dwarf toad , Duttaphrynus kotagamai , is a species of toad in the family Bufonidae .
Iris longipetala is a species in the genus Iris , it is also in the subgenus of Limniris and it is also in the series Longipetalae .
The Seychelles giant millipede ( Sechelleptus seychellarum ) , is a species of millipede endemic to Seychelles .
Melica minuta is a species of grass in the Poaceae family that can be found in North Africa , Western Asia , on Iberian Peninsula and in Southeast Europe .
Pouzolzia is a genus of flowering plants in the nettle family .
Pantolia flavomarginata is a species of beetles belonging the family Scarabaeidae .
Heliotrygon rosai , the Rosa 's round ray , is a freshwater stingray species native to Brazil in the upper , middle , and lower Rio Amazonas basin .
Felimida clenchi , common name the `` harlequin blue doris '' , is a species of colorful sea slug , a dorid nudibranch , a marine gastropod mollusk in the family Chromodorididae .
Ziziphora is a genus of annual or perennial herbs or subshrubs in the Lamiaceae family .
Allancastria is a genus of Palaearctic swallowtail butterflies in the subfamily Parnassiinae .
Quedrastichodella gracilis is a wasp species in the genus Quedrastichodella found in Japan .
Lotongus is a genus of grass skippers in the family Hesperiidae . The genus is confined to the Indomalaya ecozone .
Dendrobium mindanaense , known as the Mindanao Dendrobium , is an orchid species that is found on the Philippines .
Phoenix loureiroi ( common name mountain date palm ) is a species of flowering plant in the palm family , indigenous to southern Asia , from the southern islands of the Philippines , India , southern Bhutan , Burma , Thailand , Cambodia , Vietnam , Pakistan , and China .
Gongora ilense is a species of orchid found in Ecuador .
Euphorbia serpens is a species of euphorb known by the common name matted sandmat .
Iris albertii is a species of iris found in Central Asia .
Rubus andrewsianus , Andrews ' blackberry , is an uncommon North American species of flowering plant in the rose family .
Cipriscola fasciata is a species of beetle in the family Cerambycidae , and the only species in the genus Cipriscola .
Ensete is a genus of monocarpic flowering plants native to tropical regions of Africa and Asia .
Allium songpanicum is a plant species endemic to Sichuan Province in southern China .
Mongolicosa gobiensis is a species of wolf spider only known from a single female collected in Khürmen district , Ömnögovi Province , Mongolia .
Sabicea villosa , the woolly woodvine , is a species of flowering plant in the Rubiaceae family .
Andromeda polifolia , common name bog - rosemary , is a species of flowering plant native to northern parts of the Northern Hemisphere .
Prolagus imperialis was an extinct species in the genus Prolagus .
Elymus caninus ( bearded couch or bearded wheatgrass ) is a species of flowering plant in the Poaceae family that is native to Europe including the UK but can be found introduced in the US states of Oregon and Washington .
Partuloidea is a superfamily of air - breathing land snails .
Apamauta lineolata is a species of beetle in the family Cerambycidae , and the only species in the genus Apamauta .
Micrixalus ( commonly known as dancing frogs , tropical frogs , and torrent frogs ) is a genus of frogs from that are endemic to the Western Ghats in India .
Paphiopedilum victoria - regina is an orchid species endemic to the rainforests of western Sumatra .
The spotted hake or spotted codling ( Urophycis regia ) is a fish species belonging to the genus Urophycis .
Schistura quasimodo is a species of stone loach ( a ray - finned fish ) in the genus Schistura .
Nereocystis ( Greek for `` mermaid 's bladder '' ) is a monotypic genus of kelp containing the species Nereocystis luetkeana .
Botryotinia is a genus of ascomycete fungi causing several plant diseases .
Abroma is a genus in the Sterculiaceae family of two species from Asia and Australia .
Falsagnia obenbergeri is a species of beetle in the family Cerambycidae , and the only species in the genus Falsagnia .
Maritigrella fuscopunctata is a species of marine polyclad flatworm in the family Euryleptidae from Indo - Pacific .
Dipnorhynchus is an extinct genus of lungfish from the middle Devonian period of Australia and Europe .
Klossia is a genus of parasitic protozoa of the phylum Apicomplexa .
Achnophora is a genus of flowering plants in the daisy family described as a genus in 1883 .
Pimelabditus moli is a species of long - whiskered catfish native to French Guiana and Suriname where it is found in the Maroni River basin .
Oeceoclades seychellarum is a terrestrial orchid species in the genus Oeceoclades that was endemic to the island of Mahé in the Seychelles but is now considered to be extinct .
Pisidium pulchellum , the iridescent pea mussel , is a minute species of pea clam , a freshwater bivalve in the family Sphaeriidae .
Wannia is an extinct genus of basal phytosaur reptile known from the Late Triassic ( late Carnian or early Norian stage ) of Texas , southern USA .
Helianthus microcephalus is a perennial species of Helianthus also known as small woodland sunflower or small - wood sunflower or small - head sunflower or simply as woodland sunflower .
Methylophaga marina is an obligately methylotrophic , Gram - negative , strictly aerobic , motile , rod - shaped bacteria , the type species of its genus .
Aegilops longissima ( syn . Aegilops sharonense Eig , Sitopsis longissima ( Schweinf . & Muschl . ) Á. Löve , Triticum longissimum ( Schweinf . & Muschl . ) Bowden , Triticum sharonense L. ) is a species in the Poaceae family .
Astylosternus ( commonly known as night frogs ) is a genus of frogs in the Arthroleptidae family .
Ermischiella papuana is a species of beetle in the Ermischiella genus .
A monotypic genus , it contains the single species Syrropeltis xylopiae .
Vespomima nigrotaenia is a species of ulidiid or picture - winged fly in the genus Vespomima of the family Ulidiidae .
Endothamna marmarocyma is a moth in the Copromorphidae family , and the only species in the genus Endothamna .
Lepidium montanum is a species of flowering plant in the mustard family known by the common names mountain pepperweed , mountain peppergrass , mountain pepperwort , and mountain pepperplant .
Uleiorchis is a genus of myco - heterotrophic flowering plants from the orchid family , Orchidaceae .
Argyrodes cognatus is a species of tangle - web spider that is endemic to the Seychelles , and can be found on Mahé , Conception , Silhouette and Marianne islands .
Phyllostegia brevidens , the Mauna Kea phyllostegia , is a plant species in the Lamiaceae first described in 1862 .
Leionema coxii is a shrub species that is endemic to southern New South Wales in Australia .
It was described by Rebel in 1901 , and contains the species Salinaria diffusella .
Hemibarbus mylodon is a species of freshwater cyprinid fish endemic to Korea .
Rhynchocalyx lawsonioides is a small flowering tree , the sole species of the genus Rhynchocalyx .
Lactuca floridana , the woodland lettuce , is a North American species of wild lettuce .
Omphalotus is a genus of basidiomycete mushroom formally circumscribed by Victor Fayod in 1889 .
Oligoryzomys moojeni is a species of rodent from South America in the genus Oligoryzomys of family Cricetidae .
Canarium zeylanicum is a species of flowering plant in the frankincense family , Burseraceae , that is endemic to Sri Lanka .
Chlorurus enneacanthus , known commonly as the captain parrotfish , is a species of marine fish in the family Scaridae .
Limnonectes tweediei ( common name : Tweedie 's wart frog ) is a species of frog in the Dicroglossidae family .
Bayou virus ( BAYV ) is a species of hantavirus first identified in 1994 in Louisiana .
Comparettia , abbreviated Comp in the horticultural trade , is a genus of orchids .
Tabernaemontana sananho is a tropical tree species in the family Apocynaceae .
Friedmanniella lacustris is a species of Gram - positive , non - motile and aerobic bacteria .
Mikeius hartigi is a species of wasp found in Australia , the type species of its genus .
Cominella glandiformis , or the mud whelk or mud - flat whelk is a species of predatory sea snail , a marine gastropod mollusc in the family Buccinidae , the true whelks .
Oarfish are large , greatly elongated , pelagic lampriform fish belonging to the small family Regalecidae .
The Neuradaceae are a family of flowering plant , comprising three genera --
Perisama is a brush - footed butterfly genus found in the Neotropical Ecozone , ranging from Colombia and Venezuela to Argentina .
Veronica wormskjoldii is a species of flowering plant in the plantain family known by the common name American alpine speedwell .
Gonoretodes is a monotypic genus of moths belonging to the subfamily Drepaninae from Madagascar .
Solidago tortifolia , commonly known as twistleaf goldenrod , is a North American species of goldenrod in the sunflower family .
Dinanomodon is a genus of dicynodont from Late Permian ( Changhsingian ) of the Karoo Province of South Africa .
Coilostylis ciliaris ( Fringed Star Orchid ) , formerly Epidendrum ciliare , is a species of orchid in the genus Coilostylis .
Rhopilema esculentum , the flame jellyfish , is a species of jellyfish native to the warm temperate waters of the Pacific Ocean .
Bothrops venezuelensis , or the Venezuelan lancehead , is a species of venomous snake in the Viperidae family .
Pseudostellaria is a genus of flowering plants in the pink family .
Megathecla is a gossamer - winged butterfly genus of tribe Eumaeini in the subfamily Theclinae .
Raphistemma is a genus of flowering plants of the family Apocynaceae , first described as a genus in 1831 .
Dipterocarpus caudatus is a species of plant in the evergreen or semi - evergreen Dipterocarpaceae family .
Lawrencella is a genus of flowering plants in the daisy family endemic to Australia .
Eudimorphodontidae is an extinct family of early pterosaurs from the Late Triassic ( early Norian to Rhaetian age ) of Europe .
Mylochromis gracilis , known as the happy or the Haplochromis torpedo stripe ( in aquarium trade ) , is a species of cichlid endemic to Lake Malawi where it is only known from sandy areas in the southern end of the lake .
Lutraria lutraria is a species of large marine bivalve mollusc in the family Mactridae .
Pleocoma bicolor is a species of beetle described by Linsley in 1935 .
Spectracanthicus punctatissimus is a species of armored catfish endemic to Brazil where it is found in the Xingu River basin .
Asclepias viridis is a species of flowering plant in the dogbane family known by the common names green antelopehorn and spider milkweed .
Agapanthia boeberi is a species of longhorn beetle in the Lamiinae subfamily that are endemic to Lebanon .
Beloceratidae is a family of ammonites included in the ordery Ceratitida .
Cheliderpeton ( often misspelled Chelyderpeton ) is an extinct genus of temnospondyl amphibian .
Eriothymus is a genus of flowering plant in the Lamiaceae family , first described as a genus in 1835 .
Trichosalpinx egleri is a species of orchid native to southern tropical America ( Venezuela , Peru , Brazil , Bolivia , Suriname , Guyana , French Guiana and the Caribbean ) .
The Taiwan vole ( Microtus kikuchii ) is a species of rodent in the family Cricetidae .
Anebolithus is a genus of trilobite found in Gilwern Hill , Powys , Wales .
Coelodonta tologoijensis is an extinct species of woolly rhino ( Coelodonta ) .
Smilax pulverulenta , the downy carrionflower , is a North American species of plants native to the eastern and central United States .
Potentilla nepalensis , common name cinquefoil , is a perennial plant species in the genus Potentilla .
Proboscidea louisianica is a species of flowering plant in the family Martyniaceae .
Yongeichthys is a genus of gobies native to the coastal waters of the Atlantic coast of Africa , Indian Ocean and the western Pacific Ocean .
Calylophus serrulatus is a species of flowering plant in the Onagraceae known by the common name yellow sundrops .
Lepipaschia inornata is a species of snout moth in the genus Lepipaschia .
Oligodon sublineatus , commonly known as Dumeril 's kukri snake or Pulli Dath Ketiya-පුල්ලි දත්-කැටියා ( Sinhala ) is a species of nonvenomous kukri snake found in Sri Lanka .
Thysanozoon nigropapillosum is a species of polyclad flatworms belonging to the family Pseudocerotidae .
Monotaxis grandoculis , the Humpnose big - eye bream , is a species of emperor native to the Indian Ocean and the Pacific Ocean to the Hawaiian Islands .
Chondracanthidae is a family of parasitic copepods , usually found infecting the branchial chamber of demersal fishes .
Anoplotherium is an extinct genus of ungulates which lived from the Late Eocene to the earliest Oligocene .
Thryptomene saxicola , commonly known as Rock Thryptomene , is a shrub species in the family Myrtaceae .
The Auckland green gecko , Naultinus elegans elegans , is a subspecies of gecko found only in the northern half of the North Island of New Zealand , except north of Whangaroa .
Cosmopolitodus is an extinct genus of sharks , commonly known as mackerel sharks or white sharks .
Agrostis mannii is a species of grass in the Poaceae family .
Symplocos octopetala is a species of evergreen woody plant with small white flowers in the Symplocaceae family .
Volvopluteus gloiocephalus , commonly known as the big sheath mushroom , rose - gilled grisette , or stubble rosegill , is a species of mushroom in the family Pluteaceae .
Pseudophygopoda subvestita is a species of beetle in the family Cerambycidae , the only species in the genus Pseudophygopoda .
Ericameria resinosa , the Columbia Goldenweed , is a North American species of flowering shrubs in the daisy family .
Ellopostoma is a small genus of loaches native to Southeast Asia .
Echinomastus mariposensis ( syn . Neolloydia mariposensis , Sclerocactus mariposensis ) is a rare species of cactus known by the common names Lloyd 's fishhook cactus , golfball cactus , silver column cactus , and Mariposa cactus .
Its only described species , Corcovetella aemulatrix , is found in Brazil .
Hypoaspis miles and the similar species , H. aculiefer are soil - dwelling , predatory mites .
Callirhoe scabriuscula is a rare species of flowering plant in the mallow family known by the common name Texas poppy mallow .
Lissospira bushae is a species of sea snail , a marine gastropod mollusk in the family Skeneidae ,
Hypoatherina is a genus of silversides in the family Atherinidae .
Spinoaequalis is an extinct genus of diapsid reptile .
Thunbergia alata , commonly called Black - eyed Susan vine , is a herbaceous perennial climbing plant species in the Acanthaceae family .
Eumetopina flavipes , the island sugarcane planthopper , is a species of planthopper present throughout South East Asia .
Margarites hickmanae , common name the Hickman margarite , is a species of sea snail , a marine gastropod mollusk in the family Margaritidae .
Sepia tokioensis is a species of cuttlefish native to the western Pacific Ocean , specifically Japanese waters from Tsugaru Strait to Kyūshū and the Ohsumi Islands , including Sagami Bay , Suruga Bay , the western Japan Sea , and Shimane Prefecture .
The Elateroidea are a large superfamily of beetles .
Polybia paulista is a species of eusocial wasp that lives in Brazil .
Melica teneriffae , is a grass species in the Poaceae family that is endemic to the Canary Islands .
Menuthia nanella is a species of snout moth , and the only species in the genus Menuthia .
The Heterobathmioidea are a superfamily of the Lepidoptera , comprising the single family Heterobathmiidae , which itself contains only a single genus , Heterobathmia .
Tsoabichi is an extinct genus of caiman crocodylian .
Syllonoma is a genus of moths belonging to the Tortricidae family , first described by Jerry A. Powell in 1985 .
Cyrtocarenum cunicularium is a trapdoor spider species found in Greece , Crete , Rhodes and Turkey .
Dactyloscopus comptus is a species of sand stargazer native to the coastal waters of the Bahamas and possibly Puerto Rico and the Virgin Islands .
Pharyngochromis is a genus of cichlids native to East Africa where they are only known from the Zambezi River system .
Mamastrovirus is a genus of viruses , in the family Astroviridae .
Tillandsia ionantha , the sky plant , is a species in the genus Tillandsia .
Sepia pardex is a species of cuttlefish native to the western Pacific Ocean , specifically off Japan , along the Pacific coast from the Chiba Peninsula , and along the Japan Sea coast from Toyama Bay to South Korea .
Malapterurus cavalliensis is a species of electric catfish endemic to Ivory Coast where it occurs in the Cavally River .
Kōlea lau nui ( Myrsine lessertiana ) is a species of colicwood that is endemic to Hawaiʻi .
Verbena litoralis is a species of verbena known by the common names seashore vervain and Brazilian vervain , and in Hawaiian , ōwī .
Rhynchodoras xingui is a species of thorny catfish endemic to Brazil where it is found in the upper Xingu River basin .
The species Pelagophycus porra , also known as Elk kelp , grows in temperatures of no higher than 60 ° Fahrenheit ( 15.56 ° Celsius . )
Clinus rotundifrons , the Kelp klipfish , is a species of clinid that occurs in subtropical waters of the Atlantic Ocean from Namibia to South Africa where it inhabits kelp beds .
Scenella tenuistriata is an extinct species generally classified as a mollusc or hydrozoan in the family Scenellidae .
Prognathodon ( ' forejaw tooth ' ) is an extinct genus of mosasaur squamate reptile .
Bostrichus is a genus of beetles found in the Palearctic ( including Europe ) , the Near East , and North Africa .
Astragalus pulsiferae is a species of milkvetch known by the common name Ames ' milkvetch .
Xenophthalmichthys danae is a species of pencil smelt found in deep waters to 1,250 metres ( 4,100 ft ) .
Bowenia spectabilis is a species of cycad in the Stangeriaceae family .
Calathus focarilei is a species of ground beetle from the Platyninae subfamily that is endemic to Italy .
Rafinesquia neomexicana is a species of flowering plant in the Asteraceae family ( Commonly called the Sunflower Family or Daisy Family ) .
Bulbophyllum samoanum also known as `` The Samoan Bulbophyllum '' is a species of orchid in the genus Bulbophyllum .
Malacoctenus tetranemus , the Throatspotted blenny , is a species of labrisomid blenny native to the Pacific coast of the Americas from the Gulf of California to Peru as well as around the Galapagos Islands .
Cantharidella ocellina , common name the eyelet top shell , is a species of sea snail , a marine gastropod mollusk in the family Trochidae , the top snails .
Platycephalichthys is a genus of tristichopterid lobe - finned fish which lived during the middle Devonian , upper Givetian stage .
Allium amethystinum is a plant species native to Italy , Greece , Turkey , Sicily , Crete , Malta , Albania , Bulgaria , and the former Yugoslavia , and cultivated elsewhere as an ornamental .
Axelrodia is a genus of small characin from the Amazon Basin and Meta River in South America , with three currently described species :
Galearieae is a no - longer - recognized tribe of plant of the family Euphorbiaceae .
Ophias albiundalis is a species of snout moth , and the only species in the genus Ophias .
Gryllus rubens , commonly known as the southeastern field cricket , is one of many cricket species known as a field cricket .
Gymnotocinclus anosteos is a species of armored catfish endemic to Brazil , where it is found in the Tocantinzinho River in the Tocantins River basin .
Brugmansia versicolor is a species of plant in the Solanaceae family , commonly known as `` Angel 's Trumpets '' .
Striophytoecia mirei is a species of longhorn beetle in the Lamiinae subfamily , and the only species in the genus Striophytoecia .
Alcyonium acaule or Mediterranean sea - finger is a species of soft coral in the Alcyoniidae family .
Phidippus otiosus is a species of jumping spider that is found in southeastern North America .
Cyperus niger is a species of sedge known by the common name black flatsedge .
The Miami blue is the only subspecies of Cyclargus thomasi found in the United States .
Otodus is an extinct genus of mackerel shark which lived during the Paleocene and Eocene epochs , approximately 60 to 45 million years ago .
Holospira bilamellata , common name bilamellate holospira , is a species of air - breathing land snail , a terrestrial pulmonate gastropod mollusk in the family Urocoptidae .
Erysimum ammophilum is a species of wallflower known by the common name coast wallflower .
Thelypodium milleflorum is a species of flowering plant in the mustard family known by the common names manyflower thelypody and many - flowered thelypodium .
Searsia koefoedi , Koefoed 's searsid , is a species of tubeshoulder found in the oceans at depths of from 450 to 1,500 metres ( 1,480 to 4,920 ft ) .
Exallandra is a genus of hoverflies in the subfamily Syrphinae .
Leptobrachium hendricksoni ( common names : Thai spadefoot toad , bright yellow - eyed crawl frog , spotted litter frog ) is a species of amphibian in the Megophryidae family .
Dendrochirotida are an order of sea cucumbers .
Heritiera parvifolia is a species of flowering plant in the family Malvaceae ( or Sterculiaceae ) .
Lethata is a genus of moth in the subfamily Stenomatinae .
The Arcoida is an extant order of bivalve molluscs .
Carex breweri , known as Brewer 's sedge , is a species of sedge that grows on dry rocky or gravel slopes in the Sierra Nevada and Cascade Mountains of the western United States , as far north as Mount Hood .
Proteroiulus fuscus is a species of millipede in the family Blaniulidae which can be found everywhere in Europe except for Albania , Andorra , Latvia , Liechtenstein , Moldova , Monaco , Romania , San Marino , Vatican City , all states of former Yugoslavia and some European islands .
Flower crab spiders are crab spiders of the genus Misumena with holarctic distribution .
Brylkinia is a genus of East Asian plants in the grass family .
The Asiatic wildcat ( Felis silvestris ornata ) is a wildcat subspecies that occurs from the eastern Caspian north to Kazakhstan , into western India , western China and southern Mongolia .
Achatina glutinosa , common name the African land snail , is a species of air - breathing land snail , a terrestrial pulmonate gastropod mollusk in the family Achatinidae , the giant African snails .
Vulpes qiuzhudingi is an extinct species of fox found in the Himalayas .
Metasequoia occidentalis is an extinct redwood species of the family Cupressaceae that is found as fossils throughout the Northern Hemisphere .
Ciliopagurus shebae is a species of hermit crab native to Madagascar , the Red Sea , Réunion , the Seychelles , and the West Indian Ocean .
The family Stromateidae of butterfishes contains 15 species of fish in three genera .
Petalocrinidae is an extinct family of cladid crinoid from the Early Ordovician to Lower Devonian .
Sperata is a genus of bagrid catfishes .
Bishanopliosaurus is a genus of plesiosaur .
Heteronemertea is a monophyletic order of about 500 species of nemertean worm .
Allium pseudoalbidum is a species of onion that is endemic to Kars Province in Turkey .
Paraneetroplus synspilus , the quetzel cichlid , redhead cichlid or firehead cichlid , is a species of cichlid native to Central America where it occurs in the Usumacinta River drainage in the countries of Mexico , Belize and Guatemala .
Aspergillus niger or A. niger is a fungus and one of the most common species of the genus Aspergillus .
Cattleya harrisoniana ( `` Harrison 's Cattley 's orchid '' ) is a bifoliate Cattleya species of orchid .
Garra tana is a species of tropical ray - finned fish in the genus Garra .
Plumbago zeylanica , commonly known as Ceylon leadwort , doctorbush or wild leadwort , is a species of plumbago with a pantropical distribution .
Indotrigonodon is an extinct genus of prehistoric bony fish that lived during the Paleocene epoch .
Lactuca ludoviciana , the biannual lettuce , is a North American species of wild lettuce .
Typhlops vermicularis , the European blind snake or European worm snake , is a species of snake in the genus Typhlops .
Leeches are segmented worms that belong to the phylum Annelida and comprise the subclass Hirudinea .
Endiandra hypotephra , commonly known as blue walnut or northern rose walnut , is a species of flowering plant in the family Lauraceae .
Sooretamys angouya , also known as the rat - headed rice rat , and Paraguayan rice rat , is a rodent species from South America .
Mummaspis is an extinct genus from a well - known class of fossil marine arthropods , the trilobites , with five known species .
Microtis unifolia is a species of orchid occurring from south China to Japan , Malesia , and Australasia to the Southwest Pacific .
Alveopora viridis is a species of stony coral that has a highly disjunct range , and can be found in the Red Sea , the Gulf of Aden , the northern Indian Ocean and in Palau and the Mariana Islands .
Calotes ceylonensis , commonly known as the painted - lipped lizard or the Sri Lanka bloodsucker , is a species of lizard in the family Agamidae .
Pareiorhina carrancas is a species of armored catfish endemic to Brazil where it is known from Debaixo da Serra , a headwater stream with clear , cold and moderate to fast flowing water of the Rio Grande basin in the State of Minas Gerais of southeastern Brazil .
Viola bakeri is a species of violet known by the common name Baker 's violet .
Oberea is a genus of longhorn beetles , most of which are stem borers of various plants , including blackberries and their relatives .
Scopula emutaria , the rosy wave , is a species of moth in the Geometridae family .
Chaetophractus is a small genus of armadillos in the family Dasypodidae .
The Visayan leopard cat ( Prionailurus bengalensis rabori ) is a recently described subspecies on the basis of morphological analysis , although genetic analysis in progress is necessary to confirm its taxonomic distinction .
Edestus is a genus of eugeneodontid holocephalid that lived throughout the world 's oceans during the late Carboniferous .
Lessingia micradenia is a rare species of flowering plant in the daisy family known by the common name Mt.
Starksia galapagensis , the Galapagos blenny , is a species of labrisomid blenny endemic to the Galapagos Islands .
Cincinnetina is an extinct genus of brachiopods which existed in what is now the United States during the Late Ordovician .
Malus yunnanensis is a species in the genus malus , family Rosaceae , with the common name Yunnan crabapple , in China it is called chuan e dian chi hai tang .
Tribeles australis , the sole species in the genus Tribeles , is a prostrate shrub native to Chile and Argentina .
Squalius microlepis is a species of freshwatter fish in the Cyprinidae family .
Ammotrophus cyclius is a species of sand dollar of the family Arachnoididae .
Zenobia pulverulenta , called honeycup , is a North American species of shrubs , in the genus Zenobia , in the heath family .
Parastrenoceras is an extinct genus from the ammonoid cephalopod order Ammonitida , included in the family Spiroceratidae that lived during the Bajocian stage of the Middle Jurassic .
Rhinella jimi is a species of toad in the family Bufonidae that is endemic to northeastern Brazil between Bahia and Maranhão .
Pseudophasma brachypterum is a species of stick insect found in Brazil , Suriname , Guadeloupe and Peru .
Nymphargus cochranae ( common name : Cochran frog ) is a species of frog in the Centrolenidae family .
Addisoniidae is a family of sea snails , deepwater true limpets , marine gastropod mollusks in the clade Vetigastropoda ( according to the taxonomy of the Gastropoda by Bouchet & Rocroi , 2005 ) .
Deinandra pallida , called Kern tarweed , is a California species of plants in the tarweed tribe within the sunflower family .
Carenochyrus titanus is a species of beetle in the family Carabidae , the only species in the genus Carenochyrus .
Calceolispongia ( literally `` Shoe Sponge '' ) is a diverse genus of cladid crinoids that lived along the shores of eastern Gondwanaland that correspond to Timor and Western Australia , today .
Six families are considered `` true blennies '' , all grouped together under the suborder Blennioidei ; its members are referred to as blennioids .
Streptanthus diversifolius is a species of flowering plant in the mustard family known by the common name variableleaf jewelflower , or varied - leaved jewelflower .
Nebo hierichonticus , the Common Black Scorpion , is a species of scorpion in the family Diplocentridae .
Radiophron is an extinct genus of wasp which existed in Spain during the early Cretaceous period .
Cantharellus is a genus of popular edible mushrooms , commonly known as chanterelles/ˌʃæntəˈrɛl/.
Erigeron uncialis is a North American species of flowering plant in the daisy family known by the common name Lone fleabane .
Pyemotes tritici is a species of mite known as the grain itch mite or straw itch mite .
Myrmica afghanica is a species of ant from Afghanistan .
Enicognathus is a genus of South American parrots in the Psittacidae family .
Carabus anatolicus is a species of ground beetle from Carabidae family that can be found on Cyprus and in Near East .
Crataegus suksdorfii , ( Suksdorf 's hawthorn ) , formerly Crataegus douglasii var . suksdorfii , is a species of hawthorn found in the Pacific Northwest .
Aaages is a genus of beetle in the family Coccinellidae ( ladybird beetles , or ladybugs ) .
Clarkia purpurea is a species of wildflower known by the common names winecup clarkia , winecup fairyfan , and purple clarkia .
Darwinopterus ( meaning `` Darwin 's wing '' ) is a genus of pterosaur , discovered in China and named after biologist Charles Darwin .
The mustard species Brassica tournefortii is known by the common names Asian mustard , pale cabbage , African mustard , and Sahara mustard , and is well known as an invasive species , especially in California .
Pyrus calleryana , the Callery pear , known in the United States as the Bradford pear , is a species of pear native to China and Vietnam , in the family Rosaceae .
Clytra aliena is a species of leaf beetles from the subfamily Cryptocephalinae , that is native to Turkey .
Ungulinidae is a family of marine bivalve molluscs .
Platydyptes is a genus of extinct penguins from the Late Oligocene to Early Miocene ( about 25 to 22 million years ago ) of New Zealand .
The Wrangel lemming ( Dicrostonyx vinogradovi ) is a species of rodent in the family Cricetidae .
Mimaspurgus niveoscutellatus is a species of beetle in the family Cerambycidae , and the only species in the genus Mimaspurgus .
Acantholycosa spinembolus is a species of wolf spider only known from the Kholzun Mountain Range in the Russian part of the Altai Mountains .
Leptotyphlops conjunctus , or the Cape thread snake , is a species of snake in the Leptotyphlopidae family .
Musa lokok is a species of wild banana ( genus Musa ) , native to Sarawak , on the island of Borneo .
Taeniopygia is a genus of birds in the family Estrildidae .
Montfortista panhi , common name the cancellate false limpet , is a species of sea snail , a marine gastropod mollusk in the family Fissurellidae , the keyhole limpets and slit limpets .
Harpalus hospes is a species of ground beetle native to Europe , where it can be found in such countries as Austria , Bulgaria , Czech Republic , Greece , Hungary , Moldova , Romania , Slovakia , Slovenia , Ukraine and southern part of Russia .
Scleracanthus is an extinct genus of prehistoric sarcopterygian , or lobe - finned fish .
Spathula is a genus of dugesiid triclad .
Tansy was frequently worn at that time in shoes to prevent malaria and other fevers ; it has been shown , however , that some mosquito species including Culex pipiens take nectar from tansy flowers .
Cicindela iberica is a species of common tiger beetle in the subgenus Cicindela that is endemic to Spain .
Menidia is a genus of Neotropical silversides native to freshwater , brackish and marine habitats along the Atlantic coast of North and Central America .
Enemion occidentale ( syn . Isopyrum occidentale ) is a species of flowering plant in the buttercup family known by the common name western false rue anemone .
Leiolopisma telfairii , the Round Island skink or Telfair 's skink , is a species of skink native to Round Island , one of the islands of Mauritius .
Incisura rosea , common name the rosy slit shell , is a species of minute sea snail , a marine gastropod mollusc in the family Scissurellidae .
Nephelium juglandifolium is a species of shrub .
Clarkia concinna is a species of wildflower known as red ribbons .
The Rondo dwarf galago ( Galagoides rondoensis ) or Rondo Bushbaby is a species of primate in the family Galagidae . The dwarf galagos are the smallest members of the genus Galagoides .
Brachydeirus is a genus of small to moderately large - sized arthrodire placoderms from the Late Devonian of Europe , restricted to the Kellwasserkalk Fauna of Bad Wildungen and Adorf .
Campanula scheuchzeri is a species of bellflower in the family Campanulaceae .
Vaccinium corymbosum , the northern highbush blueberry , is a North American species of blueberry which has become a food crop of significant economic importance .
Buergeria robusta ( robust Buerger 's frog or strong stream frog ) is a species of frog in the Rhacophoridae family .
Atelopus exiguus is a species of toad in the family Bufonidae endemic to Ecuador .
Flabby whalefish are small , deep - sea cetomimiform fish of the family Cetomimidae .
Climbing salamanders is the common name for plethodontid ( lungless ) salamanders of the genus Aneides .
Ulmus parvifolia , commonly known as the Chinese elm or lacebark elm , is a species native to eastern Asia , including China , India , Taiwan , Japan , North Korea , and Vietnam .
Calotomus japonicus , commonly known as the Japanese parrotfish , is a species of parrotfish commonly found throughout the northwest Pacific .
Llavea cordifolia is a fern , the sole species of its genus .
Phacelia minor , with the common names Whitlavia and wild Canterbury bells is a species of phacelia .
Ocepeia is an extinct genus of afrotherian mammal that lived in present - day Morocco during the middle Paleocene epoch , approximately 60 million years ago .
Grusonia is a genus of opuntioid cacti ( family Cactaceae ) , originating from the North American Deserts in Southwest United States and northern Mexico , including Baja California .
Pareuptychia metaleuca , the One - banded Satyr , is a species of butterfly of the Nymphalidae family .
Lavatera cretica ( syn . Malva linnaei ) is a species of flowering plant in the mallow family known by the common names Cornish mallow and Cretan hollyhock .
Heliamphora hispida ( Latin : hispidus = covered with stiff or rough hairs , bristly ) is a species of Marsh Pitcher Plant endemic to Cerro Neblina , the southernmost tepui of the Guiana Highlands at the Brazil - Venezuela border .
Dicyphini is a tribe of bugs in the family Miridae .
Syncrossus is a genus of six loaches , many of which are popular in the aquarium fish trade .
Pseudacanthicus histrix is a species of armored catfish endemic to Brazil where it occurs in the Negro and Amazon Basins .
Drypta iris is a species of ground beetle in the genus Drypta that was discovered in 1840 .
Clavatula diadema common name the diadem turrid , is a species of sea snail , a marine gastropod mollusk in the family Clavatulidae .
Brewcaria reflexa is a species in the genus Brewcaria .
Candida krusei is a budding yeast ( a species of fungus ) involved in chocolate production .
The Buru honeyeater ( Lichmera deningeri ) is a species of bird in the honeyeater family .
Bathynectes is a genus of crabs in the family Polybiidae .
Lupinus breweri is a species of lupine known by the common names Brewer 's lupine and matted lupine .
Occidodiaptomus kummerloewei is a species of copepod in the family Diaptomidae , which has only been recorded from a pool near Ilgaz , Turkey .
Tripteroides sp . No . 2 is a species of mosquito in the genus Tripteroides which has not yet been formally named .
Homalocephala similis is a species of ulidiid or picture - winged fly in the genus Homalocephala of the family Ulidiidae .
Delphinium stachydeum is a species of larkspur known by the common name spiked larkspur .
Boloponera is a genus of small ants in the subfamily Ponerinae .
The genus is monotypic containing the single species Spathilepia clonius ( Cramer , ( 1775 ) ) found in Texas , Central America and Colombia to Brazil and Argentina .
Aserotaspis is an extinct genus of jawless fish which existed in what is now northern Canada .
Ranularia pyrum , common name : the pear triton , is a species of predatory sea snail , a marine gastropod mollusk in the family Ranellidae , the triton snails , triton shells or tritons .
Tomocerus minor is species of springtail in the family Tomoceridae .
Hyposcada illinissa , the Illinissa Glasswing , is a species of butterfly of the Nymphalidae family .
