Acaena exigua is an extinct species of flowering plant in the rose family known by the common name liliwai .
Pedestredorcadion mokrzeckii is a species of longhorn beetle in the subfamily Lamiinae which is endemic to Ukraine .
Cryptocheilus notatus is the largest species of spider wasps ( Pompilidae ) to be found in Great Britain reaching up to 18 mm in length .
Garthiella aberrans is a species of crabs in the family Xanthidae , the only species in the genus Garthiella .
The Wild Palm or Cinco Dedos ( Quararibea pterocalyx ) is a species of flowering plant in the Malvaceae family .
Croton tiglium , known as Purging Croton , is a plant species in the Euphorbiaceae family .
Ecsenius caeruliventris , known commonly as the Bluebelly blenny in Indonesia , is a species of combtooth blenny in the genus Ecsenius .
Mimulus torreyi is a species of monkeyflower known by the common name Torrey 's monkeyflower .
Lifago is a genus of flowering plants in the spikenard tribe within the daisy family .
Caprona is an Afrotropical genus of skipper butterflies ( family Hesperiidae ) .
Habranthus robustus , commonly known as the Brazilian copperlily , pink fairy lily or the pink rain lily , is a species of herbaceous flowering bulb .
Grindelia microcephala , the littlehead gumweed , is a North American species of flowering plants in the daisy family .
Montanoa tomentosa is a species of flowering plant in the daisy family which is native to Mexico and much of Central America .
Livistona speciosa ( Chinese : 美丽蒲葵 , Thai : เมล็ดค้อ ) is a species of flowering plant in the Arecaceae family .
Titanohyrax is an extinct genus of large to very large hyrax from the Eocene and Oligocene .
Eleutherodactylus flavescens is a species of frog in the Eleutherodactylidae family endemic to the eastern Dominican Republic .
Maianthemum racemosum ( treacleberry , feathery false lily of the valley , false Solomon 's seal , Solomon 's plume or false spikenard ; syn . Smilacina racemosa , Vagnera racemosa ) is a species of flowering plant native to North America .
Bletia catenulata is a species of orchid native to Ecuador , Peru , Brazil , Colombia , Bolivia and Paraguay .
Haichemydidae is an extinct family of turtles that belongs to the superfamily testudinoidea .
The type species of the genus Cerasinops is C. hodgskissi .
Fasolasuchus is an extinct genus of rauisuchid .
Geranium retrorsum is a species of geranium known by the common name New Zealand geranium in the United States and common cranesbill in Australia .
Cyrtandra giffardii is a rare species of flowering plant in the African violet family known by the common names forest cyrtandra and Giffard 's cyrtandra .
Crataegus uniflora is a species of hawthorn known by the common name one - flowered hawthorn , or dwarf hawthorn .
Cleospira ochsneri is a species of small predatory sea snail , a marine gastropod mollusk in the family Strictispiridae .
Priogymnanthus apertus ( also called Francisco ) is a species of flowering plant in the family Oleaceae .
Ipomoea triloba is a species of Ipomoea morning glory known by several common names , including littlebell and Aiea morning glory .
Irvingiaceae is a family of flowering plants , consisting of 20 species in the 3 genera Desbordesia , Irvingia and Klainedoxa .
Tachysurus fulvidraco , the yellowhead catfish or Korean bullhead , is a species of bagrid catfish found in eastern Asia from Siberia to China , Korea , Vietnam , and Laos , where it can be found in lakes and river channels .
Thalassoma is a genus of wrasses native to the Atlantic , Indian and Pacific Oceans .
Metaphrynella is a small genus of microhylid frogs from the southern Malay Peninsula and Borneo .
Hylarana luctuosa , also known as the Malaysian frog , mahogany frog or purple frog , is a species of true frog .
Ataxocerithium is a genus of sea snails , marine gastropod molluscs in the family Newtoniellidae .
Casuarina equisetifolia or Australian pine tree is a she - oak species of the genus Casuarina .
Lomatium nevadense is a species of flowering plant in the carrot family known by the common name Nevada biscuitroot .
Anthreptes is a genus of birds in the sunbird family , Nectariniidae .
Heterocodon is a monotypic genus of plants in the bellflower family containing the single species Heterocodon rariflorum , which is known by the common names rareflower heterocodon and western pearlflower .
Euploea camaralzeman is an Indomalayan species of danaine butterfly .
Carabus planicollis planicollis is a subspecies of ground beetle from Carabinae subfamily that is endemic to Romania .
Eucalyptus kitsoniana , also known as the Gippsland Mallee or Bog Gum , is a species of native Australian tree .
Trochodendron nastae is an extinct species of flowering plant in the family Trochodendraceae known from fossil leaves found in the early Eocene Ypresian stage Klondike Mountain Formation deposits of Northern Washington State .
Phaanthosaurus is an extinct genus of basal procolophonid parareptile from early Triassic ( Induan stage ) deposits of Nizhnii Novgorod , Russian Federation .
Conus fergusoni , common name the Ferguson 's cone , is a species of sea snail , a marine gastropod mollusk in the family Conidae , the cone snails and their allies .
Ceanothus masonii is a species of shrub in the buckthorn family , Rhamnaceae , known by the common name Mason 's ceanothus .
Euzophera speculum is a species of snout moth in the genus Euzophera .
Probolodus heterostomus is a species of characin endemic to Brazil , where it is found in the basins of the southeastern coastal rivers .
Acheilognathus longibarbatus is a species of fresh water ray - finned fish in the genus Acheilognathus .
Hemerocoetes is a genus of duckbill fishes .
Pelecanus odessanus is a large species of fossil pelican , described in 1886 from Late Miocene fossil material since lost , from Novaja Slobodka , near Odessa in the Ukraine .
Haplochromis graueri is a species of cichlid endemic to Lake Kivu on the border of the Democratic Republic of the Congo , and Rwanda .
Parademostis capucina is a species of beetle in the family Buprestidae , the only species in the genus Parademostis .
Papilio neyi is a species of swallowtail butterfly from the genus Papilio that is found in Ecuador , French Guiana , Peru and Brazil .
Hudsonia tomentosa is a species of flowering plant in the rockrose family known by the common names woolly beachheather , beach heather , and sand heather .
The Peronopsidae ( which may also be called peronopsids ) comprise the earliest family of the Agnostina suborder .
Eodiaptomus lumholtzi is a species of copepod endemic to Australia .
Abutilon menziesii , known as Koʻoloaʻula in Hawaiian , is an endangered species of flowering shrub in the mallow family , Malvaceae , that is endemic to Hawaii .
Sphaerotheca rolandae ( common names : Sri Lanka bullfrog , Roland 's burrowing frog , southern burrowing frog , marble sand frog ) is a species of frog in the Dicroglossidae family found in Sri Lanka .
Pediocactus peeblesianus is a rare species of cactus known by the common names Navajo pincushion cactus .
The Amazon black howler ( Alouatta nigerrima ) is a species of howler monkey , a type of New World monkey , endemic to the south - central Amazon in Brazil .
Litoria ollauro is a species of frog in the Hylidae family , endemic to Papua New Guinea .
Balanops is a group of flowering plants described as a genus in 1871 .
Conus mucronatus , common name the deep - groved cone , is a species of sea snail , a marine gastropod mollusk in the family Conidae , the cone snails and their allies .
Erechthias simulans is a fungus moth species ( family Tineidae ) .
Menziesichthys bacescui is a species of cusk eel only known from the Peru - Chile trench at depths of from 1,296 to 1,317 metres ( 4,252 to 4,321 ft ) .
Nucras is a genus of African lacertid lizards , commonly called sandveld lizards .
Qinghaichthys rotundiventris is a species of ray - finned fish in the genus Qinghaichthys .
Synodontis pulcher is a species of upside - down catfish endemic to the Democratic Republic of the Congo where it is only known from Stanley Pool .
Raorchestes tuberohumerus ( Kudremukh bush frog or knob handed shrub frog ) is a species of frog in the Rhacophoridae family .
Dorstenia uxpanapana is a species of herb in the plant family Moraceae which is native to Mexico .
Streptomyces blastmyceticus is a bacterium species from the genus of Streptomyces which has been isolated from soil in the Chichibu District in Japan .
Dryptosaurus ( pron.:``DRIP - toe - SORE - us '' ) is a genus of primitive tyrannosauroid that lived approximately 67 million years ago during the latter part of the Cretaceous period in what is now Eastern North America .
Bulla gouldiana , the California bubble , Gould 's bubble or cloudy bubble snail , is a species of sea snail , a marine gastropod mollusc in the family Bullidae , the bubble snails .
Newportia is a genus of scolopocryptopid centipedes .
Haplochromis parorthostoma is a species of cichlid endemic to Lake Victoria where it is known from areas with hard substrates .
Ehretia saligna , commonly known as Peach Bush , Native Willow and Peachwood is a species of shrubs or small trees , endemic to Northern Australia .
Lilium philadelphicum , also known as the wood lily , Philadelphia lily , prairie lily or western red lily , is a perennial species of lily native to North America .
Acromyrmex is a genus of New World ants of the subfamily Myrmicinae .
Icaunauna aurantium is a species of beetle in the family Cerambycidae , and the only species in the genus Icaunauna .
Taivala is a spider genus of the Salticidae family ( jumping spiders ) with only one species , Taivala invisitata .
Systata angustata is a species of ulidiid or picture - winged fly in the genus Systata of the family Tephritidae .
The Sumatran surili ( Presbytis melalophos ) is a species of primate in the family Cercopithecidae .
Uncaria guianensis , cat 's claw , is a plant species in the genus Uncaria found in Amazonia .
Passiflora antioquiensis ( the red banana passionfruit ) is a species in the Passifloraceae family .
Phyllodoce breweri is a species of flowering plant in the heath family known by the common names purple mountain heath and Brewer 's mountain heather .
Limacella glischra is a mushroom species in the family Amanitaceae .
Gnatusuchus is an extinct genus of caiman represented by the type species Gnatusuchus pebasensis from the Middle Miocene of Peru .
Badister ajax is a species of ground beetle that is in the genus Badister .
Tagetes laxa is a South American species of marigolds in the sunflower family .
Allopaa hazarensis ( common names : Kashmir paa frog , Hazara frog , Hazara torrent frog ) is a species of frog in the Dicroglossidae family .
Although Darwin is said to have found the first glyptodonts ( the family ) , the first mention of the genus Glyptodon in Europe was in 1823 , from the first edition of Cuvier 's `` Ossemens Fossiles . ''
Mobiluncus is a genus of Gram - negative , anaerobic , rod - shaped bacteria .
Allotinus is a genus of butterflies in the family Lycaenidae . The members ( species ) of this genus are found in the Indomalaya ecozone .
Carex obtusata ( also known as obtuse sedge ) is a species of sedge in the massive genus Carex .
Archaeophya is a small genus of dragonflies belonging to the family Corduliidae .
Drosera subtilis is an erect annual species in the carnivorous plant genus Drosera .
Lathraea squamaria , the common toothwort , is a species of toothwort .
The single species , Akania bidwillii ( Turnipwood ) , is a tree that is native to rainforests in New South Wales and Queensland in Australia .
The tree species Pinus koraiensis is commonly called Korean pine .
Neotrachystola maculipennis is a species of beetle in the family Cerambycidae , and the only species in the genus Neotrachystola .
Leucochrysum is a genus of flowering plants in the pussy's - toes tribe within the sunflower family , endemic to Australia .
Coilostylis clavata , formerly Epidendrum purpurascens , is a species of orchid in the genus Coilostylis .
Clavaviridae is a family of double - stranded viruses that infect archaea .
Digulia is a monotypic genus of hoverfly from the family Syrphidae , in the order Diptera .
Trombidium is a genus of mite with about 30 described species .
Allium longicollum is a plant species found in Pakistan and Afghanistan .
Lynchius parkeri ( common name : Parker 's Andes frog ) is a species of frog in the Craugastoridae family .
Eriogonum covilleanum is a species of wild buckwheat known by the common name Coville 's buckwheat .
The Madagascar diadem , Hypolimnas dexithea , is a species of Hypolimnas butterfly endemic to Madagascar .
Algyroides alleni is a species of lizard in the family Lacertidae .
Prostanthera cuneata ( alpine mint bush or rough mint bush ) is a species of flowering plant in the family Lamiaceae , native to south - eastern Australia .
Millepora complanata , commonly known as blade fire coral , is a species of fire coral in the family Milleporidae .
Evolvulus is a genus of flowering plants in the Convolvulaceae , the morning glory family .
The Sabaconidae are a family of harvestmen with about 50 known species .
Palatobaena is an extinct genus of baenid turtle .
Liometopum sinense is a species of ant in the genus Liometopum .
Nectosaurus is a genus of marine diapsid reptile which lived during the Late Triassic of what is now California .
Pellaea rotundifolia , the button fern , is a species of fern endemic to New Zealand , where it grows in scrub and forests .
Botrytis cinerea ( `` botrytis '' from Ancient Greek botrys ( βότρυς ) meaning `` grapes '' plus the Neolatin suffix -itis for disease ) is a necrotrophic fungus that affects many plant species , although its most notable hosts may be wine grapes .
Bainella is an extinct genus of Devonian trilobite from off the coast of Gondwana in what is present day Brazil , Bolivia and South Africa .
Amoebidiidae is a family or protists , previously thought to be zygomycete fungi belonging to the class Trichomycetes , but now considered to be members of the opisthokont protist group Mesomycetozoea .
Sasakia charonda , commonly known as the Japanese emperor or the great purple emperor , is a species of butterflies in the family Nymphalidae .
Solanum glaucophyllum is a species of the family Solanaceae .
Epimedium , also known as barrenwort , bishop 's hat , fairy wings , horny goat weed , rowdy lamb herb , randy beef grass or yin yang huo ( Chinese : 淫羊藿 ) , is a genus of flowering plants in the family Berberidaceae .
Vasum ceramicum , common name ceramic vase or heavy whelk , is a species of medium to large sea snail , a marine gastropod mollusk in the family Turbinellidae .
The Clionidae are a family of sea angels , which are a group of pelagic marine gastropods .
Gorgopithecus is an extinct genus of primate , closely related to the baboons .
Heterorhabditis is a genus of nematodes belonging to the order Rhabditida .
Fragaria iturupensis , the Iturup Strawberry , is a species of strawberry , endemic to Iturup in the Kuril Islands .
Haliplus apicalis is a species of water beetle in the genus Haliplus .
Mirorictus taningi is a species of tubeshoulder only known from the Gulf of Panama where it is found at depths of around 1,750 metres ( 5,740 ft ) .
Arnica lessingii is a Russian and North American species of arnica in the sunflower family .
Malus brevipes , with the common name shrub apple , is a species of crabapple in the genus Malus , in the family Rosaceae .
Ovatipsa chinensis common name the Chinese cowrie , is a species of cowry , a sea snail , a marine gastropod mollusk in the family Cypraeidae , the cowries .
The bee subfamily Alocandreninae contains only one genus and one species , Alocandrena porteri , which is found in Peru .
Xenagama is a genus of lizards , in the Agamidae family found in Somalia and Ethiopia .
Scleroptila is a genus of birds in the francolin group of the partridge subfamily of the pheasant family .
Vicia nigricans is a species of vetch known by the common name black vetch .
Penstemon calcareus is a species of penstemon known by the common name limestone beardtongue .
Tarphops is a genus of large - tooth flounders native to the northwest Pacific Ocean .
Trigonospila brevifacies is a species of true fly in the family Tachinidae native to eastern Australia .
Deltaherpeton is an extinct genus of colosteid from middle Mississippian ( late Viséan age ) deposits of Delta , Iowa , USA .
Heliamphora neblinae is a species of marsh pitcher plant endemic to Cerro de la Neblina , Cerro Aracamuni and Cerro Avispa in Venezuela .
Percina aurora is a species of fish known by the common name pearl darter .
Nothobranchius robustus , the red Victoria nothobranch , is a species of fish in the Aplocheilidae family .
Clusia is the type genus of the family Clusiaceae .
The Chromadorea are a class of the roundworm phylum , Nematoda .
Leiopyrga octona , common name the eight - ringed weed shell , is a species of small sea snail , a marine gastropod mollusk in the family Trochidae , the top snails .
Only one species has been described , Apatosagittarius terrenus .
Apterichtus australis , the Snake eel or the South Pacific snake eel , is a species of snake eel native to the south Pacific Ocean where it occurs around the island groups of Rapa Iti , Pitcairn , Easter and the Kermadecs .
Mangelia is a large genus of sea snails , marine gastropod mollusks in the family Mangeliidae .
The Blue - shouldered Cornuted Shadowdamsel , ( Drepanosticta subtropica ) is a species of damselfly in the family Platystictidae .
Cyanthillium is a genus of tropical plants in the ironweed tribe within the sunflower family .
This is a monotypic genus , containing the single species Aqualignicola hyalina .
Phallus callichrous is a species of fungus in the stinkhorn family found in South America .
Montfortia subemarginata , common name the emarginate limpet , is a species of sea snail , a marine gastropod mollusk in the family Fissurellidae , the keyhole limpets and slit limpets .
Asclepias viridiflora , called the `` green milkweed , '' is a widely distributed species of milkweed known from much of the eastern and central United States from Connecticut to Georgia to Arizona to Montana , as well as southern Canada .
Buddleja davidii ( spelling variant Buddleia davidii ) , also called summer lilac , butterfly - bush , or orange eye , is a species of flowering plant in the family Scrophulariaceae , native to Sichuan and Hubei provinces in central China , and also Japan .
Hoplocorypha mellea is a species of praying mantis found in Ethiopia , Kenya , and Tanzania .
Hernandia is a genus of flowering plants in the family Hernandiaceae .
Dyscia atlantica is a species of moth from the Geometridae family .
Lobelia oahuensis is a rare species of flowering plant in the bellflower family known by the common name Oahu lobelia .
Gymnoxenisthmus tigrellus , is a species of Xenisthmidae family endemic to Red Sea .
Calliostoma aurora , common name the dawn top shell , is a species of sea snail , a marine gastropod mollusk in the family Calliostomatidae .
Heleosaurus is an extinct genus of non - mammalian synapsid from the Late Permian of South Africa .
The Gila chub ( Gila intermedia ) is a species of ray - finned fish in the Cyprinidae family .
Hakea chordophylla , commonly known as bootlace oak , bootlace tree , corkwood , or bull oak , is a species of shrub or small tree in the family Proteaceae found in central and northern Australia .
Parvulastra parvivipara is a very small species of starfish in the family Asterinidae .
Hastanectes is an extinct genus of a plesiosaurian with possible pliosaurid affinities known from the Early Cretaceous Wadhurst Clay Formation ( Valanginian stage ) of the United Kingdom .
Hemipsilichthys is a genus of catfishes belonging to the family Loricariidae .
Brocchinia is a genus of the botanical family Bromeliaceae , subfamily Pitcairnioideae .
Nepenthes chaniana ( /nɨˈpɛnθiːz ˌtʃæniˈɑːnə/ ; after Datuk Chan Chew Lun , Managing Director of Natural History Publications ( Borneo ) ) is a tropical pitcher plant species belonging to the genus Nepenthes .
Callionymus oxycephalus is a species of dragonet endemic to the Red Sea .
Zonocypretta kalimna is a species of ostracod crustacean in the family Cyprididae .
Simosaurus is an extinct genus of marine reptile within the superorder Sauropterygia from the Middle Triassic of central Europe .
Megalomyrmex miri is a Neotropical species of ants in the subfamily Myrmicinae .
Pteromenes is a monotypical afrotropical genus of potter wasps known from Eastern Africa ( Kenya and Somalia ) .
Paranephrolenellus is an extinct genus of trilobite , fossil marine arthropods .
Tosena depicta is a cicada species from Southeast Asia
The type species is Angustinaripterus longicephalus .
Perisphinctoidea , formerly Perisphinctaceae , is a superfamily of Middle Jurassic ( Bajocian ) to Lower Cretaceous ( Barremian ) ammonites , commonly with evolute shells with strong ribbing that typically divides about mid flank before crossing the venter .
Mikrogeophagus altispinosus is a species of fish endemic to the Amazon River basin in Brazil and Bolivia .
Polystichum lemmonii is a species of fern known by the common names Lemmon 's holly fern and Shasta fern .
Cristisse bicristata is a species of beetle in the family Cerambycidae , and the only species in the genus Cristisse .
Pyramidula pusilla is a species of very small air - breathing land snail , a terrestrial pulmonate gastropod mollusk or micromollusk in the family Pyramidulidae .
Sepiolina nipponensis , also known as the Japanese Bobtail Squid , is a bobtail squid and the only species in the genus Sepiolina .
Augaptilidae is a family of copepods , comprising the following genera :
Orthotylus eleagni is a species of bug from the Miridae family that is endemic to Ukraine .
Belinurus is an extinct genus of arthropods belonging to the order Xiphosura .
Eumegamys is an extinct genus of dinomyid rodent from the late Miocene and Pliocene of South America .
Ammannia robusta is a species of flowering plant in the loosestrife family known by the common name grand redstem .
The Nemouridae are a family of stoneflies , with more than 600 described species with a mainly Holarctic distribution .
Zodarion sardum is a spider species found in Sardinia .
Themeda is a genus of plants in the grass family native to Asia , Africa , Australia , and Papuasia .
Pritchardia pacifica , or the Fiji Fan Palm , is a species of palm tree in the genus Pritchardia that is native to Tonga .
Carabus sylvestris kolbi is a subspecies of beetle from Carabidae family , that can be found in Austria and Slovenia .
Cycas angulata is a species of cycad in the genus Cycas , native to Australia in northeast Northern Territory ( lower reaches of the Foelsche , Robinson and Wearyan Rivers near Borroloola ) and northwest Queensland ( Bountiful Islands ) .
Chrysiptera starcki is a species of damselfish known by the common name Starck 's demoiselle .
Fejervarya iskandari is a species of frog that is endemic to Java , Indonesia .
Euxesta albitarsis is a species of ulidiid or picture - winged fly in the genus Euxesta of the family Tephritidae .
Rytidosperma pumilum , also known as Feldmark Grass , is a species of grass in the Poaceae family .
The Lamprophiidae are a family of snakes found in Africa , Asia , America , and Europe .
Falsatimura grisescens is a species of beetle in the family Cerambycidae , and the only species in the genus Falsatimura .
Conus bandanus , common name the banded marble cone , is a species of sea snail , a marine gastropod mollusk in the family Conidae , the cone snails and their allies .
Ammatucha porisada is a species of snout moth in the genus Ammatucha .
Turbinella laevigata , common name the Brazilian chank , is a species of very large sea snail with a gill and an operculum , a marine gastropod mollusk in the subfamily Turbinellinae of the family Turbinellidae .
Hydrophis ornatus , commonly known as the ornate reef sea snake , is a species of venomous sea snake in the family Elapidae .
Mulinia cleryana is a species of medium - sized saltwater clam , a marine bivalve mollusc in the family Mactridae .
Afroneta elgonensis is a species of sheet weaver found in the Congo .
Pterotaenia peruana is a species of ulidiid or picture - winged fly in the genus Pterotaenia of the family Ulidiidae .
Osteoglossiformes ( Greek : `` bony tongues '' ) is a relatively primitive order of ray - finned fish that contains two sub - orders , the Osteoglossoidei and the Notopteroidei .
Eryngium pinnatisectum is an uncommon species of flowering plant in the carrot family known by the common name Tuolumne eryngo , or Tuolumne button celery .
Salmo obtusirostris , also known as the Adriatic trout , Adriatic salmon , and softmouth trout , is a species of salmonid fish endemic to the rivers of Western Balkans in southeastern Europe .
Helianthella , the little sunflower , is a genus of North American plants in the sunflower family .
Gastrophysa polygoni is a species of leaf beetle in the subfamily Chrysomelinae .
The Italian loach ( Sabanejewia larvata ) is a species of ray - finned fish in the Cobitidae family .
Thamnobryum angustifolium , the Derbyshire feathermoss , is a species of moss in the Neckeraceae family .
Puccinellia howellii is a rare species of grass known by the common name Howell 's alkaligrass .
Camponotini is a tribe containing several ant genera , including Camponotus ( carpenter ants ) .
Tiquilia palmeri is a species of flowering plant in the borage family known by the common names Palmer 's crinklemat and Palmer 's tiquilia .
Apodasya pilosa is a species of beetle in the family Cerambycidae , and the only species in the genus Apodasya .
Otidea leporina is a species of fungus in the family Pyronemataceae .
Mimoides is a genus of butterflies in the family Papilionidae .
The Tellinidae are a family of marine bivalve molluscs of the order Veneroida .
Cymodocea is a genus in the family Cymodoceaceae described as a genus in 1805 .
Copamyntis spodoptila is a species of snout moth in the genus Copamyntis .
Campanula alliariifolia is a species of bellflower .
The Dryas monkey ( Cercopithecus dryas ) , also known as Salonga monkey or ekele , is a little - known species of guenon found only in the Congo Basin , restricted to the left bank of the Congo River .
Hortaea werneckii is a species of yeast in the family Teratosphaeriaceae .
Pardosa danica is a wolf spider species endemic to Denmark .
Pseudoxenicotela ashantica is a species of beetle in the family Cerambycidae , and the only species in the genus Pseudoxenicotela .
Thecadactylus is a gekko genus from the tropical Americas .
Octomarginula ostheimerae is a species of small sea snail , a marine gastropod mollusk in the family Fissurellidae , the keyhole limpets and slit limpets .
Hedraianthera is a genus of a sole recognised species of shrubs or small trees found only in Australia .
Pseudoditrichum is a rare North American genus of mosses .
Aeonium urbicum is a species of plant in the Crassulaceae family .
Asquamiceps is a genus of slickheads that occurs in all oceans .
Brachygobius kabiliensis , commonly known as the kabili bumblebee goby , is a species of goby .
Convolvulus clementii , commonly known as Desert Bindweed , is a trailing perennial plant species , native to inland Australia .
Chaetocerotaceae is a diatom family ( Bacillariophyceae ) .
Gyronotus schuelei is a species of scarab beetle .
Galeandra bicarinata is a species of orchid native to Cuba and Florida .
Masdevallia odontocera , or the Tusked Masdevallia , is a species of epiphytic orchid native to the cloud forests of Colombia .
Acourtia microcephala is a species of flowering plant in the daisy family known by the common name sacapellote .
Nannodiella oxia , common name the glassy dwarf turrid , is a species of sea snail , a marine gastropod mollusk in the family Clathurellidae .
Oreolalax rhodostigmatus ( Guizhou lazy toad or red - spotted toothed toad ) is a species of amphibian in the Megophryidae family .
Stefania roraimae ( common names : Roraima treefrog , Roraima stefania ) is a species of frog in the family Hemiphractidae .
Lycosuchidae is an extinct family of therocephalian therapsids from the Middle Permian Beaufort Group of South Africa .
Canacidae , incorrectly Canaceidae , or beach flies , surf or surge flies , is a family of Diptera . There are 113 species in 12 genera .
Fundulidae is the family of topminnows and North American killifishes .
The Baudin 's black cockatoo is one of two species of white - tailed black cockatoo endemic to south - western Australia which were only separated taxonomically in 1948 .
Eckloniaichthys scylliorhiniceps , the Weedsucker , is a species of clingfish found along the coasts of Namibia and South Africa .
Diemenomyia is a genus of crane fly in the family Limoniidae . There are only two known species .
Castilleja sessiliflora is a species of flowering plant in the broomrape family known by the common names downy Indian paintbrush and downy paintedcup .
Minuartia stolonifera is a rare species of flowering plant in the pink family known by the common names Scott Mountain sandwort and stolon sandwort .
Haplochromis mylodon is a species of cichlid found in the Democratic Republic of the Congo and Uganda where it occurs in the Kazinga Channel , Lake George and Lake Edward .
Ivindomyrus opdenboschi is a species of elephantfish in the family Mormyridae and the only member of its genus .
Ianthella basta or elephant ear sponge is a species of fan - shaped sponge in the class Demospongiae .
Galbula is the type and largest genus of the jacamar family ( Galbulidae ) of piciform birds , and its suborder Galbulae .
Procolophonomorpha is an order or clade of early reptiles that appeared during the Middle Permian .
Agyneta gagnei is a species of sheet weaver found in Hawaii .
Melanophryniscus klappenbachi ( common name : Klappenbach 's red - bellied frog ) is a species of toad in the family Bufonidae .
Myotragus balearicus ( Greek - derived Neo - Latin : μῦς and τράγος and Βαλεαρίδες `` Balearian mouse - goat '' ) , also known as the Balearic Islands cave goat , a species of the subfamily Caprinae which lived on the islands of Majorca and Minorca until its extinction around 5,000 years ago .
The Tubeufiaceae are a family of fungi in the class Dothideomycetes .
Theloderma leporosum ( Malaya bug - eyed frog ) is a species of frog in the Rhacophoridae family .
Hygrobia is a genus of aquatic beetle native to Europe , North Africa , China and Australia .
Since its emergence in honeybees Nosema ceranae has now been identified in bumblebee species in South America , China , and England where infection studies indicate Nosema ceranae has a higher virulence in bumblebees than honeybees .
Whale barnacles are barnacles belonging to the family Coronulidae .
Gymnosoma clavatum is a species of tachinid flies in the genus Gymnosoma of the family Tachinidae .
Arctostaphylos virgata is a species of manzanita known by the common names Bolinas manzanita and Marin manzanita .
Omphalosaurus is an extinct genus of marine reptile from the Middle Triassic .
Thorina is a genus of amphipod crustaceans comprising the two species Thorina spinosa and Thorina elongata .
Bucranium taurifrons is a species of ant - mimicking crab spiders from South America , the only species in the genus Bucranium .
Lambertia is a genus of flowering plants , belonging to the family Proteacea .
Metrosideros boninensis is a species of flowering plant in the family Myrtaceae .
Poposaurus is an extinct genus of pseudosuchian archosaur from the Late Triassic of the southwestern United States .
Biwia is a small genus of cyprinid fishes containing three species , all of which are endemic to Japan , and only one species ( B. springeri ) from Korea .
Lischkeia imperialis , common name : the Giant Imperial Margarite , is a species of sea snail , a marine gastropod mollusk in the family Calliotropidae .
Gekko vittatus is a species of gecko .
Calliostoma megaloprepes is a species of medium - sized sea snail , a marine gastropod mollusc in the family Calliostomatidae .
Tricyrtis macropoda is an East Asian plant species in the lily family native to China , Korea , and Japan .
Coreopsis verticillata is a North American species of tickseed in the sunflower family .
Symphoricarpos orbiculatus , commonly called coralberry , buckbrush or Indian currant is a woody species of flowering plant in the honeysuckle family .
Algericeras is an extinct Ammonite genus belonging to the Acathoceratacea that lived during the Cenomanian stage at the beginning of the Late Cretaceous in what is now Mexico .
Kimberleyeleotris is a genus of sleeper gobies endemic to Australia , where they are only known from rivers in the Kimberley region of Western Australia .
Melipona subnitida is a neotropical endemic bee species in the Apidae family found in the dry areas of Northeastern Brazil .
Drakaea concolor , commonly known as the kneeling hammer orchid is a species of orchid endemic to the south -- west of Western Australia .
† Littoridina gaudichaudii is a species of small freshwater snail with a gill and an operculum , an aquatic gastropod mollusk in the family Hydrobiidae .
Eryngium ovinum , commonly known as the blue devil , is a plant species native to Australia .
Lemna gibba , the gibbous duckweed , swollen duckweed , or fat duckweed , is a species of Lemna ( duckweed ) .
Acropora subglabra is a species of acroporid coral found in the northern Indian Ocean , the central Indo - Pacific , Australia , Southeast Asia , Japan , the East China Sea and the oceanic west Pacific Ocean .
Heppia is a genus of olive , brownish , gray , or blackish squamulose , crustose , or peltate lichens .
Astragalus brachycalyx ( manna , Persian manna , syn . Astracantha adscendens , Astragalus adscendens ) is a species of legume commonly found on rocky mountain slopes in western Asia , from western Iran and northern Iraq to Turkey , and is commonly used as a source of gum tragacanth .
Gastrochilus intermedius is a species of orchid growing in China ( South East Sichuan ) , North East India , Thailand and Vietnam .
Mammillaria tetrancistra is a species of fishhook cactus known by the common name common fishhook cactus .
Streptomyces coacervatus is a Gram - positive bacterium species from the genus of Streptomyces which has been isolated from the intestinal tract of the common pill - bug Armadillidium vulgare in Chiba City in Japan .
Echeveria setosa , the Mexican fire cracker , is a species of flowering plant in the Crassulaceae family , native to semi - desert areas of Mexico and common throughout Puebla .
Ranunculus septentrionalis , the swamp buttercup , is a species of buttercup found in North America from New Brunswick to Manitoba and from Georgia to Kansas .
This genus contains two species , the type Lenzitopsis oxycedri and L. daii , described as new to science in 2012 .
Fontinalis antipyretica , the antifever fontinalis moss , greater water - moss , or common water moss , is a species of submerged aquatic moss belonging to the subclass Bryidae .
Lethrinus olivaceus , common name Longface emperor or Long - nosed emperor , is a species of bony fishes belonging to the family Lethrinidae .
Escobaria , pincushion cactus or foxtail cactus is a genus of low - growing cacti that range from the southernmost parts of central and western Canada through northern Mexico , with one species in Cuba .
Drosera madagascariensis is a robust stem - forming species with a clearly visible stem , which stands upright in the case of younger plants and either uses its leaves to anchor itself to surrounding vegetation as it matures or bends over and forms a scrambling stem .
Euphorbia obesa is a subtropical succulent species of Euphorbia genus .
The genus is monotypic containing the single species Mielkella singularis from Guatemala and Mexico .
Ceratodacus priscus is a species of prehistoric fly , which probably belongs in the family Tephritidae .
Zabrus tenuestriatus is a species of ground beetle in the Craspedozabrus subgenus that is endemic to Morocco .
Dermogenys collettei is a species of viviparous halfbeak found in freshwater areas in Thailand , Malaysia , Singapore , and Indonesia .
Antrechinus nordenskjoldi is a species of sea urchin of the family Urechinidae .
Cyanea lobata is a rare species of flowering plant in the bellflower family known by the common name Waihee Valley cyanea .
Ravavy is a Malagasy genus of ant in the subfamily Dolichoderinae containing the single species Ravavy miafina .
Milax gagates , known by the common name greenhouse slug , is a species of air - breathing , keeled , land slug , a shell - less terrestrial gastropod mollusk in the family Milacidae .
Alloclavaria is a clavarioid genus in the Hymenochaetales recently segregated from Clavaria by molecular analysis .
Euphorbia telephioides is a rare species of euphorb known by the common name Telephus spurge .
Astragalus is a large genus of about 3,000 species of herbs and small shrubs , belonging to the legume family Fabaceae and the subfamily Faboideae .
Abrekia is an extinct genus of brachiopod found in Early Triassic strata in Russia and China .
Gambusia senilis , the blotched gambusia , is a species of fish in the Poeciliidae family found in Mexico , where it is called guayacon pinto , and the United States .
Pennant 's colobus or Pennant 's red colobus ( Procolobus pennantii ) is a species of tree - dwelling primate in the family Cercopithecidae .
Ozyptila danubiana is a crab spider species found in Romania and Greece .
Duerosuchus is an extinct genus of crocodilian .
Calliptaminae is a subfamily of grasshoppers .
Nuttallia obscurata , common name the `` purple mahogany clam '' , `` dark mahogany clam '' , `` varnish clam '' , or `` savory clam '' , is a species of saltwater clam , a marine bivalve mollusk in the family Psammobiidae .
Bromus aleutensis ( commonly known as Aleutian brome ) is a species of flowering plant in the Poaceae family which can be found in such US states such as Alaska and Washington and also in Canadian provinces such as Alberta , British Columbia , Ontario and Quebec .
Anomiopus ataenioides is a species of true dung beetle that is endemic to northern Argentina , and is known from Salta , Jujuy , Tucumán and Corrientes provinces .
Parthenium hysterophorus is a species of flowering plant in the aster family , Asteraceae .
Gloiocephala lutea is a species of fungus native to Ecuador .
Nymphaea candida J. Presl is a species of aquatic perennial herbaceous plants in the genus Nymphaea native to quiet freshwater habitats in Eurasia , it is in flower from July to August .
Nototherium ( `` Southern Beast '' ) is an extinct genus of marsupial from Australia .
Igerna neosa is a species of leafhopper from Madagascar .
The superfamily Amphiaspidoidei contains four families .
Cyperus is a large genus of about 700 species of sedges , distributed throughout all continents in both tropical and temperate regions .
Pseudozygocera albomaculata is a species of beetle in the family Cerambycidae , and the only species in the genus Pseudozygocera .
Labidiosuchus is an extinct genus of notosuchian mesoeucrocodylian from Minas Gerais State , southeastern Brazil .
Acer castorrivularis is an extinct maple species in the family Sapindaceae described from a solitary fossil leaf .
Terebra robusta , common name Robust Auger , is a species of sea snail , a marine gastropod mollusk in the family Terebridae , the auger snails .
The Synthemistidae are the family of dragonflies commonly known as tigertails , or sometimes called southern emeralds .
Strumaria unguiculata is a plant species endemic to Western Cape Province in South Africa .
Mandrillus is the genus of the mandrill and its close relative the drill .
Vulpia bromoides , brome fescue , is a grass species native to Europe , North Africa , and Asia Minor .
Fittonia albivenis is a species of flowering plant in the family Acanthaceae , native to the rainforests of Colombia , Peru , Bolivia , Ecuador and northern Brazil .
Tuberoschistura baenzigeri is a species of freshwater fish found in streams in Thailand and the Malay Peninsula .
Clarkia rhomboidea is a species of wildflower known by the common names diamond clarkia and forest clarkia .
Ariamnes makue is a species of spider in the Theridiidae family .
Chubutemys was an extinct genus of meiolaniform turtle .
Atergatis subdentatus , also known as the red reef crab , dark - finger coral crab or eyed coral crab , is a species of crab in the family Xanthidae .
The Boullanger Island dunnart ( Sminthopsis boullangerensis ) is a species of dunnart found only on Boullanger Island , Western Australia .
Ericameria juarezensis is a plant species in the sunflower family , found only in the mountains of northern Baja California .
Stilbocarpa polaris , commonly known as the Macquarie Island cabbage , is a species of flowering plant usually placed in the family Araliaceae .
Synanceiidae is a family of Actinopterygii , ray - finned fish , found in the Indo - Pacific oceans .
Limosella acaulis is a species of flowering plant in the figwort family known by the common name Owyhee mudwort .
Sabal causiarum , commonly known as the Puerto Rico palmetto or Puerto Rican hat palm , is a species of palm which is native to Hispaniola , Puerto Rico and the British Virgin Islands .
Pelagiarctos was a genus of walrus that lived during the Mid Miocene , approx . 13 - 15 mya .
Rubus trifronsis a rare North American species of flowering plant in the rose family .
Djebelemuridae is an extinct family of early strepsirrhine primates from Africa .
†Viviparus diluvianus is an extinct species of freshwater snail with an operculum , an aquatic gastropod mollusk in the family Viviparidae , the river snails .
Koompassia excelsa , also known as Tualang ( Tapang ) , or Mengaris , is an emergent tropical rainforest tree species in the Fabaceae family .
Erosaria spurca , common name the dirty cowry , is a species of sea snail , a cowry , a marine gastropod mollusk in the family Cypraeidae , the cowries .
Entheus eumelus is a species of butterfly of the Hesperiidae family .
Tipula montium is a species of True Cranefly .
Micropterix rothenbachii is a species of moth belonging to the family Micropterigidae that was described by Frey in 1856 .
Didymocantha obliqua is a species of longhorn beetle native to Australia .
Tinoderus singularis is a species of beetle in the family Carabidae , the only species in the genus Tinoderus .
Bdallophytum is a genus of parasitic flowering plants with five described species .
Paracanthonchus kreisi is a species of nematode from the Cyatholaimidae family .
Handleyomys melanotis , also known as the black - eared oryzomys or black - eared rice rat , is a species of rodent in the genus Handleyomys of family Cricetidae .
Catognatha gracilis is a species of beetle in the family Cerambycidae , and the only species in the genus Catognatha .
Parasphendale affinis , given the common name budwing mantis , named because of the female 's short wings , is a species of praying mantis .
Agave mckelveyana , common name McKelvey 's Century Plant , is a species endemic to west - central Arizona , at elevations of 800 - -2,200 m ( 2,600 - -7,200 ft ) .
Glossaulax petiveriana is a species of sea snail , a marine gastropod mollusk in the family Naticidae , the moon snails .
Eubranchus tricolor , common name the painted balloon aeolis , is a species of sea slug , an aeolid nudibranch , a marine gastropod mollusc in the family Eubranchidae .
Hydatina albocincta , common name the White - banded bubble , is a species of sea snail or bubble snail , a marine opisthobranch gastropod mollusk in the family Aplustridae .
Aeromonas salmonicida is a pathogenic bacterium that severely impacts salmonid populations and other species .
Calochortus elegans is a species of flowering plant in the lily family known by the common name elegant Mariposa lily and cat 's ear .
Inga thibaudiana is a species of tropical tree in the Mimosoideae subfamily of Fabaceae .
Pinnocaris is a genus of rostroconch mollusc known from the Cambro - Ordovician .
Arionoidea is a taxonomic group , superfamily of air - breathing land slugs , shell - less terrestrial pulmonate gastropod mollusks .
The Calyptraeidae , the slipper snails or slipper limpets , cup - and - saucer snails , and Chinese hat snails , are a family of small to medium - sized marine prosobranch gastropods .
Aparallactus lunulatus , or the reticulated centipede - eater , is a species of venomous rear - fanged snake in the family Atractaspididae , which is endemic to Africa .
Synchiropus morrisoni , or Morrison 's dragonet is a species of tropical marine fish in the Dragonet ( Callionymidae ) family .
Pylaiella ( mung ) is a genus of seaweed ( brown algae ) that can be a nuisance due to its ability to coat people , ropes , animals , and more when it blooms close to the shore under particular conditions .
Parastremma is a genus of characins endemic to western Colombia .
Arnica spathulata is a rare North American species of arnica in the sunflower family , known by the common name Klamath arnica .
It contains the single species Oedipodium griffithianum , the gouty - moss or Griffith 's oedipodium moss .
Canarium asperum is a species of plant in the family Burseraceae .
Laetifautor spinulosum , common name the spine top shell , is a species of sea snail , a marine gastropod mollusk in the family Calliostomatidae .
Carnivora ( /kɑːrˈnɪvərə/ ; from Latin carō ( stem carn- ) `` flesh '' , + vorāre `` to devour '' ) is a diverse order that includes over 280 species of placental mammals .
Calliostoma gualterianum , common name Gualtieri 's top shell , is a species of sea snail , a marine gastropod mollusk in the family Calliostomatidae .
The Puntilla tuco - tuco ( Ctenomys coludo ) is a species of rodent in the family Ctenomyidae .
Condylactis aurantiaca , common name golden anemone , is a species of sea anemone in the family Actiniidae .
Utricularia vulgaris ( greater bladderwort or common bladderwort ) is an aquatic species of bladderwort found in Asia and Europe .
Thysanocarpus radians is a species of flowering plant in the mustard family known by the common name ribbed fringepod .
Leporinus fasciatus , commonly known as the banded leporinus or the black - banded leporinus , is a species of characin in the family Anostomidae .
Macgregoromyia is a genus of true crane fly in the family Tipulidae .
Nectocaecilia petersii is a species of amphibians in the Typhlonectidae family .
Cestrum parqui , commonly known as green cestrum , green poison berry , Chilean cestrum or willow - leaved jessamine , and is sometimes incorrectly referred to as deadly nightshade , is a species of flowering plant in the family Solanaceae that is native to central and South America .
Polypogon is a nearly cosmopolitan genus of plants in the grass family , commonly known beard grass or rabbitsfoot grass .
Cinna bolanderi is a species of grass known by the common names Bolander 's woodreed and Sierran woodreed .
Zelliboria daedalea is a species of beetle in the family Cerambycidae , the only species in the genus Zelliboria .
Rhacophorus modestus is a species of frog in the Rhacophoridae family endemic to Sumatra , Indonesia .
Hypomyces hyalinus is a species of parasitic fungi that attacks fungi of the genus Amanita .
Austrostipa variabilis is a species of grass that grows in southern parts of Australia .
Callulina ( commonly known as the warty frogs ) is a small genus of frogs in the family Brevicipitidae with nine members in Tanzania and Kenya .
Myrtartona is a genus of moths of the Zygaenidae family .
Sinacalia is a genus of Chinese plants in the groundsel tribe within the daisy family .
Macristis is a genus of litter moths of the Erebidae family .
Miramella alpina , the ' Green Mountain Grasshopper ' , is a species of ' short - horned grasshoppers ' belonging to the family Acrididae subfamily Melanoplinae .
Aoraia rufivena , the rufous - veined aoraia , is a species of moth of the family Hepialidae .
Juncus patens is a species of rush , known by the common names spreading rush and California grey rush .
†Partula fusca was a species of air - breathing tropical land snail , a terrestrial pulmonate gastropod mollusc in the family Partulidae .
It contains the single species Chlorocrisia irrorata , which is found in Peru .
Morimonella bednariki is a species of beetle in the family Cerambycidae , and the only species in the genus Morimonella .
Discitoceras is an extinct genus of nautiloid from the Lower Carboniferous .
Microcentrum is a genus of katydids , commonly known as angle - wing katydids .
The Dulzura kangaroo rat , or San Diego kangaroo rat , Dipodomys simulans , is a species of rodent in the family Heteromyidae .
Pentarthrum huttoni is a species of wood boring weevil in family Curculionidae .
The present lineage is often included in the Depressariinae as a tribe Amphisbatini , though more often within the context of a `` splitting '' approach to Gelechioidea systematics and taxonomy , wherein the Depressariinae are elevated to full family rank and the Amphisbatinae are treated as a subfamily therein .
Tynanthus guatemalensis , commonly known as k'an , is a flowering plant species in the genus Tynanthus .
Carex humilis ( also known as dwarf sedge ) is a species of sedge that can be found in Western Europe .
Margarites olivaceus , common name the eastern olive margarite , is a species of sea snail , a marine gastropod mollusk in the family Margaritidae .
Ctenogobiops is a genus of marine gobies native to the Indian and Pacific oceans .
The Black Sea tadpole - goby ( Benthophilus nudus ) is a species of goby native to the basin of the Black Sea .
Cemophora coccinea lineri , commonly known as the Texas scarlet snake , is a subspecies of nonvenomous colubrid snake endemic to the United States .
Leptotyphlops emini , or Emin Pasha 's worm snake , is a species of snake in the family Leptotyphlopidae .
It contains only one species , Harmotona diplochorda , which is found in India .
Lewisia brachycalyx is a species of flowering plant in the purslane family known by the common name shortsepal lewisia .
Podarcis carbonelli , commonly known as Carbonell 's wall lizard , is a species of lizard in the family Lacertidae .
Bonatitan is a genus of titanosaurian dinosaur from Argentina .
Nematocarcinoidea is a superfamily of shrimp , comprising four families --
Nebria sitiens is a species of ground beetle in the Nebriinae subfamily that is endemic to Morocco .
Isoetes hieroglyphica is a species of quillwort in the Isoetaceae family .
It contains only one species , Heliorabdia taiwana , which is found in Taiwan .
Fairchildia panamensis is a species of flowering plants in the legume family , Fabaceae .
Torynorrhina is genus of beetles belonging to the Scarabaeidae family , Cetoniinae subfamily .
Cyrtarachne ixoides is an orb - weaver spider species found in the Mediterranean basin to Georgia and in Madagascar .
Palaemonetes cummingi is a species of cave - dwelling shrimp in the family Palaemonidae , known as the Florida cave shrimp or Squirrel Chimney cave shrimp .
Gibberulus gibberulus , common name the humpbacked conch , is a species of sea snail , a marine gastropod mollusk in the family Strombidae , the true conchs .
Winnipegoceras is an extinct nautiloid genus from the Ordovician belonging to the Order Discosorida .
Acada is an Afrotropical genus of skippers .
Gillenia trifoliata ( common names Bowman 's root and Indian physic ) is a species of flowering plant in the Rosaceae family , native to eastern North America from Ontario to Georgia .
Morelia clastolepis , also known as the Mollucan python , is a species of python found in Indonesia .
Planea is a genus of flowering plants in the pussy's - toes tribe within the sunflower family .
Thalassoma newtoni is a species of wrasse endemic to the waters around São Tomé and Príncipe , where it inhabits of rocky reefs at depths around 40 m ( 130 ft ) .
Theropithecus oswaldi is an extinct species of gelada from the early to middle Pleistocene of Kenya , Ethiopia , Tanzania , South Africa , Spain , Morocco and Algeria .
Lycodon butleri , also known as Butler 's wolf snake , is a species of colubrid snake found in southern Thailand and peninsular Malaysia .
Ptychohyla is a genus of frogs ( common names : stream frogs , mountain stream frogs ) in the Hylidae family .
Glomerella cingulata is a plant pathogenic fungus that causes disease on many different hosts including quince and apple bitter rot and anthracnose on many fruit and vegetable species such as mango or cultivated plants like St. John 's Wort ( Hypericum perforatum ) .
It contains the single species Hypocharis clusia , which is found in the Amazon region .
Phyllophoridae is a family of sea cucumbers , marine invertebrates with elongated bodies , leathery skins and feeding tentacles .
Tambja affinis is a species of sea slug , a dorid nudibranch , a marine gastropod mollusk in the family Polyceridae .
Iris histrioides , is a species in the genus Iris , and in the subgenus of Hermodactyloides . It is native to Turkey , and has blue scented flowers .
Epicrocis piliferella is a species of snout moth in the genus Epicrocis .
The family Palorchestidae contains four genera with eight species described .
Galeruca rufa is a species of leaf beetle native to Europe .
Chuanqilong is an extinct genus of ankylosaurid dinosaur from the Early Cretaceous of China .
Megacephala distinguenda is a species of ground beetle in the subfamily of Carabinae that was described by Dejan in 1831 , and can be found in Falcón , Venezuela .
Tympanotonos fuscatus , the West African Mud Creeper , is a species of snail living in brackish water , a gastropod mollusk in the family Potamididae .
Pachymantis bicingulata is a species of praying mantis found in Malaysia , Sumatra , Java , and Borneo .
Trillium lancifolium , the lanceleaf wakerobin , lance - leaved trillium or narrow - leaved trillium , is a species of plants native to the southeastern United States .
Photuris pensylvanica , known by the common names Pennsylvania firefly , lightning bug , and ( in its larval state ) glowworm , is a species of firefly from the United States and Canada .
Vespicula is a genus of waspfishes native to the Indian Ocean and the western Pacific Ocean .
Zakerana pierrei ( Pierre 's wart frog , Pierre 's cricket frog ) is a species of frog in the Dicroglossidae family .
Listeria ivanovii is a species of bacteria in the genus Listeria .
Micrurus lemniscatus , commonly known as the South American coral snake , is a species of venomous elapid snake , native to South America .
Arenaria montana , the mountain sandwort , is a species of flowering plant in the family Caryophyllaceae , native to mountainous regions of southwestern Europe , from the Pyrenees to Portugal .
Cirsium parryi , Parry 's thistle , is a species of North American flowering plants in the aster family .
Pithauria is a genus of grass skippers in the family Hesperiidae .
The Shenandoah Mountain salamander ( Plethodon virginia ) is a species of salamander in the family Plethodontidae , endemic to the United States .
Pyrola minor , known by the common names snowline wintergreen , lesser wintergreen , and common wintergreen , is a plant species of the genus Pyrola .
Ixalotriton niger , the black jumping salamander , is a species of salamander in the family Plethodontidae .
Typhlacontias is a genus of legless , burrowing skinks .
Euryxanthops orientalis is a species of crab found in Sagami Bay , Japan .
Thymus serpyllum , known by the common names of Breckland thyme , wild thyme or creeping thyme , is a species of flowering plant in the mint family Lamiaceae , native to most of Europe and North Africa .
Kuttanacaiman is a monotypic genus of extinct caiman represented by the type species Kuttanacaiman iquitosensis .
Gracixalus jinxiuensis , commonly known as the Jinxiu bubble - nest frog or Jinxiu small treefrog , is a species of shrub frog from northern Vietnam and southern China ( southeastern Yunnan , northeastern Guangxi and southern Hunan ) .
Pseudimbrasia deyrollei is a species of moth found in the mid - latitudes of Africa .
Penicillium brevicompactum is a mould species in the genus Penicillium .
Scydosella is a genus of insect that consists of only one species Scydosella musawasensis .
The Fuding fire belly newt ( Cynops fudingensis ) is a rare species of newt in the Salamandridae family , endemic to China .
Normanniasaurus ( /nɒrmɒ̃niːæsaʊrʌs/ Normannia lizard ) is an extinct genus of basal titanosaur sauropod known from the Early Cretaceous ( Albian stage ) Poudingue Ferrugineux Formation of Seine - Maritime , northwestern France .
Nebria labontei is a species of ground beetle from Nebriinae subfamily that is endemic to US state of Oregon .
Amomum is a genus of plant native to China , the Indian Subcontinent , Southeast Asia , New Guinea , and Queensland .
Thylacodes natalensis , common name the solitary worm shell , is a species of sea snail , a marine gastropod mollusk in the family Vermetidae , the worm snails or worm shells .
Opsilia bucharica is a species of beetle from a Cerambycidae family , that can be found in Tajikistan and Uzbekistan .
Ablepharus rueppellii , known commonly as Rüppell 's snake - eyed skink , is a species of skink found in the Middle East .
Monardella viminea is a species of flowering plant in the mint family known by the common name willowy monardella .
Cusickiella is a small genus containing two species of plants in the mustard family which are native to the western United States .
Phoenix atlantica ( common names Cape Verde Island date palm is an endangered species in the palm family Arecaceae , in the genus Phoenix . It is endemic to the Cape Verde Islands .
Urocyclus is a genus of air - breathing land slugs , terrestrial gastropod mollusks in the family Urocyclidae .
Gelae ( pronounced /'dʒɛlɪ/ ) is a genus of round fungus beetles belonging to the family Leiodidae .
Galinthias amoena is a species of praying mantis found in Angola , Cameroon , Kenya , Malawi , Mozambique , Natal , Sierra Leone , Tanzania , Zanzibar , Transvaal , Zimbabwe and the Congo River region .
Ilex hemiepiphytica is a plant species known only from Costa Rica .
The Saint Helena gumwood ( Commidendrum robustum ) is a species of tree endemic to Saint Helena , Ascension and Tristan da Cunha .
Pyrodinium is a monospecific species with two varieties , Pyrodinium bahamense var . compressum and Pyrodinium bahamanse var . bahamense .
Eretmichthys pinnatus is a species of cusk - eel found in the ocean depths from 1,355 to 2,820 metres ( 4,446 to 9,252 ft ) .
Acartia tranteri is a species of marine copepod belonging to the family Acartiidae .
Danio annulosus is a species of Chain danio fish in the family Cyprinidae in Danio genus .
Myoleja angusta is a species of fruit flies in the genus Myoleja of the family ( biology ) Tephritidae .
Coelognathus is a genus of five ratsnakes that were formerly assigned to the genus Elaphe .
It consists of a single species , Elingamita johnsonii , a tree or shrub endemic to the Three Kings Islands approximately 55 km north of the North Island of New Zealand .
It contains a single species , Trinisaura santamartaensis .
Praxelis is a genus of flowering plants in the boneset tribe within the sunflower family .
Erigeron geiseri is a North American species of flowering plants in the daisy family known by the common name Geiser 's fleabane .
Vertigo pygmaea , common name the `` crested vertigo '' , is a species of minute air - breathing land snail , a terrestrial pulmonate gastropod mollusk in the family Vertiginidae , the whorl snails .
Carabus dufouri is a species of black - coloured beetle from Carabidae family that are endemic to Spain .
Eubotrys recurva is a plant species native to the eastern United States .
Cylindera cursitans is an extant species of tiger beetle in the genus Cylindera :
Pisidium artifex is a species of freshwater clam in the family Sphaeriidae .
Rhodamnia is a group of rainforest trees and shrubs in the myrtle family described as a genus in 1822 .
Phyllocharis undulata is a species of leaf beetle , native to Southeast Asia .
Ablepharus kitaibelii , commonly known as the European copper skink , juniper skink or European snake - eyed skink , is a species of lizard from the skink family ( Scincidae ) .
Calliostoma granulatum , common name the European granular top shell , is a species of sea snail , a marine gastropod mollusk in the family Calliostomatidae .
Yellowfin croaker ( Umbrina roncador ) is a species of croaker occurring from the Gulf of California , Mexico , to Point Conception , California .
Mugil is a genus of mullet in the family Mugilidae found worldwide in tropical and temperate coastal marine waters , but also entering estuaries and rivers .
Pinus peregrinus is an extinct species of pine in the Pinaceae family known from Clarkforkian age Paleocene fossils found in western North Dakota , USA .
Antennaria rosulata is a North American species of flowering plant in the daisy family known by the common name Kaibab pussytoes or woolly pussytoes .
Cobitis brevifasciata is a species of loach endemic to the Korean Peninsula .
Fusiturricula fenimorei , common name Fenimore 's turrid , is a species of sea snail , a marine gastropod mollusk in the family Drilliidae .
Formica exsecta ( the narrow - headed ant or excised wood ant ) is a species of ant found from Western Europe to Asia .
Agaricia tenuifolia , commonly known as thin leaf lettuce coral , is a species of colonial stony coral in the family Agariciidae .
Nassarius cadeei is a species of sea snail , a marine gastropod mollusk in the family Nassariidae , the Nassa mud snails or dog whelks .
Further analysis indicate that Phyllobacterium myrsinacearum and Phyllobacterium rubiacearum should be classified as only species .
Oxalis illinoensis , the Illinois woodsorrel , is a species of flowering plant in the woodsorrel family .
Chrysiogenes arsenatis is a species of bacterium given its own phylum , called the Chrysiogenetes .
Gonioctena fornicata is a species of broad - shouldered leaf beetles belonging to the family Chrysomelidae , subfamily Chrysomelinae .
Ardekania sefidella is a species of snout moth in the genus Ardekania .
Cephalotaxus mannii is a species of plum - yew .
Methanobrevibacter oralis is a species of coccobacillary , non - motile , Gram - positive , methane - producing archaeon .
Streptomyces lincolnensis is a bacterium species in the type genus Streptomyces .
Oncholaimida is an order of nematodes made up of a single superfamily , Oncholaimoidea .
Facheiroa is a genus of cacti , comprising 8 species in 2 subgenera ( Facheiroa and Zehntnerella ) .
The Cribrilinidae family is a part of the suborder Ascophora within the bryozoans .
The Formosan clouded leopard ( Neofelis nebulosa brachyura ) is a clouded leopard subspecies that is endemic to the island of Taiwan .
Ardozyga arganthes is a species of moth in the family Gelechiidae .
Labeobarbus lucius is a species of cyprinid fish found in Angola and the Congo Republic .
Archips georgianus , the Georgia archips moth , is a species of moth of the Tortricidae family .
Psalmopoeus cambridgei , the Trinidad chevron tarantula , is a species of spider in the Theraphosidae family , endemic to Trinidad .
Schefflera kuchingensis is a species of plant in the family Araliaceae .
Cordylecladia erecta is a species of red algae in the family Rhodymeniaceae .
The South African cheetah ( Acinonyx jubatus jubatus ) , also known as the Namibian cheetah , is the most numerous and the nominate cheetah subspecies native to Southern Africa .
Streptaxoidea is a superfamily of air - breathing land snails , terrestrial pulmonate gastropod mollusks in the Stylommatophora .
Myctophum punctatum is a species of mesopelagic fish in the family Myctophidae .
The Montagne d'Ambre dwarf lemur or Andy Sabin 's dwarf lemur ( Cheirogaleus andysabini ) is a species of dwarf lemur known only from Amber Mountain National Park and the surrounding area in northern Madagascar .
Fagus hayatae , also known as Taiwan Beech , is a species of beech tree .
Seioptera colon is a species of ulidiid or picture - winged fly in the genus Seioptera of the family Ulidiidae .
Oncidium flexuosum is a species of orchid found from eastern and southern Brazil to north - central Argentina .
Goniopora , often called flowerpot coral , is a genus of colonial stony coral found in lagoons and turbid water conditions .
Brahea calcarea is a species of palm .
Bathybates is a small genus of predatory cichlids endemic to Lake Tanganyika in east Africa .
Kemp 's thicket rat ( Thamnomys kempi ) is a species of rodent in the family Muridae .
Shewanella gelidimarina is a species of bacteria , notable for being an Antarctic species with the ability to produce eicosapentaenoic acid .
Julodis onopordi is a species of beetles belonging to the Buprestidae family .
Amphiesma leucomystax , commonly known as the white - lipped keelback , is a species of nonvenomous natricine snake found in central Vietnam , Cambodia , and Laos .
Columbarium mariae is a species of pagoda shell , a deepwater sea snail , a marine gastropod mollusc in the family Turbinellidae , the pagoda shells .
Sarcolestes ( meaning `` flesh robber '' ) is an extinct genus of ankylosaurian ornithischian dinosaur from the Oxford Clay of England .
Geranium carolinianum is a species of geranium known by the common name Carolina crane's - bill , or Carolina geranium .
Rotula aquatica is a species of aromatic flowering shrub in the borage family , Boraginaceae .
Eucrosia mirabilis is a species of plant , found in Peru , from where it was originally scientifically described in 1869 , and Ecuador , where it was rediscovered in 1997 .
Agriotherium is an extinct genus of Ursidae of the Miocene through Pleistocene epochs , with fossils found in Neogene strata of North America , Europe , Africa , and Asia , living from ~13.6 - -2.5 Ma , existing for approximately 11.1 million years .
Anomala binotata is a species of scarab ( beetle of the family Scarabaeidae ) .
Megacephalosaurus is an extinct genus of brachauchenine pliosaurid plesiosaur known from the early Late Cretaceous Carlile Shale ( middle Turonian stage ) of Russell County , Kansas , USA .
Leucosyrinx pikei is a species of medium - sized predatory sea snail , a marine gastropod mollusc in the family Turridae , the turrids .
Acrodus is an extinct genus of cartilaginous fish from the Permian , Triassic and Jurassic periods .
Metopacanthus is an extinct genus of cartilaginous fish from the middle Jurassic of Europe .
Streptomyces flavovariabilis is a bacterium species from the genus of Streptomyces which has been isolated from soil in Tayga in Sibiria in Russia .
Steneofiber is an extinct genus of beavers from Eurasia .
Paracanthopterygii is a superorder of fishes .
Cyathea hymenodes is a species of tree fern native to the Malay Peninsula , Sumatra , and possibly Java , where it grows in montane forest at an altitude of 900 - 2000 m. The trunk of this plant is erect and 2 - 4 m tall .
Agniopsis flavovittatus is a species of beetle in the family Cerambycidae , and the only species in the genus Agniopsis .
Silene lanceolata is a rare species of flowering plant in the pink family known by the common names Kauai catchfly and lanceolate catchfly .
Lampropeltis calligaster rhombomaculata known commonly as the mole kingsnake or brown kingsnake is a subspecies of the prairie kingsnake ( Lampropeltis calligaster ) .
Perenniporia fraxinophila is a species of fungus in family Polyporaceae .
Sanguinolaria tellinoides is a species of saltwater clams , marine bivalve molluscs of the family Psammobiidae .
Gaillardia multiceps , onion blanketflower , is a North American species of flowering plant in the sunflower family .
Rupela is a genus of moths of the Crambidae family .
Lehmann 's poison frog or the red - banded poison frog ( Oophaga lehmanni ) is a species of frog in the family Dendrobatidae endemic to a small part of western Colombia .
Narcissus jonquilla ( jonquil , rush daffodil ) is a bulbous flowering plant , a species of Narcissus ( daffodil ) that is native to Spain and Portugal , but has now become naturalised in many other regions :
Plowmanianthus Faden & C.R.Hardy is a genus of plants with 5 species and 2 subspecies in the family Commelinaceae ( the spiderwort and dayflower family ) .
Baptisia arachnifera , commonly known as hairy rattleweed , cobwebby wild indigo , hairy wild indigo , and hairy false indigo , is an endangered species of flowering plant in the legume family .
Eburiaca sinopia is a species of beetle in the family Cerambycidae , the only species in the genus Eburiaca .
Mertens ' Yellow Treefrog ( Dendropsophus robertmertensi ) is a species of frog in the Hylidae family .
Pittosporum napaliense , the royal cheesewood , is a species of plant in the Pittosporaceae family .
Collybia tuberosa , commonly known as the lentil shanklet or the appleseed coincap , is an inedible species of fungus in the Tricholomataceae family , and the type species of the genus Collybia .
The Ammodiscacea is a superfamily of Foraminifera in the order Textulariida .
Pomatias elegans , common name the round - mouthed snail , is a species of small land snail with an operculum , a terrestrial gastropod mollusk in the family Pomatiidae within the superfamily Littorinoidea , the winkles and their allies .
Odontadenia is a genus of plant in the Apocynaceae family , first described as a genus in 1841 .
Bromus kalmii , Arctic brome and Prairie brome , is a species of brome grass .
Melica tangutorum , is a species of grass in the Poaceae family that can be found in China ( Gansu , Qinghai , Sichuan ) and Mongolia .
Dicerandra frutescens is a rare species of flowering plant in the mint family known by the common names scrub mint and scrub balm .
Typhula is a genus of clavarioid fungi in the order Agaricales .
Themistonoe cacica is a species of beetle in the family Cerambycidae , and the only species in the genus Themistonoe .
Paraleptomenes is a primarily Indomalayan genus of potter wasps .
Brachyopsis segaliensis is a species of poacher native to the northwest Pacific Ocean where it is found at depths of from 0 to 110 metres ( 0 to 361 ft ) .
Spiders in the genus Styposis are small and unpigmented with fairly long legs , and measure less than 2 mm in total .
Chirostoma is a genus of Neotropical silversides from the Lerma River basin in Mexico , including Lake Chapala .
Eryalus tigrinus is a species of beetle in the family Cerambycidae , and the only species in the genus Eryalus .
Ribes cereum is a species of currant known by the common names wax currant and squaw currant ( R. c. var . pedicellare is known as whisky currant ) .
Elephantopus is a genus of perennial plants in the daisy family .
Karenia bicuneiformis , also known as Karenia bidigitata is a microbial species from the genus Karenia , which are dinoflagellates .
Ameles wadisirhani is a species of praying mantis found in Saudi Arabia .
Zoma zoma is a species of ray spider that is endemic to Silhouette Island of Seychelles .
Sason robustum is a species of barychelid trapdoor spiders .
Euryxanthops latifrons is a species of crab found in the New Caledonian Exclusive Economic Zone .
It contains only one species , Pseudogaltara inexpectata , which can be found in Rwanda .
Pterospermum suberifolium or the cork - leaved bayur is a species of evergreen flowering plant in the Malvaceae family .
Ecsenius polystictus , known commonly as the Andaman combtooth - blenny , is a species of combtooth blenny in the genus Ecsenius .
Pedobacter is a genus of Gram - negative soil - associated bacteria .
Carex intumescens , also known as bladder sedge , is a species of Carex native to Canada and the eastern United States .
Saccoloma laxum is a species of fern in the family Lindsaeaceae .
Spiraxidae is a family of predatory air - breathing land snails , terrestrial pulmonate gastropods in the superfamily Testacelloidea ( according to the taxonomy of the Gastropoda by Bouchet & Rocroi , 2005 ) .
Eriotrix is a genus of flowering plants in the daisy family , endemic to the Island of Réunion in the Indian Ocean , part of the French Republic .
Mimodacne rhodesiaca is a species of beetles in the family Erotylidae .
Tussilago farfara is the only accepted species in the genus Tussilago , although more than two dozen other species have at one time or another been considered part of this group .
Eriauchenius is a genus of assassin spiders that occurs almost exclusively on Madagascar .
Collybia cirrhata is a species of fungus in the Tricholomataceae family of the Agaricales order ( gilled mushrooms ) .
Dactylina arctica is a species of fungus within the family Parmeliaceae .
Garcinia oliveri is a cousin species of the mangosteen and also bears edible fruit .
Eburia bonairensis is a species of beetle in the Cerambycidae family , that is endemic to Suriname .
Leymus cinereus ( syn . Elymus cinereus ) is a species of wild rye known by the common names basin wild rye , Great Basin wild rye , and Great Basin lyme grass .
Bulbinella rossii , commonly known as the Ross lily , is a species of flowering plant in genus Bulbinella .
Epibulus is a genus of wrasses native to the Indian Ocean and the western Pacific Ocean .
Ornithidium , is genus of orchids ( family Orchidaceae ) .
Alcithoe wilsonae is a species of rare large sea snail , a marine gastropod mollusc in the family Volutidae , the volutes .
Hoplocorypha saussurii is a species of praying mantis found in Kenya , Namibia , and Tanzania .
Sophora fernandeziana is a species of flowering plant in the legume family , Fabaceae , that is endemic to the Juan Fernández Islands of Chile .
As different species of starfish breed at different times of year , Orchitophrya stellarum may move from one species to another in accordance with their reproductive cycles .
Jixiangornis is a genus of primitive avialans from the Early Cretaceous .
Idia gopheri , commonly known as the Tortoise Commensal Noctuid Moth , is a species of litter moth in the Erebidae family .
Ischnochiton elongatus , the Lengthened chiton or Elongate Chiton , is a species of chiton in the family Ischnochitonidae .
Julidae is a family of millipedes in the order Julida , containing more than 600 species in around 20 genera .
Mesoniviridae is a family of positive - sense , single - stranded RNA viruses .
Calliostoma selectum , common name the select maurea , is a species of medium - sized sea snail , a marine gastropod mollusc in the family Calliostomatidae , the calliostoma top snails .
Doliolidae is a family of tunicates in the order Doliolida .
Karrabina biagiana is a species of large rainforest trees commonly known as northern brush mahogany , northern brush mararie or red carabeen , in the plant family Cunoniaceae .
Cyathea christii is a species of tree fern endemic to Mindanao in the Philippines , where it grows in forest at an altitude of 900 - 1800 m. The trunk is erect and may be 5 m tall or more .
Pachymerium ferrugineum is a species of centipede in the family Geophilidae that can be found in Central Europe , the Iberian Peninsula , Scandinavia , Asian countries such as Japan and Turkey , and on African islands such as the Azores , Canary Islands and Crete .
Phylliroe is a genus of average sized ( up to 5.5 centimetres or 2.2 inches ) , highly transparent pelagic nudibranchs , marine gastropod molluscs in the order Opisthobranchia , that consists of two known species .
Vicia lutea ( yellow vetch , smooth yellow vetch ) is a plant species of the genus Vicia .
Pseudolycaena marsyas , common name Cambridge Blue or Giant Hairstreak or Marsyas Hairstreak , is a species of butterflies in the family Lycaenidae .
Hermit crabs are decapod crustaceans of the superfamily Paguroidea .
Stramonita haemastoma , common name the red - mouthed rock shell or the Florida dog winkle , is a species of predatory sea snail , a marine gastropod mollusc in the family Muricidae , the rock snails .
Halysitidae is an extinct family of tabulate corals .
The Colubroidea are a superfamily in the suborder Serpentes ( snakes ) .
Brachydiplax denticauda is a species of dragonfly in the family Libellulidae known commonly as the palemouth .
Gamochaeta sphacelata , called Owl 's crown , is a species of flowering plant in the sunflower family .
Baikiaea plurijuga , known as African teak , Mukusi , Rhodesian teak , Zambian teak or Zambesi redwood , is a species of legume in the Fabaceae family .
Zapatadon is an extinct genus of sphenodontid reptile from the end of the Early Jurassic in the lower part of La Boca Formation of Tamaulipas , Mexico .
Xanthorrhoea preissii ( synonyms X. pecoris , X. reflexa ) , with the common name balga , is a widespread species of perennial monocot in Southwest Australia .
Oxytenia , common name copperweed , is a genus of plants in the sunflower family .
Chamaepsichia is a genus of moths belonging to the Tortricidae family .
Drosera burmannii , the tropical sundew , is a small , compact species in the carnivorous plant genus Drosera .
Trachycardium muricatum , or the yellow cockle , is a species of bivalve mollusc in the family Cardiidae .
Pentaphylax euryoides ( Chinese : 五列木 ; pinyin : wu lie mu ) is a species of flowering plant in the Pentaphylacaceae family that can in be found on Sumatra and in such countries as Malaysia , Vietnam and China .
Anisotremus is a genus of grunts native to the eastern Pacific and western Atlantic Oceans .
Leucoagaricus erythrophaeus is a species of agaric fungus .
Calomera is a genus of ground beetles native to the Palearctic , the Near East and northern Africa .
Desmidophorus cumingi is a species of weevil beetles in the family Brachyceridae .
Zonitoides jaccetanicus is a species of small , air - breathing land snail , a terrestrial pulmonate gastropod mollusk in the family Gastrodontidae .
Didymiaceae is a family of slime molds .
In 2008 , the IUCN classified Asian golden cats as Near Threatened , stating that the species comes close to qualifying as Vulnerable due to hunting pressure and habitat loss , since Southeast Asian forests are undergoing the world 's fastest regional deforestation .
Bristolia is an extinct genus of trilobite , fossil marine arthropods , with eight or more small to average size species .
Conus haytensis is a fossil species of sea snail , a marine gastropod mollusk in the family Conidae , the cone snails , cone shells or cones .
Gavialiceps is a genus of eels in the pike conger family Muraenesocidae .
Bystrowiana is an extinct genus of bystrowianid chroniosuchian from upper Permian deposits of Vladimir Region , Russia and Jiyuan , China .
Leotia atrovirens is a species of Mushroom .
Ribes viburnifolium , is an uncommon North American species in the gooseberry family .
