Anachalcos convexus is a species of scarab beetle in the genus Anachalcos .
The Serranidae are a large family of fishes belonging to the order Perciformes .
Mohoidae is a family of Hawaiian species of recently extinct , nectarivorous songbirds in the genera Moho ( ʻōʻō ) and Chaetoptila ( kioea ) .
Eburia amabilis is a species of beetle in the Cerambycidae family , that can be found on the Galapagos Islands and in Panama .
Enceliopsis covillei is a rare North American species of flowering plant in the daisy family known by the common name Panamint daisy .
Morwongs ( also called butterfish , fingerfins , jackassfish , snappers , and moki ) are perciform fishes comprising the family Cheilodactylidae .
Parastagmatoptera is a genus consisting of 15 species of mantises in the subfamily Stagmatopterinae .
Anasimyia is a genus of wetland hoverflies with aquatic larvae .
Ammannia coccinea is a species of flowering plant in the loosestrife family known by several common names , including valley redstem , scarlet toothcup , and purple ammannia .
Gentianopsis crinita ( sometimes called `` greater fringed gentian '' or blue gentian `` ) is a biennial herbaceous species , native to eastern USA and eastern Canada .
Vomeridens infuscipinnis is a species of Antarctic dragonfish found in the Ross Sea , the Weddell Sea and around the South Orkney Islands and the Antarctic Peninsula .
Bathyxylophila is a genus of sea snails , marine gastropod mollusks in the family Larocheidae .
Solanum jamesii ( common name , wild potato ) is a species of nightshade .
Carpoxylon macrospermum is a species of palm tree endemic to Vanuatu , and the only species in the genus Carpoxylon .
Rhagionidae or snipe flies are a small family of flies .
Gonioteuthis ( meaning narrow squid or slim squid ) is a genus of belemnite , an extinct group of cephalopods .
Cephalopholis argus , also known as : roi , bluespotted grouper , argus grouper , peacock hind , peacock grouper or peacock rockcod is a fish from the Indo - Pacific which is variously a commercial gamefish , an invasive species and occasionally an aquarium resident .
Euzophera bigella , the quince moth , is a species of snout moth in the genus Euzophera .
Calliostoma adelae , common name Adele 's top shell , is a species of sea snail , a marine gastropod mollusk in the family Calliostomatidae .
Huskerpeton is an extinct genus of recumbirostran microsaur amphibian from the Early Permian Eskridge Formation of Nebraska , USA .
Rubus rossbergianus is a uncommon North American species of flowering plant in the rose family .
Jessea is a genus of Central American plants in the tribe Senecioneae within the sunflower family , closely related to Senecio .
Colletes inaequalis , is a common species of plasterer bee ( family Colletidae ) , native to North America .
Raymunida dextralis is a species of squat lobster in the family Munididae from the Pacific and Indian oceans .
Achaearanea dubitabilis is a tangle web spider species found in the Canary Islands .
Fritillaria walujewii is an Asian species of herbaceous plant in the lily family , native to Kazakhstan , Kyrgyzstan , and Xinjiang Province in western China .
The Lesser Antillean pewee ( Contopus latirostris ) is a species of bird in the Tyrannidae family .
Disgregus bezarki is a species of beetle in the family Cerambycidae , and the only species in the genus Disgregus .
Lophostropheus ( pron . : `` LOAF - oh - STRO - fee - us '' ) is an extinct genus of coelophysoid theropod dinosaur that lived approximately 200 million years ago during the boundary between the Late Triassic Period and the Early Jurassic Period , in what is now Normandy , France .
Lysimachia scopulensis is a rare species of flowering plant in the family Primulaceae known by the common name shiny - leaf yellow loosestrife .
Chilopsis is a monotypic genus of flowering plants containing the single species Chilopsis linearis .
Penicillium canescens is a anamorph fungus species of the genus of Penicillium which was isolated from soil of the United Kingdom .
Gymnachirus is a genus of American soles native to the Atlantic coast of the Americas .
Pandalus borealis is a species of caridean shrimp found in cold parts of the Atlantic and Pacific Oceans .
Santolina rosmarinifolia , the holy flax , is a species of flowering plant in the daisy family Asteraceae , native to south western Europe .
Griphognathus whitei is an extinct species of lungfish from the late Devonian period of Europe and Australia .
Muhlenbergia schreberi ( nimblewill ) is a grass species native to North America .
Nebria tatrica komareki is a subspecies of ground beetle in the Nebriinae subfamily that can be found in Czech Republic and Slovakia .
Ophioblennius atlanticus , also known as the `` redlip blenny '' and the `` horseface blenny '' , is a species of combtooth blenny , family Blenniidae , found primarily in the western central Atlantic ocean .
Abronia macrocarpa is a rare species of flowering plant known by the common name largefruit sand verbena .
Carcharhinus humani also known as the Human 's whaler shark is a species of requiem shark , in the family Carcharhinidae .
Deraiophorus is a genus of mites in the order Mesostigmata , placed in its own family , Deriaphoridae .
Liriodendron chinense , the Chinese tulip tree , is Asia 's native species in the Liriodendron genus .
Peckoltia sabaji is a species of catfish .
Tropidophis bucculentus was a nonvenomous dwarf boa species endemic to Navassa Island .
Thaeler 's pocket gopher ( Orthogeomys thaeleri ) is a species of rodent in the family Geomyidae .
Described by Linnaeus in 1766 , the Moluccan king parrot is one of three species collectively known as king parrots found in Australia , Papua New Guinea , and Indonesia .
Juga is a genus of freshwater snails with a gill and an operculum , aquatic gastropod mollusks in the family Semisulcospiridae .
The Rhinochimaeridae , commonly known as long - nosed chimaeras , are a family of cartilaginous fish .
Palaeocastor ( ' prehistoric beaver ' ) is an extinct genus of beavers that lived in the North American Badlands during the late Oligocene period .
As a Senecio and a diploid Senecio squalidus is part of a species group along with S. flavus , S. gallicus , S. glaucus and S. vernalis , which are widespread geographically and interesting for the study of genetic differences in relation to the environment and plant evolution .
Kurtziella is a genus of small , predatory sea snails , marine gastropod mollusks in the family Mangeliidae .
The longsnout butterflyfish , Prognathodes aculeatus , is a species of butterflyfish found in tropical atlantic waters .
Eubranchus rubeolus is a species of minute sea slug , an aeolid nudibranch , a marine gastropod mollusc in the family Eubranchidae .
Agrilochyseus borgmeieri is a species of beetle in the family Buprestidae , the only species in the genus Agrilochyseus .
Scutellaria formosana ( 蓝花黄芩 , lan hua huang qin ) is a plant species endemic to the Fujian , Guangdong , Guangxi , Hainan , Jiangxi , and Yunnan provinces in China .
Allopontonia is a genus of shrimp in the family Palaemonidae , containing two species :
Elymus macrourus is a species of grass known by the common names tufted wheatgrass and thickspike wildrye .
Macrobrachium assamense is a species of freshwater shrimp that was first described in 1958 .
Plagiodera arizonae is a species of leaf beetles of the subfamily Chrysomelini that can be found in Arizona .
Paramussardiana quadricostata is a species of beetle in the family Cerambycidae , and the only species in the genus Paramussardiana .
Diplazium sibiricum is a species of fern .
Procambarus milleri , the Miami cave crayfish is a species of crayfish in the family Cambaridae .
Drescheratherium is an extinct genus of mammal from the Late Jurassic ( Kimmeridgian ) Camadas de Guimarota of Leiria , Portugal .
Poison dart frog ( also known as dart - poison frog , poison frog or formerly known as poison arrow frog ) is the common name of a group of frogs in the family Dendrobatidae which are native to tropical Central and South America .
They are now included in subclass Scolecida along with Cossuridae , Orbiniidae , Opheliidae , Paraonidae and Scalibregmatidae .
Peucetia viridana is a species of spider found in India and Myanmar .
Ischnochiton evanida is a species of chiton in the Ischnochiton genus belonging to the family Ischnochitonidae .
Angraecum cucullatum is a species of orchid found in Réunion .
Uvariodendron gorgonis is a species of flowering plant in the family Annonaceae .
Dromotectum is an extinct genus of bystrowianid reptiliomorph from the Late Permian of China and Early Triassic of Russia .
Elminius modestus is a species of barnacle in the family Balanidae , native to Australia , Tasmania and New Zealand , but now spread to Britain and the north west coasts of Europe .
Juncus is a genus of monocotyledonous flowering plants , commonly known as rushes .
The genus name , Akidolestes , is derived from akido , Greek for point , and lestes , Greek for thief .
Maurandya antirrhiniflora , known as roving sailor or ( along with other similar species ) climbing snapdragon , is a scrambling or climbing herbaceous perennial native to Mexico and the south western United States ( California to Texas ) where it grows in a variety of relatively dry habitats .
Picea purpurea , also known as purple cone spruce and purple - coned spruce is a species of spruce found only in China .
Composita is a brachiopod genus that lived from the Devonian to the Permian .
The Phalacridae are a family of beetles commonly called the shining flower beetles .
In taxonomy , Mamiella is a genus of green algae , specifically of the Mamiellaceae .
Pempheris is a genus of sweepers native to the Atlantic , Indian and Pacific Ocean .
Galvezia is a genus of perennial plants which are native to western North America , western South America and the Galapagos Islands .
Trifolium reflexum , the buffalo clover , is a species of clover native to the Eastern United States .
Haplorhabdus nymani is a species of beetle in the family Cerambycidae , and the only species in the genus Haplorhabdus .
Cyrioides vittigera , commonly known as the striped banksia jewel beetle , is a species of beetle in the family Buprestidae native to Western Australia .
Oregonia bifurca , commonly known as the split - nose crab or the split - nose decorator crab , is a species of crabs belonging to the genus Oregonia .
Curculio is a genus of weevils belonging the family Curculionidae and subfamily Curculioninae .
Leishmania tropica is a species of flagellate parasites that infects humans and hyraxes , and the cause of the disease Leishmaniasis Recidivans , a form of cutaneous leishmaniasis .
Galium paschale is a species of flowering plant in the genus Galium found in south - eastern Europe and Turkey .
Momordica dioica , Bristly Balsam Pear commonly known as spiny gourd and also known as prickly carolaho , Teasle gourd , kantola , is a species of flowering plant in the gourd family .
Pyrops karenius is a species of planthopper belonging to a group commonly referred to as lantern - flies .
The only known species of the genus Mammamia , it was described in 2011 from a specimen discovered in a cave in Italy .
Haemophilus aphrophilus was a species of Haemophilus but the name has recently been changed to Aggregatibacter aphrophilus .
Daesiidae is a family of solifugids , which are widespread in Africa and the Middle East .
Inioteuthis maculosa is a species of bobtail squid native to the Indo - Pacific .
Nemophila maculata , with common names baby blue eyes and fivespot , is a species of flowering plant in the borage family ( Boraginaceae ) .
Fusuisaurus ( meaning `` Fusui lizard '' from the name of the county where it was discovered ) is a genus of sauropod dinosaur from the Early Cretaceous of China .
The Old World babblers or timaliids are a large family of mostly Old World passerine birds .
Thesprotia macilenta , common name Bolivian Grass Mantis , is a species of praying mantis found in Bolivia , Brazil , Costa Rica , Colombia , and Paraguay .
Kottelatlimia is a genus of loaches found in Southeast Asia .
Batocera laena is a species of flat - faced longhorns beetle belonging to the Cerambycidae family , Lamiinae subfamily .
Callulops is a genus of microhylid frogs from Sulawesi as well as the New Guinea region , from Talaud Islands and the Maluku Islands ( Moluccas ) in the northwest to the Louisiade Archipelago in the east .
Holospira danielsi , common name strongrib holospira , is a species of air - breathing land snail , a terrestrial pulmonate gastropod mollusk in the family Urocoptidae .
Penicillium jugoslavicum is an anamorph species of the genus of Penicillium which was isolated from seeds of Helianthus annuus L.
Hymenocallis imperialis , common name Big Fatty , is a plant species native to the Mexican states of San Luis Potosí and Hidalgo .
Nothomyrmecia , also known as the dinosaur ant or dawn ant , is a rare genus of ants consisting of a single species , Nothomyrmecia macrops .
Racomitrium lanuginosum is a widespread species of moss found in montane and arctic tundra across the Northern and Southern hemispheres .
Hypotrachyna paraphyscioides is a species of lichen in the family Parmeliaceae .
Styrax grandifolius , the bigleaf snowbell or bigleaf storax , is a plant species native to the southeastern United States , ranging from Virginia south to Florida and west to Texas and Missouri .
Mylochromis melanotaenia is a species of cichlid endemic to Lake Malawi where it is believed to occur only in the southern portion of the lake .
Abida occidentalis is a species of land snail in the family Chondrinidae .
The Rostroconchia is a class of extinct Molluscs dating from the early Cambrian to the late Permian .
Carex stricta is a species of sedge known by the common names upright sedge and tussock sedge .
Goniaeolis typica is a species of sea slug , a nudibranch , a marine gastropod mollusc in the family Goniaeolididae .
Cephalotheca is a genus of fungi in the Cephalothecaceae family of the Ascomycota .
Deuterocohnia is a genus of the botanical family Bromeliaceae , subfamily Tillandsioideae , endemic to South America .
Navura lobata is a species of snout moth , and the only species in the genus Navura .
Cerbera odollam is a dicotyledonous angiosperm , a plant species in the Family Apocynaceae and commonly known as the suicide tree , pong - pong , and othalanga .
Anulocaulis is a small genus of flowering plants known generally as ringstems .
Arthrolycosa ( meaning wolf ( spider ) with joints ) is an extinct genus of spiders that lived about 300 - 250 million years ago .
Meyerosuchus is an extinct genus of mastodonsauroidean temnospondyl .
Tor tambroides is a species of Mahseer native to Southeast Asia .
Pseudophoenix lediniana is a palm species endemic to the Tiburon Peninsula in southwestern Haiti .
Valenzuela despaxi is a species of Psocoptera from Caeciliusidae family that can be found in Austria , Belgium , Bulgaria , Finland , France , Germany , Hungary , Luxembourg , Norway , Poland , Spain , Sweden , and Switzerland .
Agonum sexpunctatum is a wet - loving , peatland species of ground beetle native to the Palearctic and the Near East .
Paracymus is a genus of hydrophilid beetles with 81 species worldwide .
Auriculella uniplicata was a species of tropical air - breathing land snails , terrestrial pulmonate gastropod mollusks .
Abrothrix longipilis , also known as the Long - haired Grass Mouse or Long - haired Akodont , is a species of rodent in the family Cricetidae .
Lithops optica is a species of plant in the Aizoaceae family , endemic to Namibia .
Cirsium vinaceum is a rare species of thistle known by the common name Sacramento Mountains thistle .
Methanococcoides methylutens is a methylotrophic marine methanogen , the type species of its genus .
Tuta absoluta is a species of moth in family Gelechiidae known by the common names tomato leafminer and South American tomato moth .
Stemona australiana is a plant species native to tropical south - east Asia , including northern Australia and Papua New Guinea .
Ophonus rufibarbis is a species of ground beetle that can be found everywhere in Europe and the Near East .
Cryptolithodes sitchensis , variously known as the umbrella crab , Sitka crab or turtle crab , is a species of lithodid crustacean native to coastal regions of the northeastern Pacific Ocean , ranging from Sitka , Alaska to Point Loma , California .
Xenophrys wawuensis ( Wawu horned toad ) is a species of amphibian in the Megophryidae family .
Dipodium paludosum is an terrestrial orchid species that is native to south - east Asia .
Cretaaviculus is an extinct genus of birds from the Upper Cretaceous Bostobe Formation of Kazakhstan .
Latham 's snipe is an omnivorous species that feeds on seeds and other plant material ( mainly from species in families such as Cyperaceae , Poaceae , Juncaceae , Polygonaceae , Ranunculaceae and Fabaceae ) , and on invertebrates including insects ( mainly flies and beetles ) , earthworms , spiders and occasionally molluscs , isopods and centipedes .
Methanohalophilus mahii is a methylotrophic halophilic methanogen , the type species of its genus .
Trichoeax somaliensis is a species of beetle in the family Cerambycidae , and the only species in the genus Trichoeax .
Acarospora janae is a species of lichen in the Acarosporaceae family .
Atrina seminuda , or the half - naked pen shell , is a species of bivalve mollusc in the family Pinnidae .
Kuschelydrus phreaticus is a species of beetle in the family Dytiscidae , the only species in the genus Kuschelydrus .
Philodromus laricium is a spider species found in Spain , France , Italy , Switzerland and Austria .
Streptomyces avellaneus is a bacterium species from the genus of Streptomyces which has been isolated from soil from in Italy .
Bauhinia divaricata is a species of flowering shrub of the family Fabaceae .
Thyrsanthemum is a genus of plants in the Commelinaceae , first described in 1946 .
Ledermanniella letouzeyi is a species of plant in the Podostemaceae family .
The nose logsucker ( Garra nasuta ) is a species of ray - finned fish in the genus Garra .
This species is referred to as Shewanella oneidensis MR-1 , indicating `` manganese reducing '' , a special feature of this particular organism .
Psilocybe columbiana is a species of mushroom in the family Strophariaceae known only from the páramos of high mountains in Colombia .
Ascelichthys rhodorus , the Rosylip sculpin , is a species of sculpin native to the eastern Pacific Ocean from Alaska to central California where it is an inhabitant of tidepools and other intertidal environments .
Apareiodon affinis , the darter characine , is a species of fresh water ray - finned fish native to the Río de la Plata Basin in southern Brazil , Paraguay and northern Argentina .
The family Mycteridae is a small group of beetles with no vernacular common name , though recent authors have coined the name palm and flower beetles .
Allomethus unicicolis is a species of fly in the family Pipunculidae .
Xyris ambigua , the coastal plain yelloweyed grass , is a North American species of flowering plant in the yellow - eyed - grass family .
Islamia laiae is a species of small freshwater snail with a gill and an operculum , an aquatic gastropod mollusk in the family Hydrobiidae .
Salix yoshinoi ( Japanese : yoshino - yanagi ) is a species of willow tree native to central Japan .
Aspidomorphus is a genus of venomous elapid snakes found in New Guinea and neighbouring islands .
Aphanomyces invadans is a species of water mould .
Lolium rigidum is a species of annual grass .
Chagunius baileyi is a species of freshwater fish of the genus Chagunius found in Myanmar and Thailand in the Salween and Sittaung rivers .
It contains the single species Euproctosia cretata , which is found in Ghana .
Floscularia ringens is a species of rotifer belonging to the subclass Monogononta , which resides in a tube that it builds using many little circular pellets consisting of bacteria and small pieces of detritus .
Tachypodoiulus niger , known variously as the white - legged snake millipede or the black millipede , is a European species of millipede .
Necromanis ( literally `` dead pangolin '' ) is an extinct genus of pangolin from the Oligocene and Miocene of France .
Luehea is a genus of trees in the Malvaceae family .
Zinnia grandiflora is a species of flowering plant in the aster family known by the common names Rocky Mountains zinnia and Plains zinnia .
Various Deudorix butterfly species ' larvae also feed on these trees , including the larvae of the Black - and - orange Playboy ( Deudorix dariaves ) and the Apricot Playboy ( Deudorix dinochares ) which both eat the fruits of Deinbollia oblongifolia .
Antipodocottus elegans or the Dwarf sculpin is a species of sculpin in the family Cottidae .
Nephropsis is a genus of lobsters containing 15 extant species :
Micropaschia orthogrammalis is a species of snout moth , and the only species in the genus Micropaschia .
Puccinellia parishii is an uncommon species of grass known by the common names bog alkaligrass and Parish 's alkali grass .
Passiflora actinia species of passion flower of the Passifloraceae .
Conus attenuatus , common name the thin cone , is a species of sea snail , a marine gastropod mollusk in the family Conidae , the cone snails and their allies .
Simian retrovirus ( SRV ) is a species of retroviruses that usually infect and cause a fatal immune deficiency in Asian macaques .
Nanorana conaensis ( Cona paa frog , Cona spiny frog ) is a species of frog in the Dicroglossidae family .
Typhlocaris galilea is a species of troglobitic shrimp in the genus Typhlocaris , and is endemic to one pool and spring that feeds it , at Tabgha in Israel .
Pogonocherus is a genus of flat - faced longhorns beetle in the family Cerambycidae .
The Staphylococcaceae are a family of Gram positive bacteria that includes the genus Staphylococcus , noted for encompassing several medically significant pathogens .
Allardia is a genus of flowering plants in the daisy family described as a genus in 1841 .
Bahiria latevalvata is a species of snout moth in the genus Bahiria .
Lasallia pustulata is a species of lichen in the Umbilicariaceae family of fungi .
Drosera orbiculata is a perennial tuberous species in the genus Drosera that is endemic to Western Australia .
Dolichovespula arenaria , also known as the common aerial yellowjacket , sandhills hornet , and common yellow hornet , is a species of wasps within the Dolichovespula genus widely distributed in the North American continent .
Visma sowerbyi is a rare species of sea snail , a marine gastropod mollusk in the family Pyramidellidae , the pyrams and their allies .
Metacheiromys is an extinct genus of mammal from the Middle Eocene of what is now Wyoming .
Sibirocosa kolymensis is a species of wolf spider found in the Kolyma region in the far east of Russia .
Epiphyllum laui is a cactus species native to Mexico .
Calliostoma nobile , common name the noble top shell , is a species of sea snail , a marine gastropod mollusk in the family Calliostomatidae .
Hieracium scouleri is a North American species of hawkweed in the dandelion tribe within the sunflower family .
Opisthostoma vermiculum is a species of minute land snail with an operculum , a terrestrial gastropod mollusk or micromollusk in the family Diplommatinidae .
Allium rhynchogynum is a Chinese species of wild onion endemic to the Yunnan region in southern China .
Werauhia gladioliflora is a species in the genus Werauhia .
Symphodus doderleini is a species of wrasse native to the coasts of the Mediterranean Sea through the Sea of Marmara .
Taeniacara candidi is a species of cichlid fish from the Amazon Basin in South America .
Arctostaphylos luciana is a species of manzanita known by the common name Santa Lucia manzanita , is endemic to California .
Chromogobius is a small genus of gobies native to the eastern Atlantic Ocean through the Mediterranean and Adriatic seas to the Black Sea .
Tutufa bufo , common name the red - mouth frog shell , is a species of sea snail , a marine gastropod mollusk in the family Bursidae , the frog shells .
Amorphoscelis lamottei is a species of praying mantis found in Ivory Coast , Ghana , Guinea , and in the Congo River area .
The genus Tadarida has 9 or more species of bats divided into two subgenera , with the first of these containing seven species spread across the Old World ( including southern Europe and North Africa , large parts of southern Asia , and India right across to Japan ) .
Smilax laurifolia is a species of flowering plant in the greenbrier family known by the common names laurel greenbrier , laurelleaf greenbrier , bamboo vine , and blaspheme vine .
Pseudoarmillariella is a genus of fungi in the family Hygrophoraceae .
Calamaria modesta is a dwarf snake species in the genus Calamaria found in Java .
Mulsantina is a genus of ladybugs ( family Coccinellidae ) , found in North and Central America .
Mentzelia involucrata is a species of Mentzelia native to the Mojave and Sonoran deserts of North America .
Cattleya luteola is a species of bifoliate Cattleya orchid , named for the light yellow color of the perianth segments .
Renova oscari is a species of rivuline endemic to the Orinoco River basin of Venezuela .
Bagropsis reinhardti is a species of long - whiskered catfish .
Amolops lifanensis ( common names : Lifan sucker frog , Lifan torrent frog ) is a species of frog in the Ranidae family that is endemic to central Sichuan , China .
Koeberlinia spinosa is a species of flowering plant native to the southwestern United States and northern Mexico known by several common names , including crown of thorns , allthorn , and crucifixion thorn .
Mines very similar to that of Ectoedemia occultella have been found on Rosaceae species in Nepal and Japan and these may belong to this species .
Apateodus ( meaning `` confusing tooth '' ) is a genus of prehistoric fish which was described by Woodward in 1901 .
Quercus garryana , the Garry oak , Oregon white oak or Oregon oak , is a tree species with a range stretching from southern California to southwestern British Columbia .
Gaultheria humifusa is a species of shrub in the heath family which is known by the common names alpine wintergreen and alpine spicy wintergreen .
Hoffmann 's rat ( Rattus hoffmanni ) is a species of rodent in the family Muridae .
Oncocalamus is a monoecious genus of flowering plant in the palm family found in western Africa .
The Tres Marias raccoon ( Procyon lotor insularis ) is a subspecies of the common raccoon endemic on the two main islands of the Islas Marías , an archipelago off the western coast of the Mexican state of Nayarit .
Dunkleosteus is an extinct genus of arthrodire placoderm fish that existed during the Late Devonian period , about 380 - -360 million years ago .
This is a monotypic genus , containing the single species Biporispora europaea , described as new to science in 1999 .
† Daphnobela miocaenica is an extinct species of predatory sea snail , a marine gastropod mollusc in the family Turridae .
Ibacus peronii , the Balmain bug or butterfly fan lobster , is a species of slipper lobster .
Viola renifolia is a species of violet known by the common names white violet and kidneyleaf violet .
Raiamas senegalensis ( silver fish or Senegal minnow ) is a species of ray - finned fish in the genus Raiamas .
Chirodropida is an order of box jellyfishes .
Ororaphidia is an extinct monotypic genus of snakefly containing the single species Ororaphidia megalocephala .
Phidippus mystaceus is a species of jumping spider that is found in North America .
Pyrrhulina is a genus of freshwater fishes found in tropical South America .
Navarretia mellita is a species of flowering plant in the phlox family known by the common name honeyscented pincushionplant .
Limnocytheridae is a family of ostracods , containing the following genera :
The monotypic genus Dedeckera contains the single species Dedeckera eurekensis , a plant known by the common name July gold which is endemic to California .
False baelama anchovy ( Thryssa encrasicholoides ) , also known as New Jersey anchovy , is a species of ray - finned fish in the family Engraulidae .
Haplochromis venator is a species of cichlid endemic to Lake Nabugabo in Uganda .
Trichomycterus albinotatus is a species of pencil catfish endemic to Brazil , where it occurs in the Preto river , a tributary of the Paraíba do Sul river .
Grammatophyllum , abbreviated in horticultural trade as Gram , is a genus of 13 currently known orchid species .
The Zamiaceae are a family of cycads that are superficially palm or fern - like .
Muehlenbeckia or the maidenhair genus is native to the Southern Hemisphere , especially South America , Papua New Guinea , Australia and New Zealand , and has been introduced both by birds and cultivation to temperate locales north of the equator .
Cymbium cucumis , commonly known as the cucumber volute , is a species of sea snail , a marine gastropod mollusk in the family Volutidae , the volutes .
Uropeltis phipsonii , commonly known as Phipson 's shieldtail , is a species of snake endemic to India .
Babylonia areolata is a species of sea snail , a marine gastropod mollusk in the family Babyloniidae .
Cirsotrema zelebori , common name : the slender wentletrap , is species of very small deepwater sea snail , a marine gastropod mollusk in the family Epitoniidae , the wentletraps .
Cheiracanthium africanum is a spider species found in Africa and Réunion .
Malacorhynchus is a genus of duck within the family Anatidae .
Coprosma fowerakeri is a species of Coprosma found in the South Island of New Zealand described in 2003 .
Peucetia is a genus of lynx spiders that is found worldwide .
Sicus ferrugineus is a species of fly from the genus Sicus in the family Conopidae .
Festuca arundinacea ( syn . , Schedonorus arundinaceus and Lolium arundinaceum ) is a species of grass commonly known as tall fescue .
Labulla is a genus of linyphiid spiders with three species ranging from Western Europe to Russia , and a fourth species in India that may not be closely related to the other three , and may belong in a different genus .
Chromohalobacter salexigens is a moderately halophilic species of bacteria .
Falsohomaemota novacaledonica is a species of beetle in the family Cerambycidae , and the only species in the genus Falsohomaemota .
Gongbusaurus is a genus of ornithischian , perhaps ornithopod , dinosaur that lived between about 160 and 155 million years ago , in the Late Jurassic period .
Arvicanthis is a genus of rodent from Africa .
Helcogrammoides chilensis is a species of triplefin blenny in the genus Helcogrammoides .
Ikechosaurus is an extinct genus of choristoderan which existed in China and Mongolia during the Cretaceous period .
Beetles are a group of insects that form the order Coleoptera /koʊliːˈɒptərə/.
Juniperus monosperma ( one - seed juniper ) is a species of juniper native to western North America , in the United States in Arizona , New Mexico , southern Colorado , western Oklahoma ( Panhandle ) , and western Texas , and in Mexico in the extreme north of Chihuahua .
Clarkia xantiana is a species of flowering plant in the evening primrose family known by the common name gunsight clarkia .
first published this species under the name Epidendrum alpicolum in 1854 .
Copiapoa atacamensis is a species of cactus from the Atacama Desert in the province of Antofagasta in northern Chile .
Allium flavum is a species of onion native to the lands surrounding the Mediterranean , Black , and Caspian Seas , from France + Morocco to Iran + Kazakhstan .
Lactarius aspideoides , commonly known as the bright yellow milkcap , is a species of fungus in the Russulaceae family .
Dawsonocerina is an extinct genus of prehistoric nautiloid .
Holodactylus africanus is a species of gecko that is commonly found in Eastern Africa .
Callistosporium vinosobrunneum is a species of agaric fungus in the Tricholomataceae family .
Jobellisia is a genus of fungi within the family Jobiellaceae , class Sordariomycetes .
Truncatella subcylindrica is a species of small land snail that lives at the edge of the sea .
Labidosaurikos is an extinct genus of prehistoric reptile .
Erigeron parishii is a species of flowering plant in the daisy family known by the common name Parish 's fleabane .
Microdevario is a small genus of danionin cyprinids .
Penicillium dunedinense is a species of the genus of Penicillium which was isolated in Dunedin in New Zealand .
Montsechia is an extinct genus of aquatic plants containing the species Montsechia vidalii .
Tettigidea empedonepia is a species of insect in family Tetrigidae .
Rhododendron prinophyllum , the early azalea , is a rhododendron species native to the eastern and southern United States .
Japonactaeon punctostriatus , common names Adam 's baby bubble and pitted baby - bubble , is a species of minute sea snail or `` bubble snail '' , a marine gastropod mollusk or micromollusk in the family Acteonidae , the `` barrel bubble '' snails .
Vinciguerria poweriae ( also known as Power 's deep - water bristle - mouth fish ) is a species of lightfish belonging to the genus Vinciguerria .
Poa paludigena is a species of grass known by the common names bog bluegrass , marsh bluegrass , slender marsh bluegrass , and Patterson 's bluegrass .
Pandanales ( pandans or screw - pines ) is the botanical name for an order of flowering plants placed in the monocot clade in the Angiosperm Phylogeny Group and Angiosperm Phylogeny Web systems .
Lebia nigripes is a species of ground beetles in the Harpalinae subfamily that can be found in France , Spain , Italy , and the island of Sicily .
Viola calcarata L. is a species of genus Viola that grows on mountains of south - eastern Europe .
Otekaikea is an extinct genus of toothed whale closely related to Waipatia .
Abryna copei is a species of beetle in the Cerambycidae family , that can be found in Asia in countries such as Philippines .
There is only one known species , Rohria monanthos .
Thermopsis gracilis is a species of flowering plant in the legume family known by the common name slender goldenbanner .
Amorphoscelis chopardi is a species of praying mantis found in Côte d'Ivoire and Ghana .
Verschaffeltia splendida is a species of flowering plant in the Arecaceae family .
Batrachostomus is a genus of frogmouths .
Lithophragma cymbalaria is a species of flowering plant in the saxifrage family known by the common name mission woodland star .
Centriscus is a genus of shrimpfishes found in the Indian and Pacific Oceans .
Heteracris trimaculata , also known as Three - spotted Forest Grasshopper , is a species of grasshopper .
Nomorhamphus towoeti is a species of fish in the Hemiramphidae family .
Linum grandiflorum ( syn . L. coccineum ) is a species of flax known by several common names , including flowering flax , red flax , scarlet flax , and crimson flax .
Ceramaster arcticus , the Arctic cookie star , is a species of sea star .
Allium haematochiton is a North American species of wild onion known by the common name redskin onion .
Clerodendrum thomsoniae is a species of flowering plant in the genus Clerodendrum of the family Lamiaceae , native to tropical west Africa from Cameroon west to Senegal .
Lokotunjailurus is an extinct genus of saber - toothed cats ( Machairodontinae ) which existed in Kenya and Chad during the Miocene epoch .
Melicope cinerea is a species of plant in the Rutaceae family known by the common name manena .
Ocyropsis is a genus of oceanic lobate ctenophores .
Ensete superbum is a species of banana from India .
Pavoclinus profundus , the Deepwater klipfish , is a species of clinid found from Knysna to Algoa Bay along the South African coast where it can be found at depths of from 20 to 40 metres ( 66 to 131 ft ) .
Ardeadoris carlsoni is a species of sea slug , a dorid nudibranch , a shell - less marine gastropod mollusc in the family Chromodorididae .
Heterotheca sessiliflora is a species of flowering plant in the daisy family known by the common name sessileflower false goldenaster .
Promerycochoerus ( `` Before Merycochoerus '' or `` Before Ruminating Hog '' ) is an extinct genus of hippopotamus - like oreodont artiodactyl that lived in Central North America during the Early Miocene .
Eriogonum strictum is a species of wild buckwheat known by the common name Blue Mountain buckwheat .
Erelieva parvulella is a species of snout moth in the genus Erelieva .
Calanticidae is a family of barnacles in the order Pedunculata , containing the following genera :
Piperia unalascensis is a species of orchid known by the common names slender - spire orchid , Alaska piperia and Alaska rein orchid .
Mimiculus maculatus is a species of beetle in the family Cerambycidae , and the only species in the genus Mimiculus .
The Shangcheng stout salamander , Pachyhynobius shangchengensis , is a species of salamander in the Hynobiidae family .
Diasporus gularis , also known as the Esmeraldas robber frog , is a species of frog in the Eleutherodactylidae family .
Tetradium daniellii , the bee - bee tree , is a species of flowering plant in the Rutaceae family .
Amata lucta is a species of moth of the family Arctiidae .
Standleyanthus is a genus of Central American plants in the boneset tribe within the sunflower family .
Erigeron parryi is a species of flowering plant in the daisy family known by the common name Parry 's fleabane .
Wallago hexanema is a species of catfish in the Siluridae family ( the sheatfishes ) native to Asia .
Calathea anulque is a species of plant in the Marantaceae family that is endemic to Ecuador .
Polyscias sambucifolia , commonly known as elderberry panax , is a species of plant native to eastern Australia .
Hypochniciellum is a genus of corticioid fungi in the family Amylocorticiaceae .
Schisandra glabra , the bay star - vine , is the only American species of this primarily Asian genus .
Psoroptidae is a family of mites .
Hylorchilus is a genus of bird in the Troglodytidae family .
Clivina elegans is a ground beetle species in the genus Clivina .
Astragalus layneae is a species of milkvetch known by the common name widow 's milkvetch .
Juga plicifera , common name pleated juga , is a species of freshwater snail with an operculum , an aquatic gastropod mollusk in the family Semisulcospiridae .
Diplocaulidae ( `` horned crawlers '' ) is an extinct family of lepospondyl amphibians that arose during the Late Carboniferous and died out in the Late Permian .
Solidago perornata is a rare North American plant species in the sunflower family .
Pyrotherium ( ' fire beast ' ) is an extinct genus of South American ungulate , of the order Pyrotheria , that lived in what is now Argentina , during the Early Oligocene .
There is only one known species , Worsleya procera , native to eastern Brazil .
Croton laevigatus is a plant species native to Asia .
Glanapteryx is a genus of catfishes native to South America .
The tribe Detarieae is one of the subdivisions of the plant family Fabaceae ( the family which includes the legumes ) .
Sulfobacillus acidophilus is a species of moderately thermophilic mineral - sulphide - oxidizing bacteria .
Favonigobius lentiginosus is a species of goby native to the coastal waters of Australia and New Zealand .
Cornutia is a genus of plants in the Lamiaceae , first described in 1753 .
Derris trifoliata is a plant species in the genus Derris .
Amolops jaunsari ( Jaunsar stream frog ) is a species of frog found in Chakrata , Uttarakhand , India .
The Mohol bushbaby ( Galago moholi ) is a species of primate in the family Galagidae .
Philodromus punctiger is a spider species found in the Canary Islands and Spain .
Mangifera sylvatica ( also known as the Himalayan mango , pickling mango , or Nepal mango ) is a species of plant in the Anacardiaceae family .
Eucalyptus crenulata , commonly known as Buxton Gum or Silver Gum , is a rare species of Eucalyptus which is found only in the wild in the Acheron River valley and at Yering near Yarra Glen and in Victoria , Australia .
Amysoria is a genus of skippers in the butterfly family Hesperiidae .
Entoconcha mirabilis is a species of very small parasitic sea snail , a marine gastropod mollusk in the family Eulimidae .
Oxynoticeratidae is a family of true ammonites ( order Ammonitida ) included in the superfamily Psilocerataceae .
Nebria lariollei lariollei is a subspecies of beetle in the Carabidae family that is endemic to France .
Beaucarnea is a genus of flowering plants native to Mexico and Central America .
Sibynophis subpunctatus , commonly known as Duméril 's black - headed snake or Jerdon 's many - toothed snake , is a species of nonvenomous colubrid snake endemic to Bangladesh , India and Sri Lanka .
Markhamia is a genus of flowering plants in the Bignoniaceae family .
Acarophenacidae is a family of mites in the order Trombidiformes that parasitise beetles or thrips .
Leptophlebia marginata , the sepia dun , is a species of mayfly in the family Leptophlebiidae .
Enoplocerus armillatus , common name Giant Longhorn Beetle or Imperious Sawyer , is a species of longhorns beetle belonging to the Cerambycidae family , Prioninae subfamily .
Pandanus odorifer is an aromatic monocot species of plant in the Pandanaceae family , native to Polynesia , Australia , South Asia ( Andaman Islands ) , and the Philippines , and is also found wild in southern India and Burma .
Chenopodium is a genus of numerous species of perennial or annual herbaceous flowering plants known as the goosefoots , which occur almost anywhere in the world .
Bovichtus variegatus is a species of thornfish found around New Zealand from the Wellington area southwards .
The Tabasco mud turtle ( Kinosternon acutum ) is a species of turtle in the Kinosternidae family .
Leptosiphon oblanceolatus ( syn . Linanthus oblanceolatus ) is a species of flowering plant in the phlox family known by the common name Sierra Nevada linanthus .
Perotrochus anseeuwi is a species of large sea snail , a marine gastropod mollusk in the family Pleurotomariidae , the slit snails .
Eleutherococcus setulosus is a plant species in the family Araliaceae .
Allium carolinianum is a species of onions native to central and southern Asia ( Xinjiang , Xizang ( Tibet ) , Afghanistan , Bhutan , India , Kazakhstan , Kyrgyzstan , Nepal , Pakistan , Tajikistan , Uzbekistan ) .
Anomalopus swansoni is a species of burrowing skink endemic to Australia .
Pterospermum is a flowering plant genus .
The type species is Domeykodactylus ceciliae .
Morula marginalba is a species of sea snail , a marine gastropod mollusc in the family Muricidae , the murex snails or rock snails .
Graculavus is a prehistoric bird genus that was described in the 19th century by American paleontologist O. C. Marsh .
The American rosefinches that form the genus Haemorhous , are a group of passerine birds in the finch family Fringillidae .
Aforia trilix is a species of sea snail , a marine gastropod mollusk in the family Cochlespiridae .
Syrnolopsis gracilis is a species of medium - sized freshwater snails with an operculum , an aquatic gastropod mollusk in the family Paludomidae .
Zabrus silphoides is a species of ground beetle in the Iberozabrus subgenus that can be found in Portugal and Spain .
Ancylostoma duodenale is a species of the worm genus Ancylostoma .
Batrochoglanis is a small genus of catfishes ( order Siluriformes ) of the family Pseudopimelodidae .
Cyanea longiflora ( formerly Rollandia longiflora ) is a rare species of flowering plant in the bellflower family known by the common name ridge rollandia .
Typhaea stercorea is a cosmopolitan species of beetle of the family Mycetophagidae , known by the common name hairy fungus beetle .
Erythronium ( fawn lily , trout lily , dog's - tooth violet , adder 's tongue ) is a genus of Eurasian and North American plants in the lily family .
Pseudolithoxus tigris is a species of armored catfish endemic to Venezuela where it is found in the upper Orinoco and Ventuari River basins .
It contains the species Actinocrates euryniphas , which is known from Fiji .
Polyschides is a genus of gadilid scaphopod .
Melongena corona , common name the Florida crown conch , is a species of sea snail , a marine gastropod mollusk in the family Melongenidae , the crown conches and their allies .
Crocallis tusciaria , the smoky scalloped oak , is a species of moth of the Geometridae family .
Assiminea vulgaris is a species of minute salt marsh snail with an operculum , an aquatic gastropod mollusk in the family Assimineidae .
Philodromus marmoratus is a spider species found in Austria , Czech Republic , Bulgaria and Ukraine .
Parribacus japonicus , the Japanese mitten lobster , is a species of slipper lobster .
Aeropyrum pernix is a species of extremophile archaean in the archaean phylum Crenarchaeota .
Loligo is a genus of squids and one of the most representative and widely distributed groups of myopsid squids .
Mantura obtusata is a species of Chrysomelidae family , that can be found nearly everywhere in Europe .
Donax fossor is a species of small saltwater clam , a marine bivalve mollusk species in the family Donacidae .
Phyllaplysia is a genus of sea slugs , specifically sea hares , marine gastropod mollusks in the family Aplysiidae , the sea hares .
Spermacoce neoterminalis , the Everglades Key false buttonweed , is a species of plants in the Rubiaceae .
Cucumericrus is a genus of anomalocaridid known from a few poorly preserved specimens .
Peltophryne fluviatica , common names Dominican Caribbean toad or Hispaniolan crestless toad , is a species of toad endemic to the Cibao Valley in the northwestern Dominican Republic .
Panopeidae is a family containing 25 genera of morphologically similar crabs , often known as `` mud crabs '' .
Empetrichthys is a genus of splitfins endemic to the state of Nevada in the United States .
Koreanosaurus ( meaning `` Korean lizard '' ) is a genus of ornithopod dinosaur .
Mimomusonius viettei is a species of beetle in the family Cerambycidae , and the only species in the genus Mimomusonius .
Mahonia bracteolata is a shrub in the Berberidaceae described as a species in 1917 .
The Willow - Leaved Water Croton , ( Homonoia riparia ) , a mangrove species , belongs to the genus Excoecaria of the family Euphorbiaceae .
Keysseria ( island - daisy ) is a genus of flowering plants in the daisy family .
The identified molecular markers provide reliable means for the division of species from the phylum Synergistetes into intermediate taxonomic ranks such as families and orders .
Krigia cespitosa , known as common dwarf - dandelion , opposite - leaved dwarf - dandelion , or weedy dwarfdandelion , is a North American species of plant in the sunflower family .
Tricholosporum goniospermum is a species of fungus in the Tricholomataceae family , and the type species of the genus Tricholosporum .
Conus kuroharai , common name Kurohara 's cone , is a species of sea snail , a marine gastropod mollusk in the family Conidae , the cone snails and their allies .
Streptomyces ghanaensis is a bacterium species from the genus of Streptomyces which has been isolated from soil in Ghana .
Microlipophrys canevae is a species of combtooth blenny found in the northeast Atlantic Ocean near Portugal and in the Mediterranean Sea .
Clypeomorus pellucida , common name the pellucid cerith , is a species of sea snail , a marine gastropod mollusk in the family Cerithiidae .
Lygromma anops is one of only three known eyeless spiders in the superfamily Gnaphosoidea , and one of only two known troglobites ( cave species ) .
Dinacoma is a small genus of beetles in the scarab family ( Scarabaeidae ) .
Jacksonia scoparia , commonly known as dogwood ( from its strong odour when burning ) , is a native species of a pea - flowered , greyish , leafless , broom - like shrub or small tree that occurs in the south east of Queensland , Australia and eastern New South Wales .
Alocasia brisbanensis is a species of plant in the family Araceae .
Russula graveolens is an edible species of fungus in the genus Russula .
Epiophlebia superstes is a species of dragonfly that is native to Japan .
Pertusaria is a large genus of warty crustose lichens It is in the Pertusariaceae family .
Lachanodes is a genus of plants in the groundsel tribe of the sunflower family .
Furcantenna yangi is a species of hoverfly from Guangxi , China .
Emmelina is a genus of moth in the Pterophoridae family with a nearly cosmopolitan distribution .
Rhinelepis is a genus of South American armored catfish .
Pritchardia munroi , the Kamalo pritchardia , is a species of fan palm that is endemic to Hawaii in the United States .
Monophyllanthe is a genus of plants native to Brazil , Colombia , French Guinea and Suriname .
Laetiporus is a genus of edible mushrooms found throughout much of the world .
Aechmea chantinii var . chantinii ( Carrière ) Baker , 1889 - most of species range Aechmea chantinii var . fuchsii H.Luther ( 1987 publ . 1988 ) .
Pinara cana is a species of moth of the Lasiocampidae family .
Traquairaspis is a genus of extinct heterostracan agnathan fish known from the Silurian and Early Devonian periods .
The Rhabditidae are a family of nematodes which includes the model organism Caenorhabditis elegans .
The Phiomyidae are a family of prehistoric rodents from Africa and Eurasia .
Tylochromis polylepis is a species of cichlid native to Lake Tanganyika as well as the Lukuga River where it prefers swampy habitats .
Makowskia is an extinct genus of discosauriscid seymouriamorph known from the early Permian ( lower Saxonian age ) of Boskovice Furrow , in the Czech Republic .
Irolita is a genus of softnose skates , family Rajidae , commonly known as the round skates .
Ostrya japonica ( Japanese Hop - hornbeam ) is a species of tree in the Betulaceae family growing to 25 m tall .
Plestiodon is the name for a genus of lizards formerly referred to as Eumeces , except those now placed in Mesoscincus .
Eucalyptus fasciculosa , or pink gum , is a species of Eucalyptus which is endemic to Australia .
Dysdera adriatica is a spider species found in Austria and the Balkans .
Ceratomyxa is a genus of myxozoan .
Enteroxenos muelleri is a species of minute sea snail , a marine gastropod mollusk in the family Eulimidae .
Caryophyllales is an order of flowering plants that includes the cacti , carnations , amaranths , ice plants , beets , and many carnivorous plants .
Griffinia hyacinthina is a bulbous species of flowering plant which is endemic to Brazil .
Paspalum floridanum is a species of grass known by the common name Florida paspalum .
Radiospongilla sceptroides is a species of freshwater sponge in the family Spongillidae .
Cattleya alaorii , commonly known as the Laelia alaorii , is a species of orchid endemic to Brazil ( Bahia ) .
Paulinella is a genus of about nine species of freshwater amoeboids .
Prodinoceras ( `` Before Terrible Horns '' ) was the earliest known uintathere genus , which lived in the late Paleocene of Mongolia .
Austroharpa learorum is a species of sea snail , a marine gastropod mollusk in the family Harpidae , the harp snails .
Penicillium clavigerum is a fungus species of the genus of Penicillium which produces fumigaclavine A and fumigaclavine B
Eupatorium fortunei , in Chinese called 佩兰 pei lan , is a plant species in Asteraceae native from Asia where it is rare in the wild but commonly cultivated .
Crocydoscelus is a genus of moth in the Pterophoridae family containing one species , Crocydoscelus ferrugineum , which is known from the Republic of Congo and Nigeria .
Cinna latifolia is a species of grass known by the common name drooping woodreed .
Phomopsis azadirachtae is a fungus , a species of the Phomopsis genus .
Amissidens hainesi , the Ridged catfish , is the only species of catfish ( order Siluriformes ) in the genus Amissidens of the family Ariidae .
Leptophlebiidae is a family belonging to the Ephemeropterans that are commonly known as the prong - gilled mayflies or leptophlebiids .
Cassida panzeri is a species of beetle in the leaf beetle family , that can be found in the Palearctic region , and in the Honshu province of Japan .
Cercidiphyllum is a genus containing two species of plants , both commonly called katsura .
It contains only one species , Potanichthys xingyiensis .
Melipotis cellaris , the Cellar Melipotis Moth , is a species of moth in the Erebidae family .
Struthiolariidae is a family of small to medium - sized sea snails , marine gastropod molluscs in the superfamily Stromboidea .
Vicia menziesii is a rare species of flowering plant in the legume family known by the common name Hawaiian vetch .
Philomycus virginicus , common name the Virginia philomycus , is a species of air - breathing land slug , a terrestrial pulmonate gastropod mollusk in the family Philomycidae .
Cyclotrichium is a genus of plants in the Lamiaceae , first described as a genus in 1953 .
Atopodontus adriaensi is a species of upside - down catfish endemic to Gabon where it occurs in rapids of the Ivindo , Okano , Ngounié and the Nyanga Rivers .
The Peaks of Otter salamander ( Plethodon hubrichti ) is a species of salamander in the family Plethodontidae , endemic to the Peaks of Otter area in the Blue Ridge Mountains of Virginia .
Nanobagrus is a genus of bagrid catfishes found in Southeast Asia .
The type species is Normannognathus wellnhoferi .
Oxynoemacheilus ercisianus is a species of stone loach endemic to Turkey .
Kallymenia ercegovicii a red algae species first discovered in the Mediterranean Sea , in the coast of Croatia .
Hydrophyllum occidentale is a species of flowering plant in the waterleaf family known by the common name western waterleaf .
Plumbago europaea , also known as the common leadwort , is a plant species in the genus Plumbago found in the Mediterranean Basin and Central Asia .
Nomorhamphus megarrhamphus is a species of viviparous halfbeak endemic to Lake Towuti in Sulawesi , Indonesia .
Brygmophyseter is an extinct genus of toothed whale in the sperm whale family with one species Brygmophyseter shigensis .
Annandaliella pectinifera is a species of tarantula , a type of spider , in the subfamily Selenogyrinae .
Penicillium caseifulvum is a fungus species of the genus of Penicillium which occurs on the surface of blue cheese and causes discoloration in form of brown spots .
Aparallactus capensis , or the Cape centipede - eater , is a species of venomous rear - fanged snake in the Atractaspididae family .
Calliostoma philippei is a species of sea snail , a marine gastropod mollusk in the family Calliostomatidae .
Brickellia parvula ( Mt. Davis brickellbush ) is a North American species of flowering plants in the daisy family .
Tecophilaea is a genus of cormous plants in the family Tecophilaeaceae .
Clariger is a genus of gobies native to the northwestern Pacific Ocean from coastal waters and tide pools around Japan and Taiwan .
Pinus morrisonicola ( Taiwan white pine ; Chinese : 台湾五针松 ; pinyin : taiwan wuzhensong ; literally : `` Taiwan five - needle pine '' ) , is a species of conifer in the Pinaceae family .
Sinployea pitcairnensis is a species of land snail in the family Charopidae .
Vertigo arctica ( Wallenberg , 1858 ) is a species of minute air - breathing land snail , a terrestrial pulmonate gastropod mollusk in the family Vertiginidae , the whorl snails .
Cucurbita scabridifolia is a plant species of the genus Cucurbita native to Mexico .
Ariadna ustulata is a species of tube - dwelling spider that is endemic to the Seychelles .
Persicaria longiseta is a species of flowering plant in the knotweed family known by the common names Oriental lady 's thumb , bristly lady 's thumb , Asiatic smartweed , long - bristled smartweed , Asiatic waterpepper , bristled knotweed , bunchy knotweed , and tufted knotweed .
Porphyrostemma is a genus of African plants in the Irish fleabane tribe within the daisy family .
Calathea zebrina ( zebra plant ) is a species of plant in the family Marantaceae , native to southeastern Brazil .
Acacia caerulescens , commonly known as limestone blue wattle , Buchan blue or Buchan blue wattle is a tree species that is endemic to Victoria , Australia .
Orthotylus digitus is a species of bug from the Miridae family that is endemic to France .
Ligularia sibirica is the type species for the genus Ligularia .
Amaranthus tuberculatus , commonly known as roughfruit amaranth , rough - fruited water - hemp , or tall waterhemp , is a species of flowering plant .
Abbottella calliotropis is a species of operculate land snail , a terrestrial gastropod mollusk in the family Pomatiidae .
Gilia millefoliata is a species of flowering plant in the phlox family known by the common name manyleaf gilia .
Inga disticha is a species of Fabaceae that was described by botanist George Bentham .
Felis is a genus of small and medium - sized cat species native to most of Africa and south of 60 ° latitude in Europe and Asia to Indochina .
Eochelone is an extinct genus of sea turtle from the late Eocene .
Melanodes anthracitaria , the black geometrid , is a species of moth of the Geometridae family .
Pachyminixi is a small southern neotropical genus of potter wasps .
Monilea callifera , common name shrewd trochid , is a species of sea snail , a marine gastropod mollusk in the family Trochidae , the top snails .
Cautethia noctuiformis is a species of moth in the family Sphingidae , which is known from the Caribbean .
The family - level name Vulcanodontidae was erected by M.R. Cooper in 1984 .
Elops hawaiensis , the Hawaiian ladyfish , Hawaiian tenpounder , or banana fish , is a species of fish in the Elopidae family .
Epidendrum excisum is a species of orchid known to grow both epiphytically and terrestrially on steep rocky banks in mountainous regions of Columbia , Ecuador , Peru , and Venezuela .
Penicillium christenseniae is a fungus species of the genus of Penicillium which was isolated from native forest near Costa Rica .
Solidago uliginosa , or bog goldenrod , is a North American species of flowering plants in the sunflower family .
Malacothamnus clementinus is a rare species of flowering plant in the mallow family known by the common name San Clemente Island bushmallow .
Buddug Verona James is a Welsh mezzo - soprano opera singer who studied at the Guildhall School of Music and Drama , the National Opera Studio and in Rome .
Domenico Donzelli ( February 2 , 1790 -- March 31 , 1873 ) was an Italian tenor with a robust voice who enjoyed an important career in Paris , London and his native country during the 1808 - 1841 period .
Jane Henschel ( born 2 March 1952 ) is an American operatic mezzo soprano .
Emanuel List ( born March 22 , 1888 in Vienna - d. June 21 , 1967 in Vienna ) was an Austrian - American opera bass .
June Bronhill OBE ( 26 June 1929 -- 24 January 2005 ) was an internationally acclaimed Australian soprano opera singer .
